trans-unit.target: Hynny yw Iesu, fab i Mary-gair o wirionedd am maent mewn anghydfod.

trans-unit.source: It is not [befitting] for Allah to take a son; exalted is He! When He decrees an affair, He only says to it, "Be," and it is.
trans-unit.target: Nid yw [bod] i Allah i gymryd mab; i'w mawrygu yw ef! Pan mae ef deddfir fater, ond dywed iddo, "Fod yn", ac mae.

trans-unit.source: [Jesus said], "And indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is a straight path."
trans-unit.target: [Dywedodd Iesu], 'ac yn wir, Allah yn fy Arglwydd a eich Arglwydd, felly addoli ef. Yn llwybr syth.

trans-unit.source: Then the factions differed [concerning Jesus] from among them, so woe to those who disbelieved - from the scene of a tremendous Day.
trans-unit.target: Yna roedd y garfanau yn wahanol [ynghylch Iesu] o blith iddynt, felly gwae i'r rhai a ddysgais-o leoliad aruthrol y dydd.

trans-unit.source: How [clearly] they will hear and see the Day they come to Us, but the wrongdoers today are in clear error.
trans-unit.target: Sut [glir] byddant yn clywed ac yn gweler y diwrnod maent yn dod i ni, ond y tramgwyddo heddiw mewn camgymeriad amlwg.

trans-unit.source: And warn them, [O Muhammad], of the Day of Regret, when the matter will be concluded; and [yet], they are in [a state of] heedlessness, and they do not believe.
trans-unit.target: A rhybuddio, [O Muhammad], am y dydd edifar, pan fydd casgliad y mater; ac [eto], maent yn [] heedlessness, ac nid credu.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who will inherit the earth and whoever is on it, and to Us they will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae'n inni a fydd yn etifeddu'r ddaear a phwy bynnag arno, ac i ni eu bod yn dychwelyd.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book [the story of] Abraham. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: A sôn yn y llyfr [stori] Abraham. Yn wir, yr oedd yn ddyn gwir a yn broffwyd.

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when he said to his father, "O my father, why do you worship that which does not hear and does not see and will not benefit you at all?
trans-unit.target: [Cyfeiriad] pan ddywedodd i'w dad, "O fy nhad, pam wneud eich addoli a nid yw'n clywed ac nid gweld ac bydd nid o fudd i chi o gwbl?

trans-unit.source: O my father, indeed there has come to me of knowledge that which has not come to you, so follow me; I will guide you to an even path.
trans-unit.target: O fy nhad, yn wir mae wedi dod ataf o'r wybodaeth a ddaeth nid i chi, felly Dilynwch fi; Bydd yn eich tywys i lwybr hyd yn oed.

trans-unit.source: O my father, do not worship Satan. Indeed Satan has ever been, to the Most Merciful, disobedient.
trans-unit.target: O fy nhad, wneud nid addoli Satan. Yn wir mae Satan erioed, y mwyaf tosturiol, anufudd.

trans-unit.source: O my father, indeed I fear that there will touch you a punishment from the Most Merciful so you would be to Satan a companion [in Hellfire]."
trans-unit.target: O fy nhad, yn wir yr wyf yn ofni bod yno bydd yn cyffwrdd â chi cosbi gan mwyaf tosturiol felly byddai chi i Satan yn gydymaith [yn Hellfire]."

trans-unit.source: [His father] said, "Have you no desire for my gods, O Abraham? If you do not desist, I will surely stone you, so avoid me a prolonged time."
trans-unit.target: [Dad] yn dweud, "a oes gennych unrhyw awydd i fy duwiau, O Abraham? Os nad ydych yn ymatal, yr bydd siawns carreg chi, mi felly yn osgoi amser maith.

trans-unit.source: [Abraham] said, "Peace will be upon you. I will ask forgiveness for you of my Lord. Indeed, He is ever gracious to me.
trans-unit.target: [Abraham] dywedodd, "Bydd heddwch arnoch. Bydd yn gofyn maddeuant i chi o fy Arglwydd. Yn wir, mae'n raslon erioed i mi.

trans-unit.source: And I will leave you and those you invoke other than Allah and will invoke my Lord. I expect that I will not be in invocation to my Lord unhappy."
trans-unit.target: A bydd yn gadael chi, a'r rhai ydych yn galw'r heblaw Allah ac bydd yn galw'r fy Arglwydd. Disgwyliaf y byddaf yn gallu ni i fy Arglwydd anhapus."

trans-unit.source: So when he had left them and those they worshipped other than Allah, We gave him Isaac and Jacob, and each [of them] We made a prophet.
trans-unit.target: Felly pan oedd iddo adael iddynt a'r rhai roeddynt yn addoli eu heblaw Allah, rhoesom iddo Isaac a Jacob, a phob un [ohonynt] gwnaethom yn broffwyd.

trans-unit.source: And We gave them of Our mercy, and we made for them a reputation of high honor.
trans-unit.target: A rhoddwyd iddynt o drugaredd ein, a gwnaethom iddynt enw da o uchel yn fraint.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book, Moses. Indeed, he was chosen, and he was a messenger and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: A sôn yn y llyfr, Moses. Yn wir, cafodd ei ddewis, ac yr oedd negesydd ac yn broffwyd.

trans-unit.source: And We called him from the side of the mount at [his] right and brought him near, confiding [to him].
trans-unit.target: A gelwir ef o ochr y mount ar [ei] iawn ac yn dwyn iddo ger, datgelu'r [iddo ef].

trans-unit.source: And We gave him out of Our mercy his brother Aaron as a prophet.
trans-unit.target: A rhoddodd ef allan o drugaredd ein ei frawd Aaron fel Proffwyd.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book, Ishmael. Indeed, he was true to his promise, and he was a messenger and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: A sôn yn y llyfr, Ishmael. Yn wir, yr oedd yn wir ei addewid, ac yr oedd negesydd ac yn broffwyd.

trans-unit.source: And he used to enjoin on his people prayer and zakah and was to his Lord pleasing.
trans-unit.target: A ddefnyddir i enjoin ar ei gweddi pobl a zakah ef a oedd ei Arglwydd braf.

trans-unit.source: And mention in the Book, Idrees. Indeed, he was a man of truth and a prophet.
trans-unit.target: A sôn yn y llyfr, Idrees. Yn wir, yr oedd yn ddyn gwir a yn broffwyd.

trans-unit.source: And We raised him to a high station.
trans-unit.target: A chodwyd ef i orsaf uchel.

trans-unit.source: Those were the ones upon whom Allah bestowed favor from among the prophets of the descendants of Adam and of those We carried [in the ship] with Noah, and of the descendants of Abraham and Israel, and of those whom We guided and chose. When the verses of the Most Merciful were recited to them, they fell in prostration and weeping.
trans-unit.target: Rheini oedd y rhai ar bwy oedd Allah wedi rhoi'r favor o blith y proffwydi o ddisgynyddion Adam a rhai rydym yn eu cynnal [yn y llong] gyda Noah, ac o ddisgynyddion Abraham a Israel, ac o'r rheini yr ydym dan arweiniad a dewis. Pan oedd y penillion o mwyaf tosturiol ei roi iddynt, disgynnodd yn prostration ac yn wylo.

trans-unit.source: But there came after them successors who neglected prayer and pursued desires; so they are going to meet evil -
trans-unit.target: Ond yna daeth ar ôl iddynt olynwyr sy'n esgeuluso gweddi a mynd ar drywydd dyheadau; Felly maent yn mynd i gwrdd â drygioni-

trans-unit.source: Except those who repent, believe and do righteousness; for those will enter Paradise and will not be wronged at all.
trans-unit.target: Ac eithrio y rhai sydd yn edifarhau, credu ac a chyfiawnder i; ar gyfer y rheini fydd Rhowch baradwys a ni bydd yn cam o gwbl.

trans-unit.source: [Therein are] gardens of perpetual residence which the Most Merciful has promised His servants in the unseen. Indeed, His promise has ever been coming.
trans-unit.target: [Erthyglau yn] gerddi preswylio parhaol sy'n fwyaf tosturiol addawodd ei weision yn y unseen. Yn wir, mae ei addewid erioed wedi dod.

trans-unit.source: They will not hear therein any ill speech - only [greetings of] peace - and they will have their provision therein, morning and afternoon.
trans-unit.target: Byddant nid yn clywed ynddynt unrhyw araith sâl-dim ond heddwch [cyfarchion o]-a bydd ganddynt eu darpariaeth ynddo, y bore a'r prynhawn.

trans-unit.source: That is Paradise, which We give as inheritance to those of Our servants who were fearing of Allah.
trans-unit.target: Mae hynny'n baradwys, a ydym yn rhoi fel etifeddiaeth i'r rhai ein gweision a oedd yn ofni Allah.

trans-unit.source: [Gabriel said], "And we [angels] descend not except by the order of your Lord. To Him belongs that before us and that behind us and what is in between. And never is your Lord forgetful -
trans-unit.target: [Dywedodd Gabriel], 'a ddisgyn [angylion] yr ydym ni ac eithrio Amcangyfrifir eich Arglwydd. Iddo ef y perthyn ger ein bron a tu ôl i ni a beth yw rhwng. A byth yn eich Arglwydd yn anghofus-

trans-unit.source: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them - so worship Him and have patience for His worship. Do you know of any similarity to Him?"
trans-unit.target: Yr Arglwydd y nefoedd, y ddaear a beth bynnag yw rhyngddynt-felly addoli ef a wedi amynedd ar gyfer ei addoli. Wyddoch chi o unrhyw debygrwydd iddo?"

trans-unit.source: And the disbeliever says, "When I have died, am I going to be brought forth alive?"
trans-unit.target: A dywed y disbeliever, "Pan wyf wedi marw, dwi'n mynd i'w ddwyn ymlaen fyw?"

trans-unit.source: Does man not remember that We created him before, while he was nothing?
trans-unit.target: Nid yw dyn yn cofio bod creu ef o'r blaen, tra yr oedd dim?

trans-unit.source: So by your Lord, We will surely gather them and the devils; then We will bring them to be present around Hell upon their knees.
trans-unit.target: Felly gan eich Arglwydd, byddwn yn sicr yn ei chasglu iddynt ac y devils; wedyn byddwn yn cyflwyno iddynt fod yn bresennol o gwmpas uffern ar eu gliniau.

trans-unit.source: Then We will surely extract from every sect those of them who were worst against the Most Merciful in insolence.
trans-unit.target: Wedyn bydd gennym siawns dyfyniad o bob sect rhai ohonynt a oedd waethaf erbyn mwyaf tosturiol yn haerllugrwydd.

trans-unit.source: Then, surely it is We who are most knowing of those most worthy of burning therein.
trans-unit.target: Yna, onid ydym sy'n gwybod fwyaf o rhai mwyaf teilwng o losgi ynddo.

trans-unit.source: And there is none of you except he will come to it. This is upon your Lord an inevitability decreed.
trans-unit.target: Ac nid oes yr un ohonoch ac eithrio daw iddo. Mae hyn ar eich Arglwydd anochel a ddyfarnwyd.

trans-unit.source: Then We will save those who feared Allah and leave the wrongdoers within it, on their knees.
trans-unit.target: Yna byddwn yn arbed rhai sy'n ofni Allah ac yn gadael y tramgwyddo ynddo, ar eu gliniau.

trans-unit.source: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Which of [our] two parties is best in position and best in association?"
trans-unit.target: Ac wrth roi ein penillion iddynt fel clir yn dangos, mae rhai a chredu yn dweud i'r rhai sydd yn credu, "Pa un o'r ddwy blaid [ein] yw'r gorau mewn sefyllfa a gorau mewn cymdeithas?"

trans-unit.source: And how many a generation have We destroyed before them who were better in possessions and [outward] appearance?
trans-unit.target: A sawl cenhedlaeth wedi inni eu dinistrio cyn iddynt a oedd yn well mewn eiddo ac ymddangosiad [allanol]?

trans-unit.source: Say, "Whoever is in error - let the Most Merciful extend for him an extension [in wealth and time] until, when they see that which they were promised - either punishment [in this world] or the Hour [of resurrection] - they will come to know who is worst in position and weaker in soldiers."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "pwy bynnag mae gwall-yn ymestyn Gadewch Merciful fwyaf iddo estyniad [mewn cyfoeth ac amser] tan, pan maent yn gweld hyn a addawyd iddynt-naill ai cosbi [yn y byd hwn] neu yr awr [o atgyfodi]-byddant yn dod i wybod pwy sy'n wannach mewn milwyr a'r gwaethaf mewn sefyllfa."

trans-unit.source: And Allah increases those who were guided, in guidance, and the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for recourse.
trans-unit.target: Ac mae Allah yn cynyddu'r rheini sy'n eu harwain, yn y canllawiau, a gweithredoedd da parhaus yn well i eich Arglwydd ar gyfer gwobrwyo ac yn well ar gyfer atebolrwydd.

trans-unit.source: Then, have you seen he who disbelieved in Our verses and said, "I will surely be given wealth and children [in the next life]?"
trans-unit.target: Yna, ydych chi wedi gweld ef a ddysgais yn ein penillion a dweud, "Byddaf yn sicr yn cael cyfoeth a phlant [yn y bywyd nesaf]?"

trans-unit.source: Has he looked into the unseen, or has he taken from the Most Merciful a promise?
trans-unit.target: Wedi edrych i mewn i'r unseen, neu mae wedi eu cymryd o'r mwyaf tosturiol addewid?

trans-unit.source: No! We will record what he says and extend for him from the punishment extensively.
trans-unit.target: na! Bydd yn cofnodi hyn meddai ac ymestyn iddo o gosb yn helaeth.

trans-unit.source: And We will inherit him [in] what he mentions, and he will come to Us alone.
trans-unit.target: A fydd yn etifeddu ef yn crybwyll hyn, a bydd ef yn dod atom yn unig.

trans-unit.source: And they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that they would be for them [a source of] honor.
trans-unit.target: Ac y maent wedi eu cymryd yn ogystal â duwdod Allah [anwir] y byddai iddynt [ffynhonnell] anrhydedd honno.

trans-unit.source: No! Those "gods" will deny their worship of them and will be against them opponents [on the Day of Judgement].
trans-unit.target: na! Bydd y "duwiau" yn gwadu eu addoli ohonynt, a bydd yn erbyn eu gwrthwynebwyr [ar y diwrnod dyfarniad].

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that We have sent the devils upon the disbelievers, inciting them to [evil] with [constant] incitement?
trans-unit.target: Nid ydych yn gweld bod yr ydym wedi anfon y devils ar y disbelievers, i'w annog i anogaeth [anfad] gyda [cyson]?

trans-unit.source: So be not impatient over them. We only count out to them a [limited] number.
trans-unit.target: Felly fod nid yn ddiamynedd dros iddynt. Dim ond ein bod yn cyfrif iddynt nifer [cyfyngedig].

trans-unit.source: On the Day We will gather the righteous to the Most Merciful as a delegation
trans-unit.target: Bydd ar y dydd rydym yn casglu y righteous i mwyaf tosturiol fel dirprwyaeth

trans-unit.source: And will drive the criminals to Hell in thirst
trans-unit.target: A bydd y troseddwyr i uffern mewn syched

trans-unit.source: None will have [power of] intercession except he who had taken from the Most Merciful a covenant.
trans-unit.target: Bydd dim rhaid intercession [pŵer] ac eithrio ef oedd wedi cymryd o'r mwyaf tosturiol cyfamod.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken [for Himself] a son."
trans-unit.target: Ac maent yn dweud, "y rhan fwyaf wedi Merciful [drosto'i hun] mab."

trans-unit.source: You have done an atrocious thing.
trans-unit.target: Yr ydych wedi gwneud peth erchyll.

trans-unit.source: The heavens almost rupture therefrom and the earth splits open and the mountains collapse in devastation
trans-unit.target: Mae y nefoedd yn ymdorri thelir bron a y ddaear hollti'r agored ac mae mynyddoedd y cwymp mewn dinistr

trans-unit.source: That they attribute to the Most Merciful a son.
trans-unit.target: Y maent yn eu priodoli i mwyaf tosturiol mab.

trans-unit.source: And it is not appropriate for the Most Merciful that He should take a son.
trans-unit.target: Ac nid yw'n briodol ar gyfer y mwyaf tosturiol y dylai ei gymryd i fab.

trans-unit.source: There is no one in the heavens and earth but that he comes to the Most Merciful as a servant.
trans-unit.target: Nid oes unrhyw un yn y nefoedd a'r ddaear ond y daw â mwyaf tosturiol fel gwas.

trans-unit.source: He has enumerated them and counted them a [full] counting.
trans-unit.target: Mae wedi cyfrif iddynt ac yn cyfrif eu cyfrif [llawn].

trans-unit.source: And all of them are coming to Him on the Day of Resurrection alone.
trans-unit.target: Ac mae pob un ohonynt yn dod iddo ar unig dydd atgyfodi.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - the Most Merciful will appoint for them affection.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae'r rhai sydd wedi credu ac wedi gwneud gweithredoedd cyfiawn-bydd y mwyaf tosturiol benodi ar eu cyfer hoffter.

trans-unit.source: So, [O Muhammad], We have only made Qur'an easy in the Arabic language that you may give good tidings thereby to the righteous and warn thereby a hostile people.
trans-unit.target: Felly, [O Muhammad], rydym wedi dim ond gwneud Qur'an hawdd yn yr iaith Arabeg y gallwch roi tidings da gan y righteous a rhybuddio gan bobl gelyniaethus.

trans-unit.source: And how many have We destroyed before them of generations? Do you perceive of them anyone or hear from them a sound?
trans-unit.target: A llawer o sut rydym wedi dinistrio cyn iddynt am genedlaethau? Ydych chi'n ystyried ohonynt unrhyw un, neu glywed ganddynt gadarn?

trans-unit.source: Ta, Ha.
trans-unit.target: Dreth gyngo, Ha.

trans-unit.source: We have not sent down to you the Qur'an that you be distressed
trans-unit.target: Nad ydym wedi anfon i lawr i chi y Qur'an a chi fod yn ofidus

trans-unit.source: But only as a reminder for those who fear [Allah] -
trans-unit.target: Ond dim ond fel nodyn atgoffa ar gyfer y rhai sy'n ofni [Allah]-

trans-unit.source: A revelation from He who created the earth and highest heavens,
trans-unit.target: Datguddiad o ef a greodd y ddaear a nefoedd uchaf,

trans-unit.source: The Most Merciful [who is] above the Throne established.
trans-unit.target: Y mwyaf tosturiol [sy'n] uchod yr Orsedd a sefydlwyd.

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and what is on the earth and what is between them and what is under the soil.
trans-unit.target: Ef yn perthyn iddo beth sydd yn y nefoedd a beth sydd ar y ddaear a beth yw rhyngddynt a'r hyn sydd o dan y pridd.

trans-unit.source: And if you speak aloud - then indeed, He knows the secret and what is [even] more hidden.
trans-unit.target: Ac os ydych yn siarad ar goedd-yn wir, yna y gwyr y gyfrinach ac hyn [yn] fwy yn gudd.

trans-unit.source: Allah - there is no deity except Him. To Him belong the best names.
trans-unit.target: Allah-nid oes unrhyw Dduwdod ac eithrio ef. Perthyn yr enwau gorau iddo.

trans-unit.source: And has the story of Moses reached you? -
trans-unit.target: Ac mae stori Moses wedi cyrraedd chi? -

trans-unit.source: When he saw a fire and said to his family, "Stay here; indeed, I have perceived a fire; perhaps I can bring you a torch or find at the fire some guidance."
trans-unit.target: Pan ei gwelais tân a dywedodd at ei deulu, "aros yma; yn wir, mae yn gweld tân; Efallai imi ddod â chi ffagl neu ganfod rhywfaint o arweiniad ar y tân."

trans-unit.source: And when he came to it, he was called, "O Moses,
trans-unit.target: A pan ddaeth ato, iddo gael ei alw, "O Moses,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am your Lord, so remove your sandals. Indeed, you are in the sacred valley of Tuwa.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yr wyf yn eich Arglwydd, felly dynnu eich dweud. Yn wir, rydych mewn Dyffryn sanctaidd Tuwa.

trans-unit.source: And I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed [to you].
trans-unit.target: Ac wedi dewis chi, felly yn gwrando ar beth yw datgelu [i].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yr wyf yn Allah. Nid oes unrhyw Dduwdod ac eithrio imi, felly mi addoli a sefydlu gweddi ar gyfer cofio fy.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Hour is coming - I almost conceal it - so that every soul may be recompensed according to that for which it strives.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, daw yr awr-bron yr yn cuddio-fel y gall pob enaid eu had-dalu yn ôl y lle mae'n ymdrechu.

trans-unit.source: So do not let one avert you from it who does not believe in it and follows his desire, for you [then] would perish.
trans-unit.target: Felly peidiwch â gadael un chi osgoi ohono sydd nid credu ynddo ac yn dilyn ei awydd, i chi [yna] byddai yn marw.

trans-unit.source: And what is that in your right hand, O Moses?"
trans-unit.target: A beth yw bod yn eich llaw dde, O Moses?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "It is my staff; I lean upon it, and I bring down leaves for my sheep and I have therein other uses."
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd, "Mae fy staff; Main yr arno, a deuaf i lawr dail ar gyfer fy defaid ac mae gennyf defnyddiau erthyglau eraill."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Throw it down, O Moses."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] yn dweud, "Ei daflu i lawr, O Moses."

trans-unit.source: So he threw it down, and thereupon it was a snake, moving swiftly.
trans-unit.target: Felly mae'n taflodd i lawr, a rhydd yr oedd neidr, symud yn gyflym.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Seize it and fear not; We will return it to its former condition.
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd [Allah], "achub ar y cyfle ac yn ofni na; Byddwn yn ei dychwelyd i'w gyflwr blaenorol.

trans-unit.source: And draw in your hand to your side; it will come out white without disease - another sign,
trans-unit.target: Ac yn tynnu yn eich llaw at eich ochr; Bydd yn dod allan Gwyn heb glefyd – arwydd arall,

trans-unit.source: That We may show you [some] of Our greater signs.
trans-unit.target: Y gallwn ddangos ichi [rai] ein arwyddion mwy.

trans-unit.source: Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed."
trans-unit.target: Ewch i Ffaro. Yn wir, mae ei feirniadaeth."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "My Lord, expand for me my breast [with assurance]
trans-unit.target: [Moses] yn dweud, "fy Arglwydd, ehangu i mi fy fron [gyda sicrwydd]

trans-unit.source: And ease for me my task
trans-unit.target: A hawdd i mi fy nhasg

trans-unit.source: And untie the knot from my tongue
trans-unit.target: A datglymu pen y cwlwm o fy nhafod

trans-unit.source: That they may understand my speech.
trans-unit.target: Iddynt ddeall fy araith.

trans-unit.source: And appoint for me a minister from my family -
trans-unit.target: Ac i benodi Gweinidog o fy nheulu i-fy

trans-unit.source: Aaron, my brother.
trans-unit.target: Aaron, fy mrawd.

trans-unit.source: Increase through him my strength
trans-unit.target: Cynyddu drwy iddo fy nerth

trans-unit.source: And let him share my task
trans-unit.target: A gadewch iddo rannu fy nhasg

trans-unit.source: That we may exalt You much
trans-unit.target: Y gall exalt chi llawer

trans-unit.source: And remember You much.
trans-unit.target: A ydych yn cofio llawer.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, You are of us ever Seeing."
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yr ydych ohonom byth yn gweld."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "You have been granted your request, O Moses.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] yn dweud, "yr ydych wedi'i roi eich cais, O Moses.

trans-unit.source: And We had already conferred favor upon you another time,
trans-unit.target: A oedd gennym eisoes a roddwyd favor ar eich amser arall,

trans-unit.source: When We inspired to your mother what We inspired,
trans-unit.target: Pan fydd ein hysbrydoli i eich mam ein hysbrydoli,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], 'Cast him into the chest and cast it into the river, and the river will throw it onto the bank; there will take him an enemy to Me and an enemy to him.' And I bestowed upon you love from Me that you would be brought up under My eye.
trans-unit.target: [Dweud], ' bwrw ef i'r frest a'r cast yn yr afon, a'r afon bydd ei daflu ar y banc; yna bydd yn cymryd ef yn elyn i mi ac yn elyn iddo.' A roi i yr ydych yn eu caru oddi wrthyf y byddai eich magu o dan fy llygad.

trans-unit.source: [And We favored you] when your sister went and said, 'Shall I direct you to someone who will be responsible for him?' So We restored you to your mother that she might be content and not grieve. And you killed someone, but We saved you from retaliation and tried you with a [severe] trial. And you remained [some] years among the people of Madyan. Then you came [here] at the decreed time, O Moses.
trans-unit.target: [A ydym yn ffafriol chi] pan aeth eich chwaer a dweud, 'Bydd eich cyfeirio at rywun a fydd yn gyfrifol amdano?' Felly adfer chi at eich mam, y gallai fod yn fodlon ac nid galaru. A oedd eich lladd rhywun, ond rydym yn eich arbed rhag dial ac yn ceisio eich â treial [difrifol]. A ydych yn parhau [rai] mlynedd ymysg pobl Madyan. Yna chi Daeth [yma] ar y pryd decreed, O Moses.

trans-unit.source: And I produced you for Myself.
trans-unit.target: Ac wedi cynhyrchu chi fy hun.

trans-unit.source: Go, you and your brother, with My signs and do not slacken in My remembrance.
trans-unit.target: Ewch, chi a dy frawd, fy arwyddion ac nid oes slacken yn cofio fy.

trans-unit.source: Go, both of you, to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.
trans-unit.target: Ewch, ddau ohonoch, i Ffaro. Yn wir, y mae ei feirniadaeth.

trans-unit.source: And speak to him with gentle speech that perhaps he may be reminded or fear [Allah]."
trans-unit.target: A siarad ag ef gyda araith addfwyn y efallai caiff ei atgoffa neu ofn [Allah].

trans-unit.source: They said, "Our Lord, indeed we are afraid that he will hasten [punishment] against us or that he will transgress."
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "Ein Arglwydd, yn wir rydym yn ofni y bydd ef yn cyflymu [cosbi] yn ein herbyn neu y bydd ef yn camddefnyddio'u."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see.
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd [Allah], "ofni nad. Yn wir, yr wyf â chi ddau; Clywaf a gwelaf.

trans-unit.source: So go to him and say, 'Indeed, we are messengers of your Lord, so send with us the Children of Israel and do not torment them. We have come to you with a sign from your Lord. And peace will be upon he who follows the guidance.
trans-unit.target: Felly ewch i ef a dweud, ' yn wir, ydym yn negeswyr eich Arglwydd, felly anfon plant Israel gyda ni ac nid a dychryn ymhlith y iddynt. Rydym wedi dod i chi gyda'r arwydd o eich Arglwydd. A bydd heddwch ar ef a dilyn y canllawiau.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it has been revealed to us that the punishment will be upon whoever denies and turns away.' "
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, datgelwyd inni y bydd y gosb ar bwy bynnag yn gwadu ac yn eu tro i ffwrdd.' "

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "So who is the Lord of you two, O Moses?"
trans-unit.target: [Ffaro] dywedodd, "Felly pwy yw yr Arglwydd eich dwy, O Moses?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Our Lord is He who gave each thing its form and then guided [it]."
trans-unit.target: Meddai, "Ein Arglwydd yw ef a roddodd bob peth ei ffurf ac a lywiodd [TG]."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "Then what is the case of the former generations?"
trans-unit.target: [Ffaro] dywedodd, "Yna beth yw achos y cenedlaethau gynt?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "The knowledge thereof is with my Lord in a record. My Lord neither errs nor forgets."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] dywedodd, "y gwybodaeth ohonynt gyda fy Arglwydd mewn cofnod. Mae fy Arglwydd ymylu nac anghofio."

trans-unit.source: [It is He] who has made for you the earth as a bed [spread out] and inserted therein for you roadways and sent down from the sky, rain and produced thereby categories of various plants.
trans-unit.target: [Mae'n ef] sydd wedi gwneud i chi y ddaear fel gwely [lledaenu] ac ychwanegwyd erthyglau ar gyfer eich ffyrdd a anfonwyd i lawr o'r awyr, glaw a gynhyrchwyd gan categorïau o'r amrywiol blanhigion.

trans-unit.source: Eat [therefrom] and pasture your livestock. Indeed, in that are signs for those of intelligence.
trans-unit.target: Fwyta [thelir] a Tir pori eich da byw. Yn wir, yn yr arwyddion ar gyfer y rheini o ddeallusrwydd.

trans-unit.source: From the earth We created you, and into it We will return you, and from it We will extract you another time.
trans-unit.target: O'r ddaear rydym wedi creu chi, ac ynddo Byddwn yn dychwelyd eich, ac o bydd dyfyniad chi amser arall.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly showed Pharaoh Our signs - all of them - but he denied and refused.
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn sicr yn dangos Ffaro ein arwyddion-pob un ohonynt-ond mae'n gwadu ac yn gwrthod.

trans-unit.source: He said, "Have you come to us to drive us out of our land with your magic, O Moses?
trans-unit.target: Meddai, "yr ydych yn dod atom i ein gyrru allan o'r ein tir gyda eich hud, O Moses?

trans-unit.source: Then we will surely bring you magic like it, so make between us and you an appointment, which we will not fail to keep and neither will you, in a place assigned."
trans-unit.target: Yna byddwn yn sicr ddod â chi hud tebyg iddo, felly gwnewch rhyngom a eich apwyntiad, a ydym ni Bydd methu â Cadw ac nid chi, bydd mewn lle neilltuir."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Your appointment is on the day of the festival when the people assemble at mid-morning."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] dywedodd, "eich penodiad ar ddiwrnod yr ŵyl pan mae pobl yn ymgynnull yn ganol y bore."

trans-unit.source: So Pharaoh went away, put together his plan, and then came [to Moses].
trans-unit.target: Felly mae Ffaro aeth i ffwrdd, lunio ei gynllun, ac yna daeth [i Moses].

trans-unit.source: Moses said to the magicians summoned by Pharaoh, "Woe to you! Do not invent a lie against Allah or He will exterminate you with a punishment; and he has failed who invents [such falsehood]."
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd Moses wrth y magicians gwysio gan Ffaro, "gwae i chi! Nid oes ddyfeisio celwydd erbyn Allah neu bydd iddo ddifodi chi gyda cosb; ac mae ef wedi methu a dyfeisio [o'r fath anwiredd].

trans-unit.source: So they disputed over their affair among themselves and concealed their private conversation.
trans-unit.target: Felly maent yn dadlau dros eu mater ymysg eu hunain a chuddio eu sgwrs breifat.

trans-unit.source: They said, "Indeed, these are two magicians who want to drive you out of your land with their magic and do away with your most exemplary way.
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "yn wir, mae'r rhain yn ddau magicians sydd eisiau eich gyrru allan eich tir gyda eu hud a gwneud i ffwrdd â eich ffordd fwyaf rhagorol.

trans-unit.source: So resolve upon your plan and then come [forward] in line. And he has succeeded today who overcomes."
trans-unit.target: Felly ddatrys ar eich cynllun ac yna gyflwyno [] yn llinell. Ac mae wedi llwyddo heddiw sy'n goresgyn.

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Moses, either you throw or we will be the first to throw."
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "O Moses, naill ai ydych yn taflu neu fydd y cyntaf i daflu."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Rather, you throw." And suddenly their ropes and staffs seemed to him from their magic that they were moving [like snakes].
trans-unit.target: Meddai, "Yn hytrach, ydych yn taflu." Ac yn sydyn eu rhaffau a'u staff yn ymddangos iddo gan eu hud fod yn symud [fel nadredd].

trans-unit.source: And he sensed within himself apprehension, did Moses.
trans-unit.target: A synhwyrodd o fewn ei hun restio, oedd Moses.

trans-unit.source: Allah said, "Fear not. Indeed, it is you who are superior.
trans-unit.target: Allah a dweud, "nid ofn. Yn wir, mae'n yn rhagorach.

trans-unit.source: And throw what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have crafted. What they have crafted is but the trick of a magician, and the magician will not succeed wherever he is."
trans-unit.target: A thaflu beth sydd yn eich llaw dde; Bydd ei llyncu beth maent wedi ei llunio. Beth y maent wedi ei llunio yn ond ni y tric consuriwr, ac y Swynwr yn llwyddo lle bynnag y bo ef.

trans-unit.source: So the magicians fell down in prostration. They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses."
trans-unit.target: Felly mae y magicians yn syrthio i lawr yn prostration. Maent yn dweud, "yr ydym yn credu yn yr Arglwydd Aaron a Moses."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed him before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic. So I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will crucify you on the trunks of palm trees, and you will surely know which of us is more severe in [giving] punishment and more enduring."
trans-unit.target: [Ffaro] yn dweud, "byddwch Credai ef cyn rhoi eich caniatâd. Yn wir, mae eich arweinydd sydd wedi dysgu chi hud. Felly bydd yn sicr yn torri oddi ar eich dwylo a eich traed ar ochrau gwahanol, a bydd yr crucify chi ar foncyffion coed palmwydd, a byddwch yn gwybod yn sicr sydd ohonom yn gosb fwy difrifol ar [a rhoi] ac yn fwy parhaus."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Never will we prefer you over what has come to us of clear proofs and [over] He who created us. So decree whatever you are to decree. You can only decree for this worldly life.
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "byth yn well gennym eich dros beth wedi dod i ni proflenni clir ac [dros] ef a greodd ein. Felly yr ordinhad beth bynnag ydych i ddyfarniad. Gall eich unig ddyfarniad ar gyfer bywyd worldly hwn.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, we have believed in our Lord that He may forgive us our sins and what you compelled us [to do] of magic. And Allah is better and more enduring."
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yr ydym wedi credu yn ein Arglwydd y gallai faddau inni ein pechodau a beth yr ydych yn ein [i'w wneud] o hud gorfodi. A Allah yn well ac yn fwy parhaus.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, whoever comes to his Lord as a criminal - indeed, for him is Hell; he will neither die therein nor live.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, pwy bynnag sy'n dod i ei Arglwydd fel troseddol-yn wir, am iddo ef yn uffern; ef fydd marw ynddo nac yn byw.

trans-unit.source: But whoever comes to Him as a believer having done righteous deeds - for those will be the highest degrees [in position]:
trans-unit.target: Ond pwy bynnag sy'n dod iddo ef fel yn gredwr wedi gwneud gweithredoedd cyfiawn-ar gyfer y rheini yn y graddau uchaf [yn]:

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. And that is the reward of one who purifies himself.
trans-unit.target: Gerddi preswyl parhaol o dan afonydd sy'n llifo, lle eu bod yn cadw fythol. A dyna y gwobrwyo un sy'n buro ei hun.

trans-unit.source: And We had inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants and strike for them a dry path through the sea; you will not fear being overtaken [by Pharaoh] nor be afraid [of drowning]."
trans-unit.target: Ac wedi ein hysbrydoli i Moses, "teithio gan nos gyda 'm gweision a streic ar gyfer eu llwybr sych trwy y môr; chi ni fydd ofn cael eu goddiweddyd [gan Ffaro] nac ofni [boddi]."

trans-unit.source: So Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiers, and there covered them from the sea that which covered them,
trans-unit.target: Felly mae Ffaro iddynt ar drywydd gyda ei filwyr, ac mae eu cynnwys o'r môr sy'n cwmpasu iddynt,

trans-unit.source: And Pharaoh led his people astray and did not guide [them].
trans-unit.target: A Ffaro arwain ei bobl ar gyfeiliorn ac nad oedd arweiniad [eu].

trans-unit.source: O Children of Israel, We delivered you from your enemy, and We made an appointment with you at the right side of the mount, and We sent down to you manna and quails,
trans-unit.target: O plant Israel, ydym wedi cyflawni chi gan eich gelyn, ac rydym yn gwneud apwyntiad gyda chi ar ochr dde y mount, a anfonwyd i lawr i chi manna a sofliâr,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "Eat from the good things with which We have provided you and do not transgress [or oppress others] therein, lest My anger should descend upon you. And he upon whom My anger descends has certainly fallen."
trans-unit.target: [Dweud], "bwyta o'r pethau da y wedi darparu chi ac nid ydym camddefnyddio'u [nac yn gormesu eraill] ynddynt, rhag ofn y dylai fy nicter yn disgyn arnoch. Ac mae ef y mae fy nicter yn disgyn yn sicr wedi gostwng.

trans-unit.source: But indeed, I am the Perpetual Forgiver of whoever repents and believes and does righteousness and then continues in guidance.
trans-unit.target: Ond yn wir, yr wyf y Forgiver parhaus pwy bynnag sydd yn edifarhau ac yn credu a chyfiawnder i yw ac yn parhau wedyn yn y canllawiau.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "And what made you hasten from your people, O Moses?"
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd [Allah], "a beth wnaeth i chi brysuro eich pobl, O Moses?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "They are close upon my tracks, and I hastened to You, my Lord, that You be pleased."
trans-unit.target: Meddai, "maent yn agos ar fy llwybrau, ac yr wyf yn cyflymu i chi, fy Arglwydd, eich bod yn falch."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "But indeed, We have tried your people after you [departed], and the Samiri has led them astray."
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd [Allah], "ond yn wir, yr ydym wedi ceisio eich pobl ar ôl i chi [ymadael], ac wedi y Samiri yn eu harwain ar gyfeiliorn."

trans-unit.source: So Moses returned to his people, angry and grieved. He said, "O my people, did your Lord not make you a good promise? Then, was the time [of its fulfillment] too long for you, or did you wish that wrath from your Lord descend upon you, so you broke your promise [of obedience] to me?"
trans-unit.target: Felly dychwelodd Moses at ei bobl, yn ddig ac alaru. Dywedodd, "O 'm pobl, eich Arglwydd ni wnaeth eich addewid da? Yna, oedd y tro [o flawd ei] rhy hir i chi, neu oeddech am ennyn digofaint hwnnw gan eich Arglwydd yn disgyn arnoch, fel chi a dorrodd eich addewid [ufudddod] i mi? "

trans-unit.source: They said, "We did not break our promise to you by our will, but we were made to carry burdens from the ornaments of the people [of Pharaoh], so we threw them [into the fire], and thus did the Samiri throw."
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd, "oedd nad ydym yn torri ein haddewid i chi gan ein ewyllys, ond roedd yn gwneud i gario beichiau o addurniadau pobl [Ffaro], felly rydym yn eu taflu [i'r tân], ac felly yr oedd y Samiri yn taflu."

trans-unit.source: And he extracted for them [the statue of] a calf which had a lowing sound, and they said, "This is your god and the god of Moses, but he forgot."
trans-unit.target: A oedd ef yn echdynnu iddyn nhw [y cerflun o] lloi a oedd yn cynnwys sain lowing, a dywedodd, "Dyma eich Duw a Duw o Moses, ond anghofiodd."

trans-unit.source: Did they not see that it could not return to them any speech and that it did not possess for them any harm or benefit?
trans-unit.target: Nad oeddent yn gweld na allai ei yn dychwelyd atynt unrhyw araith a oedd yn meddu ar nid iddynt unrhyw niwed neu elwa?

trans-unit.source: And Aaron had already told them before [the return of Moses], "O my people, you are only being tested by it, and indeed, your Lord is the Most Merciful, so follow me and obey my order."
trans-unit.target: Ac Aaron oedd eisoes wrthynt cyn [ddychwelyd Moses], "O fy pobl, dim ond chi yn cael eu profi gan, ac yn wir, eich Arglwydd yn fwyaf Merciful, felly Dilynwch fi ac ufuddhau i 'm Gorchymyn."

trans-unit.source: They said, "We will never cease being devoted to the calf until Moses returns to us."
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "bydd gennym byth yn peidio cael eu neilltuo i y lloi hyd nes y mae Moses yn dychwelyd i ni."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "O Aaron, what prevented you, when you saw them going astray,
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd [Moses], "O Aaron, beth yn rhwystro chi, pan welsoch iddynt mynd ar gyfeiliorn,

trans-unit.source: From following me? Then have you disobeyed my order?"
trans-unit.target: Rhag dilyn mi? Yna wedi eich disobeyed fy drefn?"

trans-unit.source: [Aaron] said, "O son of my mother, do not seize [me] by my beard or by my head. Indeed, I feared that you would say, 'You caused division among the Children of Israel, and you did not observe [or await] my word.' "
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd [Aaron], "mab O fy mam, wneud nid ymafael [mi] gan fy beard neu gan fy mhen. Yn wir, yr wyf yn ofni y byddech yn dweud, ' chi achosodd yr is-adran ymhlith plant Israel, ac na wnaethoch chi arsylwi [neu aros am] fy gair.' "

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "And what is your case, O Samiri?"
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd [Moses], "a beth yw eich achos, O Samiri?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "I saw what they did not see, so I took a handful [of dust] from the track of the messenger and threw it, and thus did my soul entice me."
trans-unit.target: Meddai, "gwelais beth oedd nad ydynt yn gweld, felly cymerodd llond llaw [o lwch] o'r trac y negesydd ac yn ei daflu, ac felly oedd fy enaid yn denu mi."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Then go. And indeed, it is [decreed] for you in [this] life to say, 'No contact.' And indeed, you have an appointment [in the Hereafter] you will not fail to keep. And look at your 'god' to which you remained devoted. We will surely burn it and blow it into the sea with a blast.
trans-unit.target: [Moses] dywedodd, "yn mynd wedyn. Ac yn wir, ei Mae [a ddyfarnwyd] i chi yn y bywyd [hwn] i ddweud, 'Dim cyswllt.' Ac yn wir, mae gennych apwyntiad [yn o hyn ymlaen] Nid byddwch yn methu cadw. Ac edrych ar eich 'Duw' y chi aros wedi'i neilltuo. Byddwn yn sicr yn losgi ac ei chwythu i'r môr gyda chwyth.

trans-unit.source: Your god is only Allah, except for whom there is no deity. He has encompassed all things in knowledge."
trans-unit.target: Eich Duw yn unig Allah, ac eithrio ef nid oes dim Dduwdod. [Wedi ei gwmpasu holl bethau mewn gwybodaeth."

trans-unit.source: Thus, [O Muhammad], We relate to you from the news of what has preceded. And We have certainly given you from Us the Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Felly, [O Muhammad], ydym yn ymwneud â chi gan y newyddion am hyn wedi ei ragflaenu. Ac yr ydym yn sicr wedi rhoi ichi oddi wrthym ni y Qur'an.

trans-unit.source: Whoever turns away from it - then indeed, he will bear on the Day of Resurrection a burden,
trans-unit.target: Pwy bynnag yn troi oddi wrth-yna yn wir, bydd ei gofio ar ddiwrnod yr atgyfodiad yn faich,

trans-unit.source: [Abiding] eternally therein, and evil it is for them on the Day of Resurrection as a load -
trans-unit.target: [Ufudd i'r] fythol ynddo, a drygioni ydyw iddynt ar ddiwrnod yr atgyfodiad fel llwyth-

trans-unit.source: The Day the Horn will be blown. And We will gather the criminals, that Day, blue-eyed.
trans-unit.target: Y diwrnod a bydd chwythu y corn. A bydd yn casglu y troseddwyr, y dydd, Glas-croes.

trans-unit.source: They will murmur among themselves, "You remained not but ten [days in the world]."
trans-unit.target: Bydd eu murmur ymysg eu hunain, "arhosodd chi ddim ond deg [diwrnod yn y byd]."

trans-unit.source: We are most knowing of what they say when the best of them in manner will say, "You remained not but one day."
trans-unit.target: Rydym yn gwybod fwyaf am yr hyn y maent yn ei ddweud pan y gorau ohonynt mewn modd fydd yn dweud, "chi arhosodd nid ond un diwrnod."

trans-unit.source: And they ask you about the mountains, so say, "My Lord will blow them away with a blast.
trans-unit.target: Ac maent yn gofyn ichi am y mynyddoedd, felly yn dweud, "Bydd yr Arglwydd fy chwythu nhw i ffwrdd gyda chwyth.

trans-unit.source: And He will leave the earth a level plain;
trans-unit.target: A bydd yn gadael y ddaear lefel plaen;

trans-unit.source: You will not see therein a depression or an elevation."
trans-unit.target: Ni welwch erthyglau iselder neu gweddlun."

trans-unit.source: That Day, everyone will follow [the call of] the Caller [with] no deviation therefrom, and [all] voices will be stilled before the Most Merciful, so you will not hear except a whisper [of footsteps].
trans-unit.target: Y diwrnod hwnnw, bydd pawb yn dilyn [galwad] y galwr [gyda'r] oes gwyriad thelir, a bydd stilled lleisiau [bob] cyn tosturiol, felly ni fyddwch yn clywed ac eithrio sibrwd [o ôl troed].

trans-unit.source: That Day, no intercession will benefit except [that of] one to whom the Most Merciful has given permission and has accepted his word.
trans-unit.target: Y diwrnod hwnnw, bydd unrhyw intercession o fudd ac eithrio [] un y mae mwyaf tosturiol rhoi caniatâd ac mae wedi derbyn ei air.

trans-unit.source: Allah knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, but they do not encompass it in knowledge.
trans-unit.target: Allah gwyr beth [ar hyn o bryd] cyn iddynt a beth fydd ar ôl iddynt, ond nid ydynt yn cynnwys ei mewn gwybodaeth.

trans-unit.source: And [all] faces will be humbled before the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. And he will have failed who carries injustice.
trans-unit.target: A bydd wynebau [bob] yn teimlwn yn wylaidd yng cyn y byw erioed, y Sustainer o fodolaeth. A bydd wedi methu pwy sy'n gwneud anghyfiawnder.

trans-unit.source: But he who does of righteous deeds while he is a believer - he will neither fear injustice nor deprivation.
trans-unit.target: Ond ef sy'n gwneud y gweithredoedd hoes dabloid tra ei fod yn credu'n-bydd ychwaith ofn anghyfiawnder nac amddifadedd.

trans-unit.source: And thus We have sent it down as an Arabic Qur'an and have diversified therein the warnings that perhaps they will avoid [sin] or it would cause them remembrance.
trans-unit.target: Ac felly yr ydym wedi ei anfon i lawr fel Qur'an Arabeg ac wedi arallgyfeirio ynddo y rhybuddion bod efallai byddant yn osgoi'r [pechod] neu byddai'n achosi eu cofio.

trans-unit.source: So high [above all] is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth. And, [O Muhammad], do not hasten with [recitation of] the Qur'an before its revelation is completed to you, and say, "My Lord, increase me in knowledge."
trans-unit.target: Mor uchel [anad] yw Allah, sofran, y gwir. A [O Muhammad], nid oes brysuro â [lefaru o] y Qur'an cyn ei ddatguddiad wedi'u cwblhau i chi, a dweud, "fy Arglwydd, cynyddu mi mewn gwybodaeth."

trans-unit.source: And We had already taken a promise from Adam before, but he forgot; and We found not in him determination.
trans-unit.target: A oedd eisoes yn gwneud addewid gan Adam cyn, ond anghofiodd; ac ni welsom ni mewn iddo penderfyniad.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except Iblees; he refused.
trans-unit.target: A [sôn am] pan dywedasom i'r angylion, "Prostrate i Adam," ac y maent yn prostrated, ac eithrio Iblees; Gwrthododd.

trans-unit.source: So We said, "O Adam, indeed this is an enemy to you and to your wife. Then let him not remove you from Paradise so you would suffer.
trans-unit.target: Fel y dywedasom, O Adam, yn wir Dyma elyn i chi ac i'ch gwraig. Gadewch iddo nid ydych yn symud o baradwys felly byddai ydych yn dioddef.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is [promised] for you not to be hungry therein or be unclothed.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, ei Mae [addo] na allwch fod yn llwglyd ynddo neu fod yn unclothed.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, you will not be thirsty therein or be hot from the sun."
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, bydd eich nid yn sychedig ynddo neu yn boeth rhag yr haul.

trans-unit.source: Then Satan whispered to him; he said, "O Adam, shall I direct you to the tree of eternity and possession that will not deteriorate?"
trans-unit.target: Yna sibrydodd Satan iddo; Dywedodd, "O Adam, bydd eich cyfeirio at y goeden eternity a meddiant y bydd yn dirywio?"

trans-unit.source: And Adam and his wife ate of it, and their private parts became apparent to them, and they began to fasten over themselves from the leaves of Paradise. And Adam disobeyed his Lord and erred.
trans-unit.target: A bwytaodd Adam a'i wraig, a daeth yn amlwg iddynt yn eu rhannau preifat, a dechreuon nhw Caewch dros eu hunain gan y dail o baradwys. Ac Adam disobeyed ei Arglwydd a ochri.

trans-unit.source: Then his Lord chose him and turned to him in forgiveness and guided [him].
trans-unit.target: Yna mae ei Arglwydd yn dewisodd ef a troi ato mewn maddeuant a harwain [ef].

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Descend from Paradise - all, [your descendants] being enemies to one another. And if there should come to you guidance from Me - then whoever follows My guidance will neither go astray [in the world] nor suffer [in the Hereafter].
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd [Allah], "Descend o baradwys-popeth, [eich ddisgynyddion] yn elynion i un arall. Ac os dylai ddod i ganllawiau ydych oddi wrthyf fi-yna pwy bynnag dilyn fy canllawiau fydd yn mynd ar goll [yn y byd] nac yn dioddef [yn o hyn ymlaen].

trans-unit.source: And whoever turns away from My remembrance - indeed, he will have a depressed life, and We will gather him on the Day of Resurrection blind."
trans-unit.target: Pwy bynnag yn troi oddi wrth fy coffa-yn wir, bydd ganddo fywyd isel a bydd yn casglu iddo ar ddall dydd atgyfodi."

trans-unit.source: He will say, "My Lord, why have you raised me blind while I was [once] seeing?"
trans-unit.target: Bydd yn dweud, "Fy Arglwydd, pam yr ydych wedi codi mi ddall er [unwaith] oedd gweld?"

trans-unit.source: [Allah] will say, "Thus did Our signs come to you, and you forgot them; and thus will you this Day be forgotten."
trans-unit.target: Bydd [Allah] yn dweud, "felly oedd ein arwyddion yn dod i chi, a gwnaethoch anghofio iddynt; ac felly y bydd eich diwrnod hwn anghofio.

trans-unit.source: And thus do We recompense he who transgressed and did not believe in the signs of his Lord. And the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: Ac felly wneud inni ad-dalu iddo sy'n camweddu ac nad oedd yn credu mewn arwyddion ei Arglwydd. A chosbi y o hyn ymlaen yn fwy difrifol a pharhaus yn fwy.

trans-unit.source: Then, has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them as they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs for those of intelligence.
trans-unit.target: Yna, ni Daeth yn amlwg iddynt faint o genedlaethau yn dinistrio ein cyn iddynt wrth iddynt gerdded ymysg eu anheddau? Yn wir yn hynny yn arwyddion ar gyfer y rheini o ddeallusrwydd.

trans-unit.source: And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, punishment would have been an obligation [due immediately], and [if not for] a specified term [decreed].
trans-unit.target: Ac os nad ar gyfer gair a oedd yn rhagflaenu gan eich Arglwydd, cosbi byddai wedi rhwymedigaeth [dyledus ar unwaith], ac [Os nad ar gyfer] [hyd] y tymor penodedig.

trans-unit.source: So be patient over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting; and during periods of the night [exalt Him] and at the ends of the day, that you may be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: Felly fod yn amyneddgar dros beth maen nhw'n ddweud a exalt [Allah] gyda chanmoliaeth eich Arglwydd cyn codi yr haul a cyn ei lleoliad; ac yn ystod cyfnodau y nos [exalt ef] ac ar ben y diwrnod, efallai y byddwch yn fodlon.

trans-unit.source: And do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [some] categories of them, [its being but] the splendor of worldly life by which We test them. And the provision of your Lord is better and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: Ac nid yn ymestyn eich llygaid tuag at hynny a ydym wedi rhoi mwynhad i [rai] categorïau ohonynt, [ei fod ond] y splendor bywyd worldly sy'n eu profi. A darparu eich Arglwydd yn well ac yn fwy parhaus.

trans-unit.source: And enjoin prayer upon your family [and people] and be steadfast therein. We ask you not for provision; We provide for you, and the [best] outcome is for [those of] righteousness.
trans-unit.target: A enjoin gweddi ar eich teulu [a phobl] ac yn gadarn ynddo. Gofynnwn i chi am ddarpariaeth; Rydym yn darparu i chi, a yw canlyniad [gorau] ar gyfer [hynny] chyfiawnder i.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Why does he not bring us a sign from his Lord?" Has there not come to them evidence of what was in the former scriptures?
trans-unit.target: Ac maent yn dweud, "pam nid ei fod yn dod â inni arwydd gan ei Arglwydd?" Mae wedi dod iddynt nid tystiolaeth o'r hyn a oedd yn yr hen ysgrythurau?

trans-unit.source: And if We had destroyed them with a punishment before him, they would have said, "Our Lord, why did You not send to us a messenger so we could have followed Your verses before we were humiliated and disgraced?"
trans-unit.target: Ac os oedd gennym dinistrio eu â chosbi cyn iddo, byddent wedi dweud, "ein Arglwydd, pam nid oeddech wedi anfon i ni negesydd felly rydym wedi dilyn eich penillion cyn inni benisel ac cywilyddio'n?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Each [of us] is waiting; so wait. For you will know who are the companions of the sound path and who is guided."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "Mae pob [ein] yn aros; Felly aros. I chi bydd gwybod pwy yw'r cymdeithion llwybr cadarn ac sy'n cael ei arwain."

trans-unit.source: [The time of] their account has approached for the people, while they are in heedlessness turning away.
trans-unit.target: [Amser] wedi eu cyfrif yn cysylltu â'i bobl, tra maent yn heedlessness i droi i ffwrdd.

trans-unit.source: No mention comes to them anew from their Lord except that they listen to it while they are at play
trans-unit.target: Nid oes sôn am y daw iddynt o'r newydd eu Arglwydd heblaw y mae nhw'n gwrando arno tra eu bod yn chwarae

trans-unit.source: With their hearts distracted. And those who do wrong conceal their private conversation, [saying], "Is this [Prophet] except a human being like you? So would you approach magic while you are aware [of it]?"
trans-unit.target: Gyda eu calonnau tynnu sylw. Mae'r rhai sy'n ei wneud yn anghywir yn cuddio eu sgwrs breifat, [dweud], "yn hwn [Proffwyd] ac eithrio bod dynol fel chi? Felly byddai eich dull hud tra byddwch yn ymwybodol [TG]?"

trans-unit.source: The Prophet said, "My Lord knows whatever is said throughout the heaven and earth, and He is the Hearing, the Knowing."
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd y Proffwyd, "Mae fy Arglwydd yn gwybod beth bynnag a ddywedir drwy gydol y nefoedd a'r ddaear, ac ei fod yn y gwrandawiad, y mae gwybod."

trans-unit.source: But they say, "[The revelation is but] a mixture of false dreams; rather, he has invented it; rather, he is a poet. So let him bring us a sign just as the previous [messengers] were sent [with miracles]."
trans-unit.target: Ond maent yn dweud, "[yn y datguddiad, ond] gymysgedd o'r breuddwydion ffug; yn hytrach, mae ef wedi dyfeisio'r yn hytrach, ef yw bardd. Felly, gadewch iddo ddod â ni'n arwydd union fel anfonwyd blaenorol [negeswyr] [gyda gwyrthiau]."

trans-unit.source: Not a [single] city which We destroyed believed before them, so will they believe?
trans-unit.target: Credai nad Dinas [un] ydym yn dinistrio cyn iddynt, felly byddant yn credu?

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you, [O Muhammad], except men to whom We revealed [the message], so ask the people of the message if you do not know.
trans-unit.target: A anfonwyd gennym ni cyn i chi, [O Muhammad], ac eithrio dynion y datgelwyd [neges], felly gofynnwch i'r bobl y neges os nad ydych yn gwybod.

trans-unit.source: And We did not make the prophets forms not eating food, nor were they immortal [on earth].
trans-unit.target: Ac nad oeddem wedi gwneud ffurflenni nad ydynt yn bwyta bwyd y proffwydi, ac ni oeddent ychwaith anfarwol [ar y ddaear].

trans-unit.source: Then We fulfilled for them the promise, and We saved them and whom We willed and destroyed the transgressors.
trans-unit.target: Yna iddynt Rydym wedi gwireddu'r addewid, ac rydym yn arbed nhw a phwy ydym yn ewyllysio iddi ac yn dinistrio y transgressors.

trans-unit.source: We have certainly sent down to you a Book in which is your mention. Then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: Rydym wedi sicr anfon i lawr at eich llyfr yn sôn am eich. Yna bydd eich nid rheswm?

trans-unit.source: And how many a city which was unjust have We shattered and produced after it another people.
trans-unit.target: A faint o Dinas a oedd yn anghyfiawn Rydym wedi chwalu a gynhyrchwyd ar ôl ei bobl arall.

trans-unit.source: And when its inhabitants perceived Our punishment, at once they fled from it.
trans-unit.target: A pan y gwelai ei drigolion ein cosbi, ar unwaith roedd maent yn dianc ohono.

trans-unit.source: [Some angels said], "Do not flee but return to where you were given luxury and to your homes - perhaps you will be questioned."
trans-unit.target: Mae [rhai angylion a dywedodd], "ni ffoi ond dychwelyd i lle moethus a roddwyd i chi ac yn eich cartrefi-efallai bydd eich holi."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O woe to us! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "O wae i ni! Yn wir, roeddem yn tramgwyddo."

trans-unit.source: And that declaration of theirs did not cease until We made them [as] a harvest [mowed down], extinguished [like a fire].
trans-unit.target: A oedd y datganiad hwnnw o hwy nid i ben hyd nes inni eu gwneud [fel] cynhaeaf [isbriddoedd i lawr], diffodd [fel tân].

trans-unit.source: And We did not create the heaven and earth and that between them in play.
trans-unit.target: Ac na fyddwn yn creu y nefoedd a'r ddaear a bod rhyngddynt yn chwarae.

trans-unit.source: Had We intended to take a diversion, We could have taken it from [what is] with Us - if [indeed] We were to do so.
trans-unit.target: Roedd yn bwriadu cymryd dargyfeiriad, gallem fod wedi mynd yn o'r [hyn] gyda ni-os [yn wir] ydym yn gwneud hynny.

trans-unit.source: Rather, We dash the truth upon falsehood, and it destroys it, and thereupon it departs. And for you is destruction from that which you describe.
trans-unit.target: Yn hytrach, yr ydym yn chwalu y gwir ar anwiredd, ac mae'n difetha ei, a rhydd adael. A ydych yn dinistrio o'r hyn a ddisgrifiwch.

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And those near Him are not prevented by arrogance from His worship, nor do they tire.
trans-unit.target: Iddo ef y perthyn bwy bynnag sydd yn y nefoedd a'r ddaear. A rhai ger ef yn atal haerllugrwydd ar ei addoli, nac yn ei wneud yn eu blino.

trans-unit.source: They exalt [Him] night and day [and] do not slacken.
trans-unit.target: Maent exalt [ei] nos a dydd [ac] Nid oes slacken.

trans-unit.source: Or have men taken for themselves gods from the earth who resurrect [the dead]?
trans-unit.target: Neu wedi dynion drostynt eu hunain y duwiau o'r ddaear sy'n atgyfodi'r [y meirw]?

trans-unit.source: Had there been within the heavens and earth gods besides Allah, they both would have been ruined. So exalted is Allah, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe.
trans-unit.target: Wedi bod yno o fewn y nefoedd a'r ddaear duwiau ar wahân i Allah, byddai'r ddau wedi wedi'i ddifetha. Felly i'w mawrygu yn Allah, Arglwydd yr Orsedd, uwchlaw'r hyn y maent yn ei ddisgrifio.

trans-unit.source: He is not questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned.
trans-unit.target: Yn ei holi am yr hyn y mae'n ei wneud, ond bydd eu cwestiynu.

trans-unit.source: Or have they taken gods besides Him? Say, [O Muhammad], "Produce your proof. This [Qur'an] is the message for those with me and the message of those before me." But most of them do not know the truth, so they are turning away.
trans-unit.target: Neu maent wedi duwiau ar wahân iddo? Dweud, [O Muhammad], "cynhyrchu eich prawf. Hwn [Qur'an] yn y neges ar gyfer y rheini gyda mi ac y neges o'r rheini cyn imi." Ond nid rhan fwyaf ohonynt yn gwybod y gwir, felly maent yn troi i ffwrdd.

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you any messenger except that We revealed to him that, "There is no deity except Me, so worship Me."
trans-unit.target: A anfonwyd gennym ni cyn i chi Mae unrhyw messenger heblaw y datgelwyd iddo fod, "Nid oes unrhyw Dduwdod ac eithrio imi, felly addoli ME"

trans-unit.source: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken a son." Exalted is He! Rather, they are [but] honored servants.
trans-unit.target: Ac maent yn dweud, "y rhan fwyaf wedi Merciful fab." I'w mawrygu yw ef! Yn hytrach, maent yn [ond] gweision honored.

trans-unit.source: They cannot precede Him in word, and they act by His command.
trans-unit.target: Ni ellir eu rhagflaenu ef mewn gair, ac maent yn gweithredu ar ei orchymyn.

trans-unit.source: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, and they cannot intercede except on behalf of one whom He approves. And they, from fear of Him, are apprehensive.
trans-unit.target: Ei fod yn gwybod beth yw [ar hyn o bryd] cyn iddynt a beth fydd ar ôl iddynt, ac ni ellir eu eiriol ac eithrio ar ran un ohonynt ei fod yn cymeradwyo'r. Ac maent, rhag ofn iddo, yn ofnus.

trans-unit.source: And whoever of them should say, "Indeed, I am a god besides Him"- that one We would recompense with Hell. Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: A dylai pwy bynnag ohonynt yn dweud, 'Yn wir, I 'm Duw ar wahân iddo'-y byddai un ydym yn ad-dalu gyda uffern. Felly rydym yn gwneud taliad y tramgwyddo.

trans-unit.source: Have those who disbelieved not considered that the heavens and the earth were a joined entity, and We separated them and made from water every living thing? Then will they not believe?
trans-unit.target: Wedi rhai a ddysgais nid yn ystyried bod y nefoedd a'r ddaear yn endid cydgysylltiedig, ac yr ydym yn eu gwahanu ac yn gwneud o ddŵr bob peth byw? Yna bydd nad ydynt yn credu?

trans-unit.source: And We placed within the earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shift with them, and We made therein [mountain] passes [as] roads that they might be guided.
trans-unit.target: Ac yr ydym mewn sefyllfa o fewn set gadarn mynyddoedd y ddaear, rhag ofn y dylid ei symud gyda nhw, a gwnaethom hynny [Mynydd] tocynnau [fel] ffyrdd y gallai eu harwain.

trans-unit.source: And We made the sky a protected ceiling, but they, from its signs, are turning away.
trans-unit.target: Ac rydym yn gwneud yr awyr nenfwd gwarchodedig, ond gan ei arwyddion, maent, yn troi i ffwrdd.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who created the night and the day and the sun and the moon; all [heavenly bodies] in an orbit are swimming.
trans-unit.target: Ac ef a greodd y nos a dydd a yr haul a lleuad; Mae holl [cyrff heavenly] mewn orbit yn nofio.

trans-unit.source: And We did not grant to any man before you eternity [on earth]; so if you die - would they be eternal?
trans-unit.target: A oedd gennym ni yn grant i unrhyw ddyn cyn eternity chi [ar y ddaear]; Felly os byddwch yn marw-byddent yn tragwyddol?

trans-unit.source: Every soul will taste death. And We test you with evil and with good as trial; and to Us you will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Bydd pob enaid yn blasu marwolaeth. A ydym yn profi chi gyda drwg a da yn y treial; ac i ni y bydd eich dychwelyd.

trans-unit.source: And when those who disbelieve see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one who insults your gods?" And they are, at the mention of the Most Merciful, disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: A pan fydd rhai a chredu yn gweld chi, [O Muhammad], maent yn cymryd chi nid ac eithrio mewn gwawd, [dweud], "Hwn yw'r un sy'n sarhau eich duwiau?" Ac maent yn, yn sôn am tosturiol, disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: Man was created of haste. I will show you My signs, so do not impatiently urge Me.
trans-unit.target: Crëwyd dyn o frys. Bydd dangos fy arwyddion, felly nid ydych yn Me. annog ddiamynedd i chi

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: Ac maent yn dweud, "pryd y mae hwn addewid, os dylai fod yn eirwir?"

trans-unit.source: If those who disbelieved but knew the time when they will not avert the Fire from their faces or from their backs and they will not be aided...
trans-unit.target: Os rhai a ddysgais ond gwybod yr amser pan na bydd maent yn osgoi y tân gan eu hwynebau neu gan eu cefnau a bydd eu cynorthwyo nid...

trans-unit.source: Rather, it will come to them unexpectedly and bewilder them, and they will not be able to repel it, nor will they be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: Yn hytrach, bydd yn dod iddynt yn annisgwyl ac yn bewilder iddynt, ac na fyddant yn gallu ei ddefnyddiwyd, nac bydd eu reprieved.

trans-unit.source: And already were messengers ridiculed before you, but those who mocked them were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Ac eisoes yn negeswyr yn gwawdio cyn i chi, ond roedd rhai sy'n gwawdio eu lyncu'r gan beth roedden nhw'n arfer gwawdio.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who can protect you at night or by day from the Most Merciful?" But they are, from the remembrance of their Lord, turning away.
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "A gall eich amddiffyn yn y nos neu erbyn diwrnod gan fwyaf Merciful?" Ond, maent o coffadwriaeth o eu yr Arglwydd, yn troi i ffwrdd.

trans-unit.source: Or do they have gods to defend them other than Us? They are unable [even] to help themselves, nor can they be protected from Us.
trans-unit.target: Neu a oes ganddynt duwiau eu hamddiffyn heblaw inni? Ni allant [hyd yn oed] i helpu eu hunain, nac y gellir eu diogelu oddi wrthym ni.

trans-unit.source: But, [on the contrary], We have provided good things for these [disbelievers] and their fathers until life was prolonged for them. Then do they not see that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? So it is they who will overcome?
trans-unit.target: Ond, [i'r gwrthwyneb], yr ydym wedi darparu pethau da ar gyfer hyn [disbelievers] a eu tadau nes oedd bywyd estynedig ar eu cyfer. Yna nid ydynt yn gweld ein bod yn gosod ar y tir, ei leihau gan ei ffiniau? Felly mae'n hwy a fydd yn goresgyn?

trans-unit.source: Say, "I only warn you by revelation." But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "dim ond fe'ch rhybuddiaf gan ddatguddiad." Ond nid pobl fyddar yn clywed yr alwad pan maent yn rhybuddio.

trans-unit.source: And if [as much as] a whiff of the punishment of your Lord should touch them, they would surely say, "O woe to us! Indeed, we have been wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Ac os [fel] Dylai naws cosbi eich Arglwydd yn cyffwrdd â hwy, byddent yn sicr yn dweud, "O wae i ni! Yn wir, rydym wedi tramgwyddo."

trans-unit.source: And We place the scales of justice for the Day of Resurrection, so no soul will be treated unjustly at all. And if there is [even] the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it forth. And sufficient are We as accountant.
trans-unit.target: A rhoddwn y graddfeydd cyfiawnder ar gyfer dydd atgyfodi, felly bydd unrhyw enaid yn cael ei drin gam o gwbl. Ac os oes [hyd yn oed] pwysau'r hadau mwstard, byddwn yn ei blaen. Ac yr ydym ddigonol fel cyfrifydd.

trans-unit.source: And We had already given Moses and Aaron the criterion and a light and a reminder for the righteous
trans-unit.target: Ac rydym eisoes wedi Moses ac Aaron y maen prawf a golau a nodyn atgoffa am y righteous

trans-unit.source: Who fear their Lord unseen, while they are of the Hour apprehensive.
trans-unit.target: Sydd yn ofni eu unseen yr Arglwydd, tra y maent yn awr yn bryderus.

trans-unit.source: And this [Qur'an] is a blessed message which We have sent down. Then are you with it unacquainted?
trans-unit.target: A hwn [Qur'an] Mae neges Bendigaid yr ydym wedi'u hanfon i lawr. Yna ydych â unacquainted?

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Abraham his sound judgement before, and We were of him well-Knowing
trans-unit.target: Ac yn sicr rydym wedi rhoi Abraham ei barn gadarn cyn, ac yr oeddem yn gwybod yn dda iddo

trans-unit.source: When he said to his father and his people, "What are these statues to which you are devoted?"
trans-unit.target: Pan ddywedodd ei dad a ei bobl, "Beth yw'r cerfluniau hyn yr ydych yn neilltuo?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We found our fathers worshippers of them."
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "Cawsom ein tadau addolwyr ohonynt."

trans-unit.source: He said, "You were certainly, you and your fathers, in manifest error."
trans-unit.target: Meddai, "Yr oeddech yn sicr, chi a eich tadau, mewn camgymeriad amlwg."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have you come to us with truth, or are you of those who jest?"
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "Ydych chi wedi dod atom gyda gwir, neu a ydych o'r rheini gellwair?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "[No], rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth who created them, and I, to that, am of those who testify.
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd, "[na], yn hytrach, eich Arglwydd yn yr Arglwydd y nefoedd a'r ddaear sydd a'u creodd, ac at hynny, yr wyf, y rhai sydd yn tystio.

trans-unit.source: And [I swear] by Allah, I will surely plan against your idols after you have turned and gone away."
trans-unit.target: A [Tyngaf] gan Allah, bydd siawns gynllunio erbyn eich dod ynghyd ar ôl i chi droi a mynd i ffwrdd.

trans-unit.source: So he made them into fragments, except a large one among them, that they might return to it [and question].
trans-unit.target: Felly eu gwneud yn ddarnau, ac eithrio un mawr yn eu plith, y gallai dychwelyd at ei [a cwestiwn].

trans-unit.source: They said, "Who has done this to our gods? Indeed, he is of the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "sydd wedi gwneud hyn ein duwiau? Yn wir, ei Mae y tramgwyddo."

trans-unit.source: They said, "We heard a young man mention them who is called Abraham."
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "Clywsom dyn ifanc sôn amdanynt a gelwir Abraham."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Then bring him before the eyes of the people that they may testify."
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd, "yna dod ag ef gerbron llygaid y bobl y gall eu dystio."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have you done this to our gods, O Abraham?"
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "Chi wneud hyn ein duwiau, O Abraham?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Rather, this - the largest of them - did it, so ask them, if they should [be able to] speak."
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd, "yn hytrach, hyn-y mwyaf ohonynt-gwnaeth, felly gofynnwch iddynt, os dylent [yn gallu] siarad."

trans-unit.source: So they returned to [blaming] themselves and said [to each other], "Indeed, you are the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Felly maent yn dychwelyd i [beio'r] eu hunain ac yn dweud [i gilydd], "Yn wir, yr ydych y tramgwyddo."

trans-unit.source: Then they reversed themselves, [saying], "You have already known that these do not speak!"
trans-unit.target: Yna gwnaethon nhw wrthdroi'r eu hunain, [dweud], "yr ydych eisoes yn hysbys na rhain yn siarad!"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Then do you worship instead of Allah that which does not benefit you at all or harm you?
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd, "yna wneud eich addoli yn hytrach na Allah y nad yw o fudd i chi ar bob na'i niweidio chi?

trans-unit.source: Uff to you and to what you worship instead of Allah. Then will you not use reason?"
trans-unit.target: Uff i chi ac i beth yr ydych yn ei addoli yn hytrach na Allah. Yna bydd ni ddefnyddio rheswm?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Burn him and support your gods - if you are to act."
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "llosgi ef a gefnogi eich duwiau-os ydych am weithredu.

trans-unit.source: Allah said, "O fire, be coolness and safety upon Abraham."
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd Allah, "O tân, yn oeraidd a diogelwch ar Abraham."

trans-unit.source: And they intended for him harm, but We made them the greatest losers.
trans-unit.target: Ac yr oeddent yn bwriadu iddo ef niwed, ond rydym yn gwneud colled mwyaf iddynt.

trans-unit.source: And We delivered him and Lot to the land which We had blessed for the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn darparu ef a llawer i y tir yr ydym wedi bendithio i fyd.

trans-unit.source: And We gave him Isaac and Jacob in addition, and all [of them] We made righteous.
trans-unit.target: A rhoddodd ef Isaac a Jacob yn ogystal, a'r holl [ohonynt] yr ydym wedi hoes dabloid.

trans-unit.source: And We made them leaders guiding by Our command. And We inspired to them the doing of good deeds, establishment of prayer, and giving of zakah; and they were worshippers of Us.
trans-unit.target: A gwnaethom arweinwyr arweiniol gan ein Gorchymyn. A ydym yn ysbrydoliaeth iddynt wneud gweithredoedd da, sefydlu gweddi, a rhoi zakah; ac roeddent yn addolwyr ohonom.

trans-unit.source: And to Lot We gave judgement and knowledge, and We saved him from the city that was committing wicked deeds. Indeed, they were a people of evil, defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: A llawer yn rhoi barn a gwybodaeth, a ydym yn achubwyd ef gan y ddinas a oedd yn ymrwymo gweithredoedd drwg. Yn wir, maent yn bobl o ddrygioni, defiantly anufudd.

trans-unit.source: And We admitted him into Our mercy. Indeed, he was of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn derbyn ef i drugaredd ein. Yn wir, yr oedd o y righteous.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Noah, when he called [to Allah] before [that time], so We responded to him and saved him and his family from the great flood.
trans-unit.target: A [sôn am] Noah, pan alwodd [i Allah] cyn [hynny], er mwyn inni ymateb iddo a arbed iddo ef a'i deulu gan y llifogydd mawr.

trans-unit.source: And We saved him from the people who denied Our signs. Indeed, they were a people of evil, so We drowned them, all together.
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn achubwyd ef gan y bobl sy'n gwrthod ein arwyddion. Yn wir, roeddent yn bobl o ddrygioni, fel boddi, gyd gyda'i gilydd.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] David and Solomon, when they judged concerning the field - when the sheep of a people overran it [at night], and We were witness to their judgement.
trans-unit.target: A [sôn am] David a Solomon, pan oeddynt yn ymwneud â maes-pan oedd y defaid o bobl dros ei amser ei [nos], ac yr oeddem yn dyst i eu barn.

trans-unit.source: And We gave understanding of the case to Solomon, and to each [of them] We gave judgement and knowledge. And We subjected the mountains to exalt [Us], along with David and [also] the birds. And We were doing [that].
trans-unit.target: Rhoesom dealltwriaeth o achos i Solomon, ac i bob un [ohonynt] rhoesom barn a gwybodaeth. A ydym yn dioddef y mynyddoedd i exalt [ein], ynghyd â David a [hefyd] yr adar. A oedd yn gwneud [hynny].

trans-unit.source: And We taught him the fashioning of coats of armor to protect you from your [enemy in] battle. So will you then be grateful?
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn ei addysgu llunio cotiau armor i i'ch amddiffyn rhag eich brwydr [gelyn yn]. Felly byddwch wedyn yn ddiolchgar?

trans-unit.source: And to Solomon [We subjected] the wind, blowing forcefully, proceeding by his command toward the land which We had blessed. And We are ever, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Ac i Solomon [dioddef ydym] y gwynt, chwythu'r rymus, ei Gorchymyn tuag at y tir yr ydym wedi bendithio yn mynd rhagddo. Ac yr ydym erioed, am yr holl bethau, mae gwybod.

trans-unit.source: And of the devils were those who dived for him and did work other than that. And We were of them a guardian.
trans-unit.target: Ac o y devils oedd y rhai a osgôdd hyn iddo a oedd yn gweithio eraill na hynny. Ac yr oeddem yn eu gwarcheidwad.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful."
trans-unit.target: [Yn sôn am] swydd, pan y galwodd at ei Arglwydd, "yn wir, wedi adfyd yn cyffwrdd â mi, a ydych yn fwyaf Merciful o y tosturiol."

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him and removed what afflicted him of adversity. And We gave him [back] his family and the like thereof with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for the worshippers [of Allah].
trans-unit.target: Felly rydym yn ymateb iddo a dileu beth dioddef ef o adfyd. A rhoesom iddo [yn ôl] ei deulu ac yn y blaen ohonynt gyda hwy fel drugaredd oddi wrthym ni ac atgoffa ar gyfer addolwyr [o Allah].

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Ishmael and Idrees and Dhul-Kifl; all were of the patient.
trans-unit.target: [Yn sôn am] Ishmael a Idrees a Dhul-Kifl; Roedd pob un yn y claf.

trans-unit.source: And We admitted them into Our mercy. Indeed, they were of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn eu derbyn i ein drugaredd. Yn wir, yr oeddent o y righteous.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the man of the fish, when he went off in anger and thought that We would not decree [anything] upon him. And he called out within the darknesses, "There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: A [sôn am] y dyn o'r pysgod, pan aeth i ffwrdd mewn dicter a meddwl y byddai inni ochel [Dim] arno. A galwodd o fewn y darknesses, "Nid oes unrhyw Dduwdod ac eithrio chi; i'w mawrygu ydych. Yn wir, bu o y tramgwyddo."

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him and saved him from the distress. And thus do We save the believers.
trans-unit.target: Er mwyn inni ymateb iddo a achubwyd ef o drallod. Ac felly yr ydym yn arbed y credinwyr.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Zechariah, when he called to his Lord, "My Lord, do not leave me alone [with no heir], while you are the best of inheritors."
trans-unit.target: A [sôn am] Zechariah, pan alwodd i ei Arglwydd, "fy Arglwydd, peidiwch â gadael imi unig [heb adael etifedd], tra byddwch yn y gorau o'r hailgyflogi."

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him, and We gave to him John, and amended for him his wife. Indeed, they used to hasten to good deeds and supplicate Us in hope and fear, and they were to Us humbly submissive.
trans-unit.target: Felly, bu inni ymateb iddo, a rhoddodd iddo John, ac y'i diwygiwyd iddo ef a'i wraig. Yn wir, defnyddiwyd i brysuro i weithredoedd da a supplicate ein gobaith yn ofn, ac roeddent i ni yn ostyngedig yn ostyngedig.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the one who guarded her chastity, so We blew into her [garment] through Our angel [Gabriel], and We made her and her son a sign for the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A sôn yr un sy'n gwarchod ei diweirdeb, felly rydym yn chwythu i [ddilledyn] drwy ein angel [Gabriel], a gwnaethom hi a'i mab arwydd am fyd [am].

trans-unit.source: Indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so worship Me.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, eich crefydd, dyma un grefydd, ac yr wyf yn eich Arglwydd, felly addoli Me.

trans-unit.source: And [yet] they divided their affair among themselves, [but] all to Us will return.
trans-unit.target: A [eto] Rhannodd eu mater ymysg eu hunain, [ond] Bydd oll i ni ddychwelyd.

trans-unit.source: So whoever does righteous deeds while he is a believer - no denial will there be for his effort, and indeed We, of it, are recorders.
trans-unit.target: Felly pwy bynnag sy'n gwneud gweithredoedd hoes dabloid tra ei fod yn credu'n-fydd yn cael ei gwrthod am ei ymdrech, ac yn wir yr ydym, o, yn recordio.

trans-unit.source: And there is prohibition upon [the people of] a city which We have destroyed that they will [ever] return
trans-unit.target: Ac nid oes gwaharddiad ar [bobl] dinas sydd wedi dinistrio'r y byddant yn dychwelyd [erioed]

trans-unit.source: Until when [the dam of] Gog and Magog has been opened and they, from every elevation, descend
trans-unit.target: Hyd nes pryd [yr argae o] Gog a Magog wedi agor ac mae iddynt, o bob drychiad, ddisgyn

trans-unit.source: And [when] the true promise has approached; then suddenly the eyes of those who disbelieved will be staring [in horror, while they say], "O woe to us; we had been unmindful of this; rather, we were wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: A [wrth] yr addewid wir wedi cysylltu â; yna yn sydyn bydd llygaid y rhai a ddysgais yn syllu [mewn arswyd, tra maent yn dweud], "O wae i ni; Rydym wedi bod yn unmindful o hyn; yn hytrach, roeddem yn tramgwyddo."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, you [disbelievers] and what you worship other than Allah are the firewood of Hell. You will be coming to [enter] it.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, chi [disbelievers] a beth yr ydych yn ei addoli eraill na Allah yn y coed tân uffern. Fyddwch yn dod i [Rhowch].

trans-unit.source: Had these [false deities] been [actual] gods, they would not have come to it, but all are eternal therein.
trans-unit.target: Wedi hyn [duwdod ffug] [gwir] duwiau, na fyddent wedi dod ato, ond pob un yn tragwyddol ynddo.

trans-unit.source: For them therein is heavy sighing, and they therein will not hear.
trans-unit.target: Iddynt hwy ynddo yn sighing trwm, ac ynddo na byddant yn clywed.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those for whom the best [reward] has preceded from Us - they are from it far removed.
