trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y rheini ar eu cyfer y gorau [gwobr] wedi rhagflaenu oddi wrthym ni-maent yn o bell.

trans-unit.source: They will not hear its sound, while they are, in that which their souls desire, abiding eternally.
trans-unit.target: Ni byddant yn clywed ei sŵn, er eu bod, yn hynny y mae eu heneidiau yn awydd, ufudd i'r fythol.

trans-unit.source: They will not be grieved by the greatest terror, and the angels will meet them, [saying], "This is your Day which you have been promised" -
trans-unit.target: Ni bydd iddynt yn alaru gan arswyd mwyaf, a bydd yr angylion yn cyfarfod iddynt, [dweud], "Dyma eich diwrnod a addawyd gennych"-

trans-unit.source: The Day when We will fold the heaven like the folding of a [written] sheet for the records. As We began the first creation, We will repeat it. [That is] a promise binding upon Us. Indeed, We will do it.
trans-unit.target: Y dydd pan y bydd Plygwch y nefoedd fel y plygu o [] taflen ar gyfer y cofnodion. Wrth i ni ddechrau creu cyntaf, bydd yn ei ailadrodd. [Mae] rhwymol addewid ar ein gwarthaf. Yn wir, byddwn yn gwneud hynny.

trans-unit.source: And We have already written in the book [of Psalms] after the [previous] mention that the land [of Paradise] is inherited by My righteous servants.
trans-unit.target: Ac yr ydym eisoes wedi ysgrifennu yn y llyfr [o Salmau] ar ôl sôn am [blaenorol] a bod y tir [o baradwys] yn cael ei etifeddu gan fy weision hoes dabloid.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, in this [Qur'an] is notification for a worshipping people.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yn hwn [Qur'an] yn hysbysu pobl worshipping.

trans-unit.source: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a mercy to the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Ac nad ydym wedi anfon chi, [O Muhammad], ac eithrio fel drugaredd i'r byd.

trans-unit.source: Say, "It is only revealed to me that your god is but one God; so will you be Muslims [in submission to Him]?"
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "yw ei unig datgelu i mi fod eich Duw ond un Duw; Felly chi fydd Moslemiaid [yn y cyflwyniad iddo]?"

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, then say, "I have announced to [all of] you equally. And I know not whether near or far is that which you are promised.
trans-unit.target: Ond os y maent yn troi i ffwrdd, wedyn yn dweud, "yr wyf wedi cyhoeddi i [ohonynt] ydych yr un mor. A gwn na boed agos neu bell yw'r hyn a addawyd gennych.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, He knows what is declared of speech, and He knows what you conceal.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, ei fod yn gwybod beth yw datgan araith, ac ei fod yn gwybod beth yr ydych yn ei guddio.

trans-unit.source: And I know not; perhaps it is a trial for you and enjoyment for a time."
trans-unit.target: A gwn na; Efallai ei bod yn treial i chi a mwynhad am amser."

trans-unit.source: [The Prophet] has said, "My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe."
trans-unit.target: [Y Proffwyd] ddywedodd, "fy Arglwydd, y barnwr [rhyngom] mewn gwirionedd. A ein Arglwydd y mwyaf tosturiol, yr un a gofynnir am ei gymorth erbyn hyn a ddisgrifiwch.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, fear your Lord. Indeed, the convulsion of the [final] Hour is a terrible thing.
trans-unit.target: O dynolryw, yn ofni eich Arglwydd. Yn wir, peth ofnadwy yw y ' ffit ' yr awr [terfynol].

trans-unit.source: On the Day you see it every nursing mother will be distracted from that [child] she was nursing, and every pregnant woman will abort her pregnancy, and you will see the people [appearing] intoxicated while they are not intoxicated; but the punishment of Allah is severe.
trans-unit.target: Ar ddiwrnod eich weld bydd pob mam nyrsio yn tynnu oddi wrth [plant] hi oedd nyrsio, a bydd pob menyw feichiog yn erthylu ei beichiogrwydd, a byddwch yn gweld y bobl [ymddangos] dan ddylanwad er nad ydynt yn meddwi; ond cosbi Allah yn ddifrifol.

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge and follows every rebellious devil.
trans-unit.target: Ac ef a anghydfodau ynghylch Allah heb wybod a dilyn pob diafol gwrthryfelgar yn yn y bobl.

trans-unit.source: It has been decreed for every devil that whoever turns to him - he will misguide him and will lead him to the punishment of the Blaze.
trans-unit.target: Wedi wedi'u dyfarnu ar gyfer pob diafol y bwy bynnag yn troi ato-bydd misguide ef ac bydd iddo arwain at gosbi y tanbaid.

trans-unit.source: O People, if you should be in doubt about the Resurrection, then [consider that] indeed, We created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, and then from a lump of flesh, formed and unformed - that We may show you. And We settle in the wombs whom We will for a specified term, then We bring you out as a child, and then [We develop you] that you may reach your [time of] maturity. And among you is he who is taken in [early] death, and among you is he who is returned to the most decrepit [old] age so that he knows, after [once having] knowledge, nothing. And you see the earth barren, but when We send down upon it rain, it quivers and swells and grows [something] of every beautiful kind.
trans-unit.target: O bobl, os oes gennych Dylech fod yn sicr am yr atgyfodiad, yna [ystyried hynny] yn wir, rydym yn creu chi o'r llwch, ac yna o ostyngiad sberm, yna o clinging clot, ac yna o lwmp o gnawd, ffurfio a rhyddhau carthion anffurfiedig-y gall ddangos ichi. A ydym yn ymgartrefu yn wombs y byddwn am dymor penodedig, yna rydym yn eich dwyn fel plentyn, ac yna [Rydym yn datblygu eich] Efallai byddwch yn cyrraedd eich aeddfedrwydd [amser]. A eich plith yn ef sydd yn cymryd yn marwolaeth [cynnar], ac ef a dychwelir oed [hen] mwyaf atgas fel y gwyr ef, ar ôl [cael unwaith] eich plith yw gwybodaeth, dim. A ydych yn gweld y ddaear hesb, ond pan anfonwn i lawr ar yn bwrw glaw, mae'n quivers a chwyddo ac yn tyfu [rhywbeth] o bob math hardd.

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah is the Truth and because He gives life to the dead and because He is over all things competent
trans-unit.target: Mae hynny'n oherwydd y gwir yw Allah ac oherwydd mae'n rhoi bywyd i'r meirw ac oherwydd ei fod dros holl bethau yn gymwys

trans-unit.source: And [that they may know] that the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - and that Allah will resurrect those in the graves.
trans-unit.target: Ac y maent yn adnabod] y mae yr awr wedi dod-oes amheuaeth am hynny-ac bod Allah atgyfodi'r rhai yn y Beddau.

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge or guidance or an enlightening book [from Him],
trans-unit.target: Ac ef a anghydfodau ynghylch Allah heb wybodaeth neu arweiniad neu lyfr addysgiadol [oddi wrtho], y bobl yn

trans-unit.source: Twisting his neck [in arrogance] to mislead [people] from the way of Allah. For him in the world is disgrace, and We will make him taste on the Day of Resurrection the punishment of the Burning Fire [while it is said],
trans-unit.target: Troi ei wddf [yn haerllugrwydd] i gamarwain [pobl] o'r ffordd o Allah. Iddo yn y byd yn warthus, a byddwn yn gwneud iddo flas ar dydd atgyfodi y gosb y tân llosgi [tra dywedir],

trans-unit.source: "That is for what your hands have put forth and because Allah is not ever unjust to [His] servants."
trans-unit.target: "Mae hynny ar gyfer beth y mae eich dwylo wedi ei rhoi ymlaen ac oherwydd nid yw Allah erioed anghyfiawn i weision [ei]."

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who worships Allah on an edge. If he is touched by good, he is reassured by it; but if he is struck by trial, he turns on his face [to the other direction]. He has lost [this] world and the Hereafter. That is what is the manifest loss.
trans-unit.target: Ac ef a worships Allah ar ymyl y bobl yn. Os yw ei fod yn cyffwrdd gan da, ei fod yn fodlon ond os yw ef yn trawyd gan treial, mae ef yn troi ar ei wyneb [yn y cyfeiriad arall]. Wedi colli y byd [hwn] a y o hyn ymlaen. Dyna beth yw colli amlwg.

trans-unit.source: He invokes instead of Allah that which neither harms him nor benefits him. That is what is the extreme error.
trans-unit.target: Mae ef yn rhyw yn hytrach na Allah y na niweidio ef nac o fudd iddo. Dyna beth yw y gwall eithafol.

trans-unit.source: He invokes one whose harm is closer than his benefit - how wretched the protector and how wretched the associate.
trans-unit.target: Mae ef yn rhyw un eu niwed yn agosach nag y budd-dal ei-sut truenus y protector a sut truenus y cyswllt.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. Indeed, Allah does what He intends.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, bydd Allah yn cyfaddef rheini sy'n credu ac yn gwneud gweithredoedd cyfiawn i gerddi o dan y llif afonydd. Yn wir, mae'r Allah yw beth y mae'n bwriadu.

trans-unit.source: Whoever should think that Allah will not support [Prophet Muhammad] in this world and the Hereafter - let him extend a rope to the ceiling, then cut off [his breath], and let him see: will his effort remove that which enrages [him]?
trans-unit.target: Dylai pwy bynnag sy'n credu na bydd Allah yn cefnogi [Proffwyd Muhammad] yn y byd hwn ac o hyn ymlaen-gadewch iddo ymestyn rhaff i'r nenfwd, yna torrwch y [ei anadl], a gadewch iddo weld: bydd ei ymdrech yn dileu'r hyn sydd enrages [ei]?

trans-unit.source: And thus have We sent the Qur'an down as verses of clear evidence and because Allah guides whom He intends.
trans-unit.target: Ac felly yr ydym wedi anfon y Qur'an i lawr fel penillion o dystiolaeth glir ac oherwydd mae'r Allah yn tywys y mae'n bwriadu.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and those who were Jews and the Sabeans and the Christians and the Magians and those who associated with Allah - Allah will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, over all things, Witness.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y rhai sydd wedi credu a rhai a oedd yn Iddewon ac yn y Sabeans ac y Cristnogion ac y Magians a'r rheini sy'n gysylltiedig â Allah-bydd Allah yn barnu rhyngddynt ar dydd atgyfodi. Yn wir Allah yw, dros holl bethau, tyst.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that to Allah prostrates whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth and the sun, the moon, the stars, the mountains, the trees, the moving creatures and many of the people? But upon many the punishment has been justified. And he whom Allah humiliates - for him there is no bestower of honor. Indeed, Allah does what He wills.
trans-unit.target: Nid ydych yn gweld bod i Allah yn prostrates pwy bynnag sydd yn y nefoedd a phwy bynnag fydd ar y ddaear yr haul, y lleuad, y sêr, y mynyddoedd, y coed, y creaduriaid symud a llawer o bobl? Ond ar hyn o bryd mae y gosb wedi ei gyfiawnhau. Ac AU bwy mae'r Allah yn humiliates-ef nid oes dim bestower o fraint. Yn wir, mae Allah yw'r hyn a wills ef.

trans-unit.source: These are two adversaries who have disputed over their Lord. But those who disbelieved will have cut out for them garments of fire. Poured upon their heads will be scalding water
trans-unit.target: Mae'r rhain yn wrthwynebwyr dau sydd wedi dadlau dros ei Arglwydd. Ond rhai a ddysgais bydd wedi torri allan ar gyfer dillad iddynt tân. Roddodd ar bydd eu pennau yn sgaldio dŵr

trans-unit.source: By which is melted that within their bellies and [their] skins.
trans-unit.target: Y mae wedi'i doddi sydd o fewn eu boliau a [eu] crwyn.

trans-unit.source: And for [striking] them are maces of iron.
trans-unit.target: Ac ar gyfer [drawiadol] hwy yn maces o haearn.

trans-unit.source: Every time they want to get out of Hellfire from anguish, they will be returned to it, and [it will be said], "Taste the punishment of the Burning Fire!"
trans-unit.target: Bob tro y dymunant gael allan o Hellfire o'r gofid, bydd dychwelyd iddo, ac [bydd dweud], "blas y gosb y tân llosgi!"

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearl, and their garments therein will be silk.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, bydd Allah yn cyfaddef rheini sy'n credu ac yn gwneud gweithredoedd cyfiawn i gerddi o dan y llif afonydd. Bydd eu addurno'r ynddo gyda breichledau o aur a pearl, ac eu gwisgoedd ynddo fydd silk.

trans-unit.source: And they had been guided [in worldly life] to good speech, and they were guided to the path of the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: Maent dan arweiniad [mewn bywyd worldly] i araith dda, ac yn eu harwain i llwybr y Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have disbelieved and avert [people] from the way of Allah and [from] al-Masjid al-Haram, which We made for the people - equal are the resident therein and one from outside; and [also] whoever intends [a deed] therein of deviation [in religion] or wrongdoing - We will make him taste of a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y rheini sydd wedi ddysgais ac osgoi [pobl] o'r ffordd o Allah ac o al-Masjid al-Haram, a wnaed ar gyfer pobl-yn equal y preswylydd ynddynt ac un o'r tu allan; a [hefyd] pwy bynnag sy'n bwriadu [Gweithred] ynddynt gwyriad [mewn crefydd] neu gamwedd-bydd yn gwneud iddo flas o gosb poenus.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We designated for Abraham the site of the House, [saying], "Do not associate anything with Me and purify My House for those who perform Tawaf and those who stand [in prayer] and those who bow and prostrate.
trans-unit.target: A [sôn, O Muhammad], pan ydym yn dynodi ar gyfer Abraham y safle y Tŷ, [dweud], "wneud nid cysylltu unrhyw beth â mi a puro'r fy nhŷ ar gyfer rhai sy'n perfformio Tawaf a rhai sy'n sefyll [mewn gweddi] a'r rhai sy'n plygu ac prostrate.

trans-unit.source: And proclaim to the people the Hajj [pilgrimage]; they will come to you on foot and on every lean camel; they will come from every distant pass -
trans-unit.target: A ddatgan i bobl yr Hajj [Phererindod]; byddant yn dod i chi ar droed ac ar bob camel lean; byddant yn dod o bob tocyn pell-

trans-unit.source: That they may witness benefits for themselves and mention the name of Allah on known days over what He has provided for them of [sacrificial] animals. So eat of them and feed the miserable and poor.
trans-unit.target: Y gall tyst manteision drostynt eu hunain a sôn am yr enw Allah ar ddiwrnodau hysbys dros beth y mae wedi'i ddarparu ar eu cyfer o anifeiliaid [aberthol]. Felly fwyta ohonynt a bwydo diflas a gwael.

trans-unit.source: Then let them end their untidiness and fulfill their vows and perform Tawaf around the ancient House."
trans-unit.target: Yna gadewch iddynt eu flerwch yn dod i ben a chyflawni eu addo a chyflawni Tawaf o gwmpas y Tŷ hynafol."

trans-unit.source: That [has been commanded], and whoever honors the sacred ordinances of Allah - it is best for him in the sight of his Lord. And permitted to you are the grazing livestock, except what is recited to you. So avoid the uncleanliness of idols and avoid false statement,
trans-unit.target: Bod [wedi bod yn gyfrifol am], a pwy bynnag honors erlyniadau sanctaidd Allah-mae'n gorau iddo yn y golwg ar ei Arglwydd. Ac a ganiateir i chi bori da byw, ac eithrio beth yw roi i chi. Felly osgoi uncleanliness o dod ynghyd ac osgoi datganiad ffug,

trans-unit.source: Inclining [only] to Allah, not associating [anything] with Him. And he who associates with Allah - it is as though he had fallen from the sky and was snatched by the birds or the wind carried him down into a remote place.
trans-unit.target: Inclining [ond] i Allah, nid cyfeillachu [Dim] gydag ef. Ac ef a associates gydag Allah-Mae fel petai wedi disgyn o'r awyr ac oedd cipio gan yr adar neu roedd y gwynt yn dwyn ef i lawr i fod yn lle o bell.

trans-unit.source: That [is so]. And whoever honors the symbols of Allah - indeed, it is from the piety of hearts.
trans-unit.target: Y [yn hynny]. A pwy bynnag honors symbolau Allah-yn wir, mae'n o piety calonnau.

trans-unit.source: For you the animals marked for sacrifice are benefits for a specified term; then their place of sacrifice is at the ancient House.
trans-unit.target: I chi yw'r anifeiliaid a marcio am aberth yn budd-daliadau am gyfnod penodedig; wedyn yn eu lle o aberth y Tŷ hynafol.

trans-unit.source: And for all religion We have appointed a rite [of sacrifice] that they may mention the name of Allah over what He has provided for them of [sacrificial] animals. For your god is one God, so to Him submit. And, [O Muhammad], give good tidings to the humble [before their Lord]
trans-unit.target: Ac ar gyfer pob crefydd, rydym wedi penodi rite [o aberth] y gallai sôn am enw Allah dros beth y mae wedi'i ddarparu ar eu cyfer o anifeiliaid [aberthol]. Ar gyfer eich Duw yn un Duw, felly iddo gyflwyno. A [Muhammad O], roi tidings da i ostyngedig [cyn eu Arglwydd]

trans-unit.source: Who, when Allah is mentioned, their hearts are fearful, and [to] the patient over what has afflicted them, and the establishers of prayer and those who spend from what We have provided them.
trans-unit.target: Sydd, pan grybwyllir Allah, eu calonnau yn ofnus, a [i] y claf dros beth wedi blino arnynt, a establishers y weddi a'r rheini sy'n treulio o beth yr ydym wedi ei darparu iddynt.

trans-unit.source: And the camels and cattle We have appointed for you as among the symbols of Allah; for you therein is good. So mention the name of Allah upon them when lined up [for sacrifice]; and when they are [lifeless] on their sides, then eat from them and feed the needy and the beggar. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may be grateful.
trans-unit.target: A'r camelod a gwartheg yr ydym wedi penodi i chi ymhlith y symbolau Allah; i chi ynddo yn dda. Felly yn sôn am yr enw Allah arnynt pan Condemniwyd [am aberth]; a pan fyddant [ddifywyd] ar ei ochr, fwyta oddi wrthynt ac yn bwydo i'r anghenus ac y curo. Felly, mae yn destun iddynt i chi y gallech fod yn ddiolchgar.

trans-unit.source: Their meat will not reach Allah, nor will their blood, but what reaches Him is piety from you. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may glorify Allah for that [to] which He has guided you; and give good tidings to the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Ni fydd eu cig yn cyrraedd Allah, nac bydd eu gwaed, ond beth yn cyrraedd iddo yw piety gennych. Felly wedi dioddef iddynt i chi eich bod efallai fawrygu'r Allah ar gyfer hwnnw [i] y mae wedi'i dywys chi; a rhoi tidings da phoenwn da.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah defends those who have believed. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone treacherous and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae'r Allah yn amddiffyn y rhai sydd wedi credu. Yn wir, nid Allah hoffi pawb hynod beryglus a anniolchgar.

trans-unit.source: Permission [to fight] has been given to those who are being fought, because they were wronged. And indeed, Allah is competent to give them victory.
trans-unit.target: Rhoddwyd caniatâd [i ymladd] i'r rhai sydd yn cael ei ymladd, oherwydd yr oedd yn eu cam. Ac yn wir, yn gymwys i roi eu buddugoliaeth Allah.

trans-unit.source: [They are] those who have been evicted from their homes without right - only because they say, "Our Lord is Allah." And were it not that Allah checks the people, some by means of others, there would have been demolished monasteries, churches, synagogues, and mosques in which the name of Allah is much mentioned. And Allah will surely support those who support Him. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: [Maent] rhai sydd wedi cael eu troi allan o'u cartrefi heb hawl-yn unig oherwydd maent yn dweud, "ein Arglwydd yw Allah." Ac oni bai bod Allah yn gwiriadau y bobl, rhai drwy gyfrwng eraill, byddai wedi dymchwel mynachlogydd, eglwysi, synagogau, a mosgiau yn enw Allah llawer sonnir. A bydd Allah yn sicr yn cefnogi rhai sy'n ei gefnogi. Yn wir, yw Allah Powerful a Exalted yn efallai.

trans-unit.source: [And they are] those who, if We give them authority in the land, establish prayer and give zakah and enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong. And to Allah belongs the outcome of [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: [Ac yn] rhai sydd, os ydym yn rhoi iddynt awdurdod ar y tir, sefydlu gweddi a rhoi zakah a enjoin beth sy'n iawn a a'n gwaredo beth sydd o'i le. Ac i Allah yn perthyn y canlyniad o faterion [bob].

trans-unit.source: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad] - so, before them, did the people of Noah and 'Aad and Thamud deny [their prophets],
trans-unit.target: Ac os maent yn gwadu'r chi, [O Muhammad]-felly, cyn iddynt, yr oedd y bobl o Noah a ' Mae Aad a Thamud yn gwadu [eu] broffwydi, y rhai

trans-unit.source: And the people of Abraham and the people of Lot
trans-unit.target: A pobl Abraham a phobl llawer

trans-unit.source: And the inhabitants of Madyan. And Moses was denied, so I prolonged enjoyment for the disbelievers; then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My reproach.
trans-unit.target: A thrigolion Madyan. A gwrthodwyd Moses, fel ymestyn fy mwynhad ar gyfer y disbelievers; ac yna rwy'n yn hatafaelu iddynt, a sut oedd [ofnadwy] fy gwbl ddi-fai.

trans-unit.source: And how many a city did We destroy while it was committing wrong - so it is [now] fallen into ruin - and [how many] an abandoned well and [how many] a lofty palace.
trans-unit.target: A faint o Dinas oedd yn dinistrio tra oedd ei ymrwymo anghywir-felly mae [nawr] yn syrthio adfail-a [sawl] a adawyd dda a [sawl] Palas canmoladwy.

trans-unit.source: So have they not traveled through the earth and have hearts by which to reason and ears by which to hear? For indeed, it is not eyes that are blinded, but blinded are the hearts which are within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: Felly nid ydynt wedi un trwy'r Ddaear a rhaid calonnau y rheswm a glustiau i glywed? Ar gyfer yn wir, nid yw'n llygaid y mae wedi'u dallu, ond wedi'u dallu eu calonnau sydd o fewn y bronnau.

trans-unit.source: And they urge you to hasten the punishment. But Allah will never fail in His promise. And indeed, a day with your Lord is like a thousand years of those which you count.
trans-unit.target: Ac maent yn annog chi i brysuro y gosb. Ond bydd Allah yn methu byth yn ei addewid. Ac yn wir, yn y dydd gyda eich Arglwydd fel mil o flynyddoedd y rhai yr ydych yn cyfrif.

trans-unit.source: And for how many a city did I prolong enjoyment while it was committing wrong. Then I seized it, and to Me is the [final] destination.
trans-unit.target: Ac ar gyfer faint o Dinas oedd ymestyn mwynhad tra oedd ei ymrwymo yn anghywir. Yna yn hatafaelu, ac i mi yn y [daith].

trans-unit.source: Say, "O people, I am only to you a clear warner."
trans-unit.target: Yn dweud, 'O bobl, I 'm dim ond i chi warner glir.'

trans-unit.source: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - for them is forgiveness and noble provision.
trans-unit.target: A'r rhai sydd wedi credu a wneud gweithredoedd cyfiawn-iddynt yw maddeuant a darpariaeth aruchel.

trans-unit.source: But the ones who strove against Our verses, [seeking] to cause failure - those are the companions of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Ond y rhai sy'n ymdrechu yn erbyn ein penillion, [am] i achosi methiant-rhai yn chymdeithion Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: And We did not send before you any messenger or prophet except that when he spoke [or recited], Satan threw into it [some misunderstanding]. But Allah abolishes that which Satan throws in; then Allah makes precise His verses. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Ac na fyddem yn anfon cyn i chi unrhyw negesydd neu Proffwyd heblaw y wrth iddo siarad [neu roi], taflodd Satan i mewn iddo [rhywfaint o gamddealltwriaeth]. Ond mae'r Allah yn diddymu y mae Satan yn cael ei daflu yna Allah yn gwneud union ei penillion. Ac Allah yn gwybod a Wise.

trans-unit.source: [That is] so He may make what Satan throws in a trial for those within whose hearts is disease and those hard of heart. And indeed, the wrongdoers are in extreme dissension.
trans-unit.target: [Y mae] fel y gall ei wneud beth y mae Satan yn taflu mewn treial ar gyfer y rhai o fewn eu calonnau yn glefyd a rhai caled o galon. Ac yn wir, y tramgwyddo ar gynnen eithafol.

trans-unit.source: And so those who were given knowledge may know that it is the truth from your Lord and [therefore] believe in it, and their hearts humbly submit to it. And indeed is Allah the Guide of those who have believed to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: Ac felly gall rheini y rhoddwyd gwybodaeth gwybod bod mae'n y gwir gan eich Arglwydd a [felly] yn credu ynddo, ac mae eu calonnau yn ostyngedig iddo. Ac yn wir yw Allah y canllaw y rhai sydd wedi credu i lwybr syth.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieve will not cease to be in doubt of it until the Hour comes upon them unexpectedly or there comes to them the punishment of a barren Day.
trans-unit.target: Ond bydd rhai a chredu yn peidio â fod yn sicr ohono hyd nes y daw yr awr iddynt annisgwyl neu daw iddynt y gosb o ddiwrnod hesb.

trans-unit.source: [All] sovereignty that Day is for Allah; He will judge between them. So they who believed and did righteous deeds will be in the Gardens of Pleasure.
trans-unit.target: [Bob] sofraniaeth y dydd yw Allah; Bydd ef yn barnu rhyngddynt. Felly bydd hwy sydd yn credu a oedd gweithredoedd cyfiawn yn y gerddi pleser.

trans-unit.source: And they who disbelieved and denied Our signs - for those there will be a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: A hwy sydd yn gwadu ein arwyddion-ar gyfer rhai fydd cosb bychanol a ddysgais.

trans-unit.source: And those who emigrated for the cause of Allah and then were killed or died - Allah will surely provide for them a good provision. And indeed, it is Allah who is the best of providers.
trans-unit.target: A'r rhai sy'n ymfudo am achos Allah ac yna eu lladd neu farw-Allah bydd siawns ddarparu ar eu cyfer yn ddarpariaeth dda. Ac yn wir, mae'n Allah pwy yw'r gorau o ddarparwyr.

trans-unit.source: He will surely cause them to enter an entrance with which they will be pleased, and indeed, Allah is Knowing and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: Bydd ef yn sicr yn achosi iddynt ymuno â mynedfa y byddant yn falch, ac yn wir, Allah yn gwybod a Forbearing.

trans-unit.source: That [is so]. And whoever responds [to injustice] with the equivalent of that with which he was harmed and then is tyrannized - Allah will surely aid him. Indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Y [yn hynny]. A pwy bynnag ymateb [i anghyfiawnder] gydag cyfateb y ag oedd ef sy'n niweidio ac yn tyrannized yna-bydd Allah yn sicr o gymorth iddo. Yn wir, Allah yn Pardoning a Forgiving.

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night and because Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Dyna oherwydd bod Allah yn achosi y nos i fynd y diwrnod ac yn achosi y diwrnod i fynd y nos i ac oherwydd yn Allah clyw a gweld.

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that which they call upon other than Him is falsehood, and because Allah is the Most High, the Grand.
trans-unit.target: Mae hynny'n bod Allah yn y gwirionedd, ac y maent yn galw ar wahân iddo yn anwiredd, ac oherwydd bod Allah yn y mwyaf uchel, y Grand.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah has sent down rain from the sky and the earth becomes green? Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Nid ydych yn gweld y mae Allah wedi anfon i lawr glaw o'r awyr ac y ddaear yn dod gwyrdd? Yn wir, yw Allah Subtle a Acquainted.

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and what is on the earth. And indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: Iddo ef y perthyn beth sydd yn y nefoedd a'r hyn sydd ar y ddaear. Ac yn wir, Allah yn rhad ac am ddim o angen, y Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah has subjected to you whatever is on the earth and the ships which run through the sea by His command? And He restrains the sky from falling upon the earth, unless by His permission. Indeed Allah, to the people, is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Nid ydych yn gweld fod Allah wedi dioddef i chi beth bynnag sydd ar y ddaear ac y llongau sy'n rhedeg drwy y môr gan ei Gorchymyn? Ac mae atal yr awyr rhag disgyn ar y ddaear, oni bai bod gan ei ganiatâd. Allah yn wir, i bobl, yn garedig a Merciful.

trans-unit.source: And He is the one who gave you life; then He causes you to die and then will [again] give you life. Indeed, mankind is ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Ac ef yw'r un a roddodd eich bywyd; yna mae ef yn achosi ichi marw a bydd yna [eto] roi bywyd. Yn wir, mae dynolryw yn anniolchgar.

trans-unit.source: For every religion We have appointed rites which they perform. So, [O Muhammad], let the disbelievers not contend with you over the matter but invite them to your Lord. Indeed, you are upon straight guidance.
trans-unit.target: Ar gyfer pob crefydd, rydym wedi penodi defodau y maent yn eu cyflawni. Felly, mae [O Muhammad], gadewch y disbelievers nid yn dadlau gyda chi dros y mater hwn ond yn eu gwahodd i eich Arglwydd. Yn wir, yr ydych ar canllawiau syth.

trans-unit.source: And if they dispute with you, then say, "Allah is most knowing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: Ac os mae anghydfod gyda chi, wedyn yn dweud, "Allah yn gwybod rhan fwyaf o'r hyn yr ydych yn ei wneud.

trans-unit.source: Allah will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which you used to differ."
trans-unit.target: Bydd Allah yn barnu rhwng chi ar dydd atgyfodi ynghylch y dros y gwnaethoch eu defnyddio i wahanol."

trans-unit.source: Do you not know that Allah knows what is in the heaven and earth? Indeed, that is in a Record. Indeed that, for Allah, is easy.
trans-unit.target: Nad ydych yn gwybod bod Allah yn gwybod beth sydd yn y nefoedd a'r ddaear? Yn wir, mae hynny yn y cofnod. Yn wir, i Allah, mae'n hawdd.

trans-unit.source: And they worship besides Allah that for which He has not sent down authority and that of which they have no knowledge. And there will not be for the wrongdoers any helper.
trans-unit.target: Ac mae nhw'n addoli ar wahân i Allah fod y mae ni anfon i lawr awdurdod a hynny y mae ganddynt unrhyw wybodaeth. Ac ni fydd ar gyfer y tramgwyddo unrhyw gynorthwy-ydd.

trans-unit.source: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, you recognize in the faces of those who disbelieve disapproval. They are almost on the verge of assaulting those who recite to them Our verses. Say, "Then shall I inform you of [what is] worse than that? [It is] the Fire which Allah has promised those who disbelieve, and wretched is the destination."
trans-unit.target: Ac wrth roi ein penillion iddynt fel clir yn dangos, mae yn cydnabod yn wynebau rhai a chredu anghymeradwyaeth. Maent bron ar fin ymosod rheini sy'n adrodd iddynt ein penillion. Dweud, "yna byddwn yn eich hysbysu o'r [sydd] yn waeth na hynny? [Mae'n] Mae'r tân a Allah wedi addo rhai a chredu, a truenus yn y cyrchfan. "

trans-unit.source: O people, an example is presented, so listen to it. Indeed, those you invoke besides Allah will never create [as much as] a fly, even if they gathered together for that purpose. And if the fly should steal away from them a [tiny] thing, they could not recover it from him. Weak are the pursuer and pursued.
trans-unit.target: O bobl, cyflwynir enghraifft, felly gwrando arno. Yn wir, rhai chi alw ar ben hynny bydd Allah yn creu byth [fel] anghyfreithlon, hyd yn oed os buont yn casglu at y diben hwnnw. Ac os dylai y anghyfreithlon yn dwyn oddi arnynt yn beth [bach iawn], gallai ni allant adennill ei oddi wrtho. Wan yn y pursuer a ddilynir.

trans-unit.source: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: Nid wedi arfarnu Allah gydag arfarniad wir. Yn wir, yw Allah Powerful a Exalted yn efallai.

trans-unit.source: Allah chooses from the angels messengers and from the people. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Bydd Allah yn dewis gan y negeswyr angylion a chan y bobl. Yn wir, yn Allah clyw a gweld.

trans-unit.source: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them. And to Allah will be returned [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: Gwyr ef beth yw [ar hyn o bryd] cyn iddynt a beth fydd ar ôl iddynt. Ac i Allah byddwn yn dychwelyd [holl] materion.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, bow and prostrate and worship your Lord and do good - that you may succeed.
trans-unit.target: O Mae chi sydd wedi credu, plygu a prostrate ac addoli eich Arglwydd a wneud da-efallai byddwch yn llwyddo.

trans-unit.source: And strive for Allah with the striving due to Him. He has chosen you and has not placed upon you in the religion any difficulty. [It is] the religion of your father, Abraham. Allah named you "Muslims" before [in former scriptures] and in this [revelation] that the Messenger may be a witness over you and you may be witnesses over the people. So establish prayer and give zakah and hold fast to Allah. He is your protector; and excellent is the protector, and excellent is the helper.
trans-unit.target: Ac ymdrechu i Allah â ymdrechu oherwydd iddo. Mae wedi dewis chi ac wedi nid rhoi chi mewn crefydd unrhyw anhawster. [Mae'n] crefydd eich tad, Abraham. Mae'r Allah chi enwi "Moslemiaid" cyn [yn hen ysgrythurau] ac mewn hwn [ddatguddiad] y gall y negesydd yn dyst dros chi a ydych gall tystion dros y bobl. Felly sefydlu gweddi a rhoi zakah a dal cyflym i Allah. Mae'n eich protector; ac ardderchog yw y protector, ac ardderchog yw yr helpwr.

trans-unit.source: Certainly will the believers have succeeded:
trans-unit.target: Yn sicr bydd y credinwyr wedi llwyddo:

trans-unit.source: They who are during their prayer humbly submissive
trans-unit.target: Hwy sydd yn ystod eu gweddi ostyngedig ostyngedig

trans-unit.source: And they who turn away from ill speech
trans-unit.target: A nhw sy'n troi oddi wrth araith sâl

trans-unit.source: And they who are observant of zakah
trans-unit.target: A nhw sy'n sylwgar o zakah

trans-unit.source: And they who guard their private parts
trans-unit.target: A hwy a ochel eu rhannau preifat

trans-unit.source: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they will not be blamed -
trans-unit.target: Ac eithrio rhag eu gwragedd neu rhai yn eu dwylo hawl meddu ar, ar gyfer yn wir, bydd eu beio-

trans-unit.source: But whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the transgressors -
trans-unit.target: Ond pwy bynnag yn ceisio tu hwnt i hynny, yna y rhai yn y transgressors-

trans-unit.source: And they who are to their trusts and their promises attentive
trans-unit.target: A hwy sydd i ymddiriedolaethau eu ac eu haddewidion sylwgar

trans-unit.source: And they who carefully maintain their prayers -
trans-unit.target: A nhw sy'n cynnal eu gweddïau-yn ofalus

trans-unit.source: Those are the inheritors
trans-unit.target: Rhai yn etifeddu

trans-unit.source: Who will inherit al-Firdaus. They will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: A fydd yn etifeddu'r al Firdaus. Bydd maent yn glynu ynddo fythol.

trans-unit.source: And certainly did We create man from an extract of clay.
trans-unit.target: A sicr y oedd creu dyn o ddyfyniad o glai.

trans-unit.source: Then We placed him as a sperm-drop in a firm lodging.
trans-unit.target: Rydym wedyn yn gosod ef fel gostyngiad sberm mewn llety cadarn.

trans-unit.source: Then We made the sperm-drop into a clinging clot, and We made the clot into a lump [of flesh], and We made [from] the lump, bones, and We covered the bones with flesh; then We developed him into another creation. So blessed is Allah, the best of creators.
trans-unit.target: Rydym wedyn yn gwneud y sberm-gostyngiad i clinging clot, a gwnaethom y clot i lwmp [o gnawd], a gwnaethom [o] y lwmp, esgyrn, a ydym yn cynnwys yr esgyrn gyda cnawd; yna rydym yn datblygu ef i greu arall. Felly Bendigaid yw Allah, y gorau o crewyr.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, after that you are to die.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yna ar ôl hynny rydych yn marw.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, will be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Yna yn wir ar ddiwrnod yr atgyfodiad, bydd chi, atgyfodi.

trans-unit.source: And We have created above you seven layered heavens, and never have We been of [Our] creation unaware.
trans-unit.target: Yr ydym wedi creu uchod, gallwch saith nefoedd haen ac erioed Rydym wedi creu [ein] ymwybodol.

trans-unit.source: And We have sent down rain from the sky in a measured amount and settled it in the earth. And indeed, We are Able to take it away.
trans-unit.target: Ac rydym wedi anfon i lawr glaw gan sky yn swm pwyllog a wedi ei setlo yn y ddaear. Ac yn wir, rydym yn gallu ei gymryd i ffwrdd.

trans-unit.source: And We brought forth for you thereby gardens of palm trees and grapevines in which for you are abundant fruits and from which you eat.
trans-unit.target: A daethom ymlaen i chi gan Gerddi o goed palmwydd a gwinwydden yn y am ydych yn ffrwyth doreithiog ac a ydych yn ei fwyta.

trans-unit.source: And [We brought forth] a tree issuing from Mount Sinai which produces oil and food for those who eat.
trans-unit.target: A [daethom â blaen] coeden cyhoeddi o Sinai Mount sy'n cynhyrchu olew a bwyd ar gyfer y rhai sy'n bwyta.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for you in livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from that which is in their bellies, and for you in them are numerous benefits, and from them you eat.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, i chi mewn da byw yn wers. Roi inni eich bod yn yfed o hynny sydd yn eu boliau, a bwyta ar gyfer eich ynddynt yn nifer o fanteision, ac oddi wrthynt.

trans-unit.source: And upon them and on ships you are carried.
trans-unit.target: A ydych chi arnynt ac ar longau yn cynnal.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: Ac yn sicr rydym wedi anfon Noah at ei bobl, a dywedodd, "O 'm pobl, addoli Allah; Mae gennych unrhyw Dduwdod heblaw iddo; yna bydd eich nid ofni iddo?"

trans-unit.source: But the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "This is not but a man like yourselves who wishes to take precedence over you; and if Allah had willed [to send a messenger], He would have sent down angels. We have not heard of this among our forefathers.
trans-unit.target: Ond yr enwog ymysg y rhai a ddysgais gan ei bobl a dweud, "Nid yw hyn ond dyn fel chi sy'n dymuno cymryd blaenoriaeth dros chi; ac os oedd Allah ewyllysio iddi [i anfon negesydd], byddai ef wedi anfon i lawr angylion. Nid ydym wedi clywed hyn ymysg ein cyndadau.

trans-unit.source: He is not but a man possessed with madness, so wait concerning him for a time."
trans-unit.target: Nid yw ond dyn yn meddu â gwallgofrwydd, felly aros iddo ynghylch amser."

trans-unit.source: [Noah] said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
trans-unit.target: [Noah] yn dweud, "Fy Arglwydd, fy nghefnogi oherwydd maent wedi gwadu mi."

trans-unit.source: So We inspired to him, "Construct the ship under Our observation, and Our inspiration, and when Our command comes and the oven overflows, put into the ship from each [creature] two mates and your family, except those for whom the decree [of destruction] has proceeded. And do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are to be drowned.
trans-unit.target: Felly yr ydym yn ysbrydoli iddo, "adeiladu y llong o dan ein sylw, ac yn ein hysbrydoli, ac pan ddaw ein Gorchymyn a gorlifo y ffwrn, rhoi ar y llong gan ffrindiau dau bob [creature] a eich teulu, ac eithrio'r rhai y mae'r ordinhad [o ddinistrio] wedi mynd rhagddo. Ac nid yw ymdrin â mi ynghylch rhai sydd wedi cam; yn wir, maent yn boddi.

trans-unit.source: And when you have boarded the ship, you and those with you, then say, 'Praise to Allah who has saved us from the wrongdoing people.'
trans-unit.target: A phan yr ydych wedi ei y llong, chi, a'r rhai gyda chi, wedyn yn dweud, 'Canmoliaeth i Allah sydd wedi wedi ein hachub rhag y bobl gamwedd.'

trans-unit.source: And say, 'My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].' "
trans-unit.target: A dweud, ' fy Arglwydd, gadewch imi tir mewn man glanio Bendigaid, a chi yw'r gorau i letya [ein].' "

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that are signs, and indeed, We are ever testing [Our servants].
trans-unit.target: Yn wir yn hynny yn arwyddion, ac yn wir, rydym yn profi [ein gweision] erioed.

trans-unit.source: Then We produced after them a generation of others.
trans-unit.target: Rydym wedyn yn llunio ar ôl eu cenhedlaeth o eraill.

trans-unit.source: And We sent among them a messenger from themselves, [saying], "Worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: A anfonwyd yn eu plith negesydd o eu hunain, [dweud], "addoli Allah; Mae gennych unrhyw Dduwdod heblaw iddo; yna bydd eich nid ofni iddo?"

trans-unit.source: And the eminent among his people who disbelieved and denied the meeting of the Hereafter while We had given them luxury in the worldly life said, "This is not but a man like yourselves. He eats of that from which you eat and drinks of what you drink.
trans-unit.target: Ac meddai enwog ymysg ei bobl sy'n gwrthod cyfarfod y o hyn ymlaen er ein bod wedi rhoi iddynt moethus ym mywyd worldly a ddysgais, "Nid yw hwn ond dyn yn hoffi eich hunain. Mae'n bwyta o hynny yr ydych yn ei fwyta a diodydd o beth yr ydych yn ei yfed.

trans-unit.source: And if you should obey a man like yourselves, indeed, you would then be losers.
trans-unit.target: Ac os dylai chi ufuddhau dyn fel chithau, yn wir, yna byddai gennych ar eu colled.

trans-unit.source: Does he promise you that when you have died and become dust and bones that you will be brought forth [once more]?
trans-unit.target: Yw iddo addo hynny i chi pan fyddwch wedi marw ac yn dod yn llwch ac esgyrn y bydd eich eu dwyn ymlaen [unwaith mwy]?

trans-unit.source: How far, how far, is that which you are promised.
trans-unit.target: Pa mor bell, pa mor bell yw hyn a addawyd gennych.

trans-unit.source: Life is not but our worldly life - we die and live, but we will not be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Nid yw bywyd ond ein bywyd worldly-Rydym yn marw a byw, ond ni fydd inni atgyfodi.

trans-unit.source: He is not but a man who has invented a lie about Allah, and we will not believe him."
trans-unit.target: Nid yw ond yn ddyn sydd wedi dyfeisio celwydd am Allah, ac ni chredwn iddo."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
trans-unit.target: Meddai, "Fy Arglwydd, fy nghefnogi oherwydd maent wedi gwadu mi."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "After a little, they will surely become regretful."
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd [Allah], "ar ôl ychydig, byddant yn sicr yn destun gofid."

trans-unit.source: So the shriek seized them in truth, and We made them as [plant] stubble. Then away with the wrongdoing people.
trans-unit.target: Felly roedd y shriek yn hatafaelu iddynt mewn gwirionedd, ac yr ydym yn eu gwneud fel sofl [planhigion]. Yna i ffwrdd â phobl gamwedd.

trans-unit.source: Then We produced after them other generations.
trans-unit.target: Rydym wedyn yn llunio ar ôl eu cenedlaethau eraill.

trans-unit.source: No nation will precede its time [of termination], nor will they remain [thereafter].
trans-unit.target: Bydd unrhyw genedl yn rhagflaenu ei amser [y terfyniad], ac ni fyddant yn aros [hynny].

trans-unit.source: Then We sent Our messengers in succession. Every time there came to a nation its messenger, they denied him, so We made them follow one another [to destruction], and We made them narrations. So away with a people who do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Yna rydym yn anfon ein negeswyr yn olynol. Bob tro y deuai i genedl ei negesydd, maent gwadodd iddo, felly rydym yn gwneud iddynt ddilyn un arall [i ddinistrio], ac rydym yn gwneud iddynt narrations. Felly i ffwrdd â phobl nad ydynt yn credu.

trans-unit.source: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and a clear authority
trans-unit.target: Yna anfonwyd Moses ac Aaron ei frawd gyda'r awdurdod clir ac arwyddion ein

trans-unit.source: To Pharaoh and his establishment, but they were arrogant and were a haughty people.
trans-unit.target: Ffaro a ei sefydlu, ond roeddent yn drahaus ac yn bobl Cymro'n.

trans-unit.source: They said, "Should we believe two men like ourselves while their people are for us in servitude?"
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "Os credwn dau ddyn fel ein hunain tra eu pobl i ni mewn caethiwed?"

trans-unit.source: So they denied them and were of those destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Felly maent yn cael eu hamddifadu ac roedd rhai eu dinistrio.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture that perhaps they would be guided.
trans-unit.target: A sicr rhoddodd Moses yr ysgrythur y efallai y byddai arweiniad iddynt.

trans-unit.source: And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign and sheltered them within a high ground having level [areas] and flowing water.
trans-unit.target: Ac yr ydym yn gwneud arwydd mab y Mary a'i fam ac yn eu gwarchod o fewn tir uchel yn cael lefel [ardaloedd] a dŵr sy'n llifo'n rhwydd.

trans-unit.source: [Allah said], "O messengers, eat from the good foods and work righteousness. Indeed, I, of what you do, am Knowing.
trans-unit.target: [Dywedodd Allah], "Mae O negeseuwyr, bwyta bwydydd da a chyfiawnder i weithio. Yn wir, yr hyn yr ydych yn ei wneud, yr wyf yn gwybod.

trans-unit.source: And indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so fear Me."
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, eich crefydd, dyma'r un grefydd, ac yr wyf yn eich Arglwydd, mor ofn Me."

trans-unit.source: But the people divided their religion among them into sects - each faction, in what it has, rejoicing.
trans-unit.target: Ond mae pobl yn rhannu eu crefydd yn eu plith yn sectau-pob carfan, yn beth mae, lawenhau.

trans-unit.source: So leave them in their confusion for a time.
trans-unit.target: Felly gadael iddynt yn eu dryswch am amser.

trans-unit.source: Do they think that what We extend to them of wealth and children
trans-unit.target: A ydynt yn credu bod hyn yn ymestyn iddynt cyfoeth a phlant

trans-unit.source: Is [because] We hasten for them good things? Rather, they do not perceive.
trans-unit.target: Mae [oherwydd] inni brysuro eu pethau da? Yn hytrach, wneud nad oeddent yn gweld.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who are apprehensive from fear of their Lord
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y nhw sy'n bryderus rhag ofn yr Arglwydd eu

trans-unit.source: And they who believe in the signs of their Lord
trans-unit.target: A nhw sy'n credu mewn arwyddion yr Arglwydd eu

trans-unit.source: And they who do not associate anything with their Lord
trans-unit.target: A hwy a nid cysylltu unrhyw beth gyda eu Arglwydd

trans-unit.source: And they who give what they give while their hearts are fearful because they will be returning to their Lord -
trans-unit.target: A nhw sy'n rhoi beth maent yn ei rhoi er bod eu calonnau yn ofnus oherwydd byddant yn dychwelyd at yr Arglwydd eu-

trans-unit.source: It is those who hasten to good deeds, and they outstrip [others] therein.
trans-unit.target: Rhai sy'n cyflymu i weithredoedd da, ac maent yn fwy na'r [eraill] ynddynt.

trans-unit.source: And We charge no soul except [with that within] its capacity, and with Us is a record which speaks with truth; and they will not be wronged.
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn codi tâl heb enaid ac eithrio [â hynny o fewn] ei gallu, ac mae gyda ni yn gofnod a siarad gyda gwir; ac ni Bydd maent yn cam.

trans-unit.source: But their hearts are covered with confusion over this, and they have [evil] deeds besides disbelief which they are doing,
trans-unit.target: Ond eu calonnau wedi eu gorchuddio â dryswch dros hyn, ac mae ganddynt [anfad] gweithredoedd heblaw am anghrediniaeth y maent yn ei wneud,

trans-unit.source: Until when We seize their affluent ones with punishment, at once they are crying [to Allah] for help.
trans-unit.target: Tan pan rydym yn manteisio ar eu cefnog rhai â chosbi, ar unwaith yn crio [i Allah] am help.

trans-unit.source: Do not cry out today. Indeed, by Us you will not be helped.
trans-unit.target: Wylo heddiw. Yn wir, ni fydd eich ni helpu.

trans-unit.source: My verses had already been recited to you, but you were turning back on your heels
trans-unit.target: Roedd fy penillion eisoes wedi'i roi i chi, ond roedd ydych yn troi yn ôl ar eich sodlau

trans-unit.source: In arrogance regarding it, conversing by night, speaking evil.
trans-unit.target: Yn haerllugrwydd ynghylch ei, sgwrsio gan nos, siarad drygioni.

trans-unit.source: Then have they not reflected over the Qur'an, or has there come to them that which had not come to their forefathers?
trans-unit.target: Yna nid ydynt wedi adlewyrchu dros y Qur'an, neu yno wedi iddynt sy'n nad oedd wedi dod i eu cyndeidiau?

trans-unit.source: Or did they not know their Messenger, so they are toward him disacknowledging?
trans-unit.target: Neu nad oeddent yn gwybod eu Messenger, felly maent tuag at ei disacknowledging?

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "In him is madness?" Rather, he brought them the truth, but most of them, to the truth, are averse.
trans-unit.target: Neu wneud dywedant, "iddo gwallgofrwydd yw?" Yn hytrach, daeth y gwir iddynt, ond mae'r rhan fwyaf ohonynt, y gwir, gwrth.

trans-unit.source: But if the Truth had followed their inclinations, the heavens and the earth and whoever is in them would have been ruined. Rather, We have brought them their message, but they, from their message, are turning away.
trans-unit.target: Ond os oedd y gwir yn dilyn eu prawf pellter, byddai y nefoedd a'r ddaear a phwy bynnag ynddynt wedi wedi'i ddifetha. Yn hytrach, yr ydym wedi dwyn eu neges, ond gan eu neges, maent, yn troi i ffwrdd.

trans-unit.source: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask them for payment? But the reward of your Lord is best, and He is the best of providers.
trans-unit.target: Neu a ydych, [O Muhammad], yn gofyn iddynt am daliad? Ond y wobr o eich Arglwydd sydd orau, ac ef yw'r gorau o ddarparwyr.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, you invite them to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, eu gwahodd i lwybr syth.

trans-unit.source: But indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter are deviating from the path.
trans-unit.target: Ond yn wir, y rheini nad ydynt yn credu yn y o hyn ymlaen yn wyro oddi ar y llwybr.

trans-unit.source: And even if We gave them mercy and removed what was upon them of affliction, they would persist in their transgression, wandering blindly.
trans-unit.target: A hyd yn oed os ydym yn rhoi iddynt drugaredd a dileu beth oedd arnynt o cystuddiau'n, maent yn parhau yn eu tramgwyddiad, crwydro ddall.

trans-unit.source: And We had gripped them with suffering [as a warning], but they did not yield to their Lord, nor did they humbly supplicate, [and will continue thus]
trans-unit.target: A ydym wedi cydio iddynt â dioddef [fel rhybudd], ond nid oedd iddynt ildio eu yr Arglwydd, nac oedd eu bod wedi supplicate yn ostyngedig, [a bydd yn parhau felly]

trans-unit.source: Until when We have opened before them a door of severe punishment, immediately they will be therein in despair.
trans-unit.target: Tan pan ydym wedi agor cyn eu drws o gosb difrifol, ar unwaith byddant yn weithredol mewn anobaith.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who produced for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful.
trans-unit.target: Ac ef a gynhyrchwyd ar gyfer eich gwrandawiad a gweledigaeth a calonnau; ychydig a ydych yn ddiolchgar.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered.
trans-unit.target: Ac ef a lluosi â chi drwy gydol y ddaear, ac iddo ef y bydd eich casglu.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who gives life and causes death, and His is the alternation of the night and the day. Then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: Ac ef sy'n rhoi bywyd ac achosi marwolaeth, ac yn ei newid y nos a dydd. Yna bydd eich nid rheswm?

trans-unit.source: Rather, they say like what the former peoples said.
trans-unit.target: Yn hytrach, maent yn dweud fel hyn a ddywedodd y bobloedd gynt.

trans-unit.source: They said, "When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "pan fyddwn wedi marw ac yn dod yn llwch ac esgyrn, yr ydym yn wir i atgyfodi?

trans-unit.source: We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before; this is not but legends of the former peoples."
trans-unit.target: Addawyd hyn, inni ac yn ein cyndadau, blaen; Nid yw hyn ond chwedlau o bobloedd gynt."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "To whom belongs the earth and whoever is in it, if you should know?"
trans-unit.target: Dweud, [O Muhammad], "i bwy perthyn y ddaear a bwy bynnag sydd ynddo, os dylech wybod?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "To Allah." Say, "Then will you not remember?"
trans-unit.target: Byddant yn dweud, "I Allah." Dweud, "Yna bydd nad ydych yn cofio?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who is Lord of the seven heavens and Lord of the Great Throne?"
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "Pwy yw yr Arglwydd o'r nefoedd saith a Arglwydd yr Orsedd fawr?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "[They belong] to Allah." Say, "Then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: Byddant yn dweud, "[maen nhw'n perthyn] i Allah." Dweud, "yna y byddwch nid ofn iddo?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "In whose hand is the realm of all things - and He protects while none can protect against Him - if you should know?"
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "yn eu dwylo yn yr amgylchfyd yr holl bethau-a mae ef yn diogelu tra gall dim amddiffyn rhag iddo ef-os dylech wybod?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "[All belongs] to Allah." Say, "Then how are you deluded?"
trans-unit.target: Byddant yn dweud, "[oll yn perthyn] i Allah." Dweud, "yna sut ydych eich?"

trans-unit.source: Rather, We have brought them the truth, and indeed they are liars.
trans-unit.target: Yn hytrach, yr ydym wedi dwyn y gwirionedd, ac yn wir maent yn gelwyddgwn.

trans-unit.source: Allah has not taken any son, nor has there ever been with Him any deity. [If there had been], then each deity would have taken what it created, and some of them would have sought to overcome others. Exalted is Allah above what they describe [concerning Him].
trans-unit.target: Mae Allah nid cymryd unrhyw mab, nac erioed a fu gydag ef unrhyw Dduwdod. [Os bu], yna byddai pob Dduwdod wedi cymryd beth y mae'n ei greu, a byddai rhai ohonynt wedi ceisio goresgyn eraill. I'w mawrygu yw Allah uchod beth maent yn disgrifio [ynghylch ef].

trans-unit.source: [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, so high is He above what they associate [with Him].
trans-unit.target: [Mae'n] Knower y unseen a welir, mor uchel yw ef uchod beth maent cysylltiol [gydag ef].

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord, if You should show me that which they are promised,
trans-unit.target: Dweud, [O Muhammad], "fy Arglwydd, os dylai ddangos imi hynny y maent yn ei addo,

trans-unit.source: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people."
trans-unit.target: Fy Arglwydd, yna peidiwch â rhoi mi ymysg y bobl gamwedd."

trans-unit.source: And indeed, We are able to show you what We have promised them.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, yr ydym yn gallu dangos i chi beth yr ydym wedi addo iddynt.

trans-unit.source: Repel, by [means of] what is best, [their] evil. We are most knowing of what they describe.
trans-unit.target: Ddefnyddiwyd, gan [modd] Beth sydd orau, [eu] drygioni. Rydym yn gwybod rhan fwyaf o'r hyn y maent yn ei ddisgrifio.

trans-unit.source: And say, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils,
trans-unit.target: A dweud, "fy Arglwydd, yn ceisio lloches yn chi gan y incitements o y devils,

trans-unit.source: And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, lest they be present with me."
trans-unit.target: Ac yn gofyn am loches mewn chi, fy Arglwydd, rhag ofn iddynt fod yn bresennol gyda mi."

trans-unit.source: [For such is the state of the disbelievers], until, when death comes to one of them, he says, "My Lord, send me back
trans-unit.target: [Ar gyfer o'r fath yw cyflwr y disbelievers], tan, pan ddaw marwolaeth i un ohonynt, meddai, "fy Arglwydd, anfon ataf ôl

trans-unit.source: That I might do righteousness in that which I left behind." No! It is only a word he is saying; and behind them is a barrier until the Day they are resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Gallai wneud chyfiawnder i yn hynny yr wyf yn gadael ar ôl." na! Mae'n dim ond gair ei fod yn dweud; a'r tu ôl iddynt yn rhwystr tan y diwrnod maent yn atgyfodi.

trans-unit.source: So when the Horn is blown, no relationship will there be among them that Day, nor will they ask about one another.
trans-unit.target: Felly pan yn chwythu y corn, fydd unrhyw berthynas rhyngddynt yn y diwrnod hwnnw, na byddant yn gofyn am un arall.

trans-unit.source: And those whose scales are heavy [with good deeds] - it is they who are the successful.
trans-unit.target: A'r rhai y mae eu graddfeydd trwm [gyda gweithredoedd da]-hwy sydd yn llwyddiannus.

trans-unit.source: But those whose scales are light - those are the ones who have lost their souls, [being] in Hell, abiding eternally.
trans-unit.target: Ond y rhai y mae eu graddfeydd yn ysgafn-Dyma'r rhai sydd wedi colli eu heneidiau, [bod] yn uffern, yn ufudd i'r fythol.

trans-unit.source: The Fire will sear their faces, and they therein will have taut smiles.
trans-unit.target: Bydd y tân Seriwch y cig eu hwynebau, ac ynddo bydd ganddynt wedyn ei thynnu'n gwenu.

trans-unit.source: [It will be said]. "Were not My verses recited to you and you used to deny them?"
trans-unit.target: [Bydd dweud]. "Roedd na fy penillion yn ei roi i chi a ddefnyddiwyd gennych i wadu iddynt?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Our Lord, our wretchedness overcame us, and we were a people astray.
trans-unit.target: Byddant yn dweud, "ein Arglwydd, yr wretchedness i'n goresgyn inni, a ni oedd pobl ar gyfeiliorn.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, remove us from it, and if we were to return [to evil], we would indeed be wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Ein Arglwydd, tynnwch ein ohono, a pe baem yn dychwelyd [i ddrygioni], byddem yn wir yn tramgwyddo."

trans-unit.source: He will say, "Remain despised therein and do not speak to Me.
trans-unit.target: Bydd yn dweud, "Mae aros gasáu ynddo, ac nid yn siarad i Me.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, there was a party of My servants who said, 'Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us and have mercy upon us, and You are the best of the merciful.'
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yr oedd Plaid o 'm gweision a ddywedodd, 'Arglwydd ein, rydym wedi credu, felly maddeuwch inni ac mae gennym drugaredd arnom, ac yr ydych yn eithaf y tosturiol.'

trans-unit.source: But you took them in mockery to the point that they made you forget My remembrance, and you used to laugh at them.
trans-unit.target: Ond y cymerasoch yn destun sbort i'r pwynt yr oeddent wedi gwneud ichi anghofio fy coffa, a chi deheuwyr iddynt.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I have rewarded them this Day for their patient endurance - that they are the attainers [of success]."
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, wedi imi eu gwobrwyo eu diwrnod hwn ar gyfer eu cleifion dygnwch-gan eu bod yn gyrraeddwyr [o lwyddiant]."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] will say, "How long did you remain on earth in number of years?"
trans-unit.target: Bydd [Allah] yn dweud, "pa mor hir oedd chi aros ar y ddaear mewn nifer o flynyddoedd?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "We remained a day or part of a day; ask those who enumerate."
trans-unit.target: Byddant yn dweud, "Rydym wedi aros diwrnod neu rhan o ddiwrnod; holi'r rhai hynny a rhifo. "

trans-unit.source: He will say, "You stayed not but a little - if only you had known.
trans-unit.target: Bydd ef yn dweud, "wnaethoch chi aros nid ond ychydig-os i ond yn gwybod ichi.

trans-unit.source: Then did you think that We created you uselessly and that to Us you would not be returned?"
trans-unit.target: Yna oeddech yn credu ein bod yn creu eich uselessly a bod i ni byddai ydych nid dychwelyd?"

trans-unit.source: So exalted is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth; there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Noble Throne.
trans-unit.target: Felly i'w mawrygu yn Allah, sofran, y gwir; Nid oes unrhyw Dduwdod ac eithrio ef, yr Arglwydd o'r Orsedd aruchel.

trans-unit.source: And whoever invokes besides Allah another deity for which he has no proof - then his account is only with his Lord. Indeed, the disbelievers will not succeed.
trans-unit.target: A pwy bynnag a rhyw ar wahân i Allah Dduwdod arall y mae ganddo oes prawf-yna ei gyfrif yn unig gyda ei Arglwydd. Yn wir, bydd y disbelievers yn llwyddo.

trans-unit.source: And, [O Muhammad], say, "My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful."
trans-unit.target: A [O Muhammad], yn dweud, "Mae fy Arglwydd, maddau ac drugaredd, ac yr ydych yn eithaf y tosturiol."

trans-unit.source: [This is] a surah which We have sent down and made [that within it] obligatory and revealed therein verses of clear evidence that you might remember.
trans-unit.target: [Mae hwn] surah sydd wedi ein hanfon i lawr a gwneud [yn] penillion orfodol a datgelodd ynddo o tystiolaeth glir fod efallai y cofiwch.

trans-unit.source: The [unmarried] woman or [unmarried] man found guilty of sexual intercourse - lash each one of them with a hundred lashes, and do not be taken by pity for them in the religion of Allah, if you should believe in Allah and the Last Day. And let a group of the believers witness their punishment.
trans-unit.target: Mae y fenyw [dibriod] neu [dibriod] dyn yn euog o cyfathrach rywiol-anelu bob un ohonynt â lashes gant, a wneud nid yn cymryd trueni iddynt mewn crefydd Allah, os ddylech gredu yn Allah ac yn y dydd diwethaf. A gadewch i grŵp o gredinwyr y tyst eu cosbi.

trans-unit.source: The fornicator does not marry except a [female] fornicator or polytheist, and none marries her except a fornicator or a polytheist, and that has been made unlawful to the believers.
trans-unit.target: Nid yw y fornicator yn briodi ac eithrio i fornicator [merched] neu polytheist, ac mae dim iddi priodi ac eithrio fornicator neu polytheist, a gwnaethpwyd hynny'n anghyfreithlon i y credinwyr.

trans-unit.source: And those who accuse chaste women and then do not produce four witnesses - lash them with eighty lashes and do not accept from them testimony ever after. And those are the defiantly disobedient,
trans-unit.target: A rhai sy'n cyhuddo menywod dilychwin iawn ac wedyn nid yw cynhyrchu tystion bedwar-iddynt anelu â lashes wythdeg ac nid derbyn oddi wrthynt dyst byth wedyn. A rhai yn defiantly anufudd,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who repent thereafter and reform, for indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ac eithrio ar gyfer y rhai sydd yn edifarhau ar ôl hynny a diwygio, yn wir, Allah yn Forgiving ac yn Merciful.

trans-unit.source: And those who accuse their wives [of adultery] and have no witnesses except themselves - then the witness of one of them [shall be] four testimonies [swearing] by Allah that indeed, he is of the truthful.
trans-unit.target: A'r rhai sy'n cyhuddo eu gwragedd [o adultery] ac unrhyw dystion heblaw hwy eu hunain-yna y tyst o un ohonynt [fydd] dystiolaethau pedwar [rhegi] gan Allah yn wir, ei fod yn o y geirwir.

trans-unit.source: And the fifth [oath will be] that the curse of Allah be upon him if he should be among the liars.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn y pumed [llw fydd] y felltith Allah yn arno os dylai fod ymhlith y celwyddgwn.

trans-unit.source: But it will prevent punishment from her if she gives four testimonies [swearing] by Allah that indeed, he is of the liars.
trans-unit.target: Ond bydd yn atal cosbi oddi wrthi os bydd hi yn rhoi pedwar dystiolaethau [rhegi] gan Allah yn wir, ei fod yn y celwyddgwn.

trans-unit.source: And the fifth [oath will be] that the wrath of Allah be upon her if he was of the truthful.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn y pumed [llw fydd] ennyn digofaint Allah ar ei os iddo fod yn oedd y geirwir.

trans-unit.source: And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy... and because Allah is Accepting of repentance and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Os nid favor Allah ar eich a ei drugaredd... ac ar dderbyn o edifeirwch a Wise yw Allah.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who came with falsehood are a group among you. Do not think it bad for you; rather it is good for you. For every person among them is what [punishment] he has earned from the sin, and he who took upon himself the greater portion thereof - for him is a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, rhai a ddaeth â anwiredd yn grŵp eich plith. Nid credu mae'n ddrwg i chi; yn hytrach mae'n dda i chi. Ar gyfer pob person yn eu plith yw pa gosb Mae wedi ennill gan y pechod, ac ef a gymerodd ar ei hun y dognau mwy ohono-er iddo yw cosbi mawr.

trans-unit.source: Why, when you heard it, did not the believing men and believing women think good of one another and say, "This is an obvious falsehood"?
trans-unit.target: Pam, pan eich bod yn ei glywed, nid oedd nid y dynion believing a gredu menywod feddwl da un arall a dweud, "Dyma anwiredd amlwg"?

trans-unit.source: Why did they [who slandered] not produce for it four witnesses? And when they do not produce the witnesses, then it is they, in the sight of Allah, who are the liars.
trans-unit.target: Pam nad oedden nhw'n [sydd slandered] cynhyrchu ar ei gyfer pedwar tystion? A phan nad ydynt yn cynhyrchu y tystion, yna mae'n iddynt, yng ngolwg Allah, sydd yn gelwyddgwn y.

trans-unit.source: And if it had not been for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy in this world and the Hereafter, you would have been touched for that [lie] in which you were involved by a great punishment
trans-unit.target: A pe na bai ar gyfer favor Allah ar chi ac yn ei drugaredd yn y byd hwn a y o hyn ymlaen, byddech wedi cyffwrdd ar gyfer hwnnw [celwydd] a chi oedd rhan gan gosbi mawr

trans-unit.source: When you received it with your tongues and said with your mouths that of which you had no knowledge and thought it was insignificant while it was, in the sight of Allah, tremendous.
trans-unit.target: Pan fyddwch yn ei dderbyn gyda eich dafod a dywedodd gyda eich cegau yn eich bod ddim gwybodaeth ac yn credu ei bod yn ddibwys tra oedd, yng ngolwg Allah, aruthrol.

trans-unit.source: And why, when you heard it, did you not say, "It is not for us to speak of this. Exalted are You, [O Allah]; this is a great slander"?
trans-unit.target: Ac pam, pan y bu ichi ei glywed, nid ydych yn dweud, "nid i ni siarad am hyn. I'w mawrygu yr ydych chi, [O Allah]; Mae hyn yn anffodus iawn"?

trans-unit.source: Allah warns you against returning to the likes of this [conduct], ever, if you should be believers.
trans-unit.target: Mae Allah yn rhybuddio chi erbyn dychwelyd i hoffi hwn [ymddygiad], erioed, os dylai fod credinwyr.

trans-unit.source: And Allah makes clear to you the verses, and Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Allah ei gwneud yn glir i chi y penillion ac Allah yw gwybod a Wise.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who like that immorality should be spread [or publicized] among those who have believed will have a painful punishment in this world and the Hereafter. And Allah knows and you do not know.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae rhai sydd, fel y anfoesoldeb, dylid lledaenu [neu rhoi cyhoeddusrwydd] ymhlith y rhai sydd wedi credu bydd cosbi poenus yn y byd hwn a y o hyn ymlaen. A gwyr Allah ac nad ydych yn gwybod.

trans-unit.source: And if it had not been for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy... and because Allah is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ac os nad oedd wedi ar gyfer favor Allah ar eich a ei drugaredd... ac oherwydd bod Allah yn garedig a Merciful.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not follow the footsteps of Satan. And whoever follows the footsteps of Satan - indeed, he enjoins immorality and wrongdoing. And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy, not one of you would have been pure, ever, but Allah purifies whom He wills, and Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: O chi sydd wedi credu, nid yn dilyn ôl traed Satan. A pwy bynnag yn dilyn ôl traed Satan-yn wir, ef enjoins anfoesoldeb a'r gamwedd. Ac os nad ar gyfer favor Allah ar chi ac yn ei drugaredd, byddai nid oes yr un ohonoch wedi bod yn bur, erioed, ond mae'r Allah buro y mae ef yn wills, a Allah yw gwrandawiad a gwybod.

trans-unit.source: And let not those of virtue among you and wealth swear not to give [aid] to their relatives and the needy and the emigrants for the cause of Allah, and let them pardon and overlook. Would you not like that Allah should forgive you? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: A gadewch i'r rhai o'r rhinwedd eich plith a rhegi cyfoeth nid i roi [cymorth] i a'u perthnasau ac anghenus a y daeth ymfudwyr am achos Allah, a gadewch iddynt ddrwg ac edrych. Oni fyddech yn hoffi bod Allah dylai maddau ichi? Ac Allah yn Forgiving a Merciful.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who [falsely] accuse chaste, unaware and believing women are cursed in this world and the Hereafter; and they will have a great punishment
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y rheini sy'n cyhuddo menywod dilychwin iawn, yn ymwybodol a gredu [pobl ar gam] yn melltithio yn y byd hwn ac o hyn ymlaen; a byddant yn cael cosb mawr

trans-unit.source: On a Day when their tongues, their hands and their feet will bear witness against them as to what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Ar ddiwrnod pan y bydd eu dafod, eu dwylo a thraed eu dwyn tyst yn eu herbyn i beth maen nhw'n ei wneud.

trans-unit.source: That Day, Allah will pay them in full their deserved recompense, and they will know that it is Allah who is the perfect in justice.
trans-unit.target: Bydd diwrnod, Allah eu talu yn llawn eu iawndal haeddiannol, a byddant yn gwybod ei bod yn Allah sy'n berffaith mewn cyfiawnder.

trans-unit.source: Evil words are for evil men, and evil men are [subjected] to evil words. And good words are for good men, and good men are [an object] of good words. Those [good people] are declared innocent of what the slanderers say. For them is forgiveness and noble provision.
trans-unit.target: Geiriau drwg ar gyfer dynion drwg, a dynion drwg yn [agored] i geiriau drwg. A geiriau da ar gyfer dynion da, ac yn ddynion da [gwrthrych] o eiriau da. Mae hynny [pobl da] ddatgan diniwed o'r hyn y mae y slanderers yn ei ddweud. Iddynt hwy yn ddarpariaeth aruchel a maddeuant.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not enter houses other than your own houses until you ascertain welcome and greet their inhabitants. That is best for you; perhaps you will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: O chi sydd wedi credu, peidiwch â rhoi tai heblaw tai eich hun nes i chi ganfod croeso a chyfarch eu trigolion. Dyna'r gorau i chi; Efallai y bydd eich hatgoffa.

trans-unit.source: And if you do not find anyone therein, do not enter them until permission has been given you. And if it is said to you, "Go back," then go back; it is purer for you. And Allah is Knowing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: Ac os nad ydych yn cael unrhyw un ynddo, peidiwch â rhoi iddynt hyd nes y rhoddwyd caniatâd chi. Ac os dywedir i chi, "Mynd yn ôl," yna mynd yn ôl; Mae'n purach i chi. Ac Allah yn gwybod yr hyn yr ydych yn ei wneud.

trans-unit.source: There is no blame upon you for entering houses not inhabited in which there is convenience for you. And Allah knows what you reveal and what you conceal.
trans-unit.target: Nid oes unrhyw fai arnoch chi ar gyfer mynd i mewn i Dŷ nid byw sydd yn gyfleus i chi. Ac mae Allah yn gwybod beth yr ydych yn ei ddatgelu a beth yr ydych yn ei guddio.

trans-unit.source: Tell the believing men to reduce [some] of their vision and guard their private parts. That is purer for them. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what they do.
trans-unit.target: Ddweud wrth y dynion believing i leihau [rai] eu gweledigaeth a gwarchod eu rhannau preifat. Dyna purach ar eu cyfer. Yn wir, yw Allah yn gyfarwydd â hyn a wnânt.

trans-unit.source: And tell the believing women to reduce [some] of their vision and guard their private parts and not expose their adornment except that which [necessarily] appears thereof and to wrap [a portion of] their headcovers over their chests and not expose their adornment except to their husbands, their fathers, their husbands' fathers, their sons, their husbands' sons, their brothers, their brothers' sons, their sisters' sons, their women, that which their right hands possess, or those male attendants having no physical desire, or children who are not yet aware of the private aspects of women. And let them not stamp their feet to make known what they conceal of their adornment. And turn to Allah in repentance, all of you, O believers, that you might succeed.
trans-unit.target: A dweud y menywod believing i leihau [rai] eu gweledigaeth a gard Mae preifat eu rhannau ac ni amlygu eu addurn ac eithrio sy'n ymddangos [o reidrwydd] ohono a lapio [dogn o] eu headcovers dros eu Phrydain ac ni amlygu eu addurn ac eithrio i eu gwŷr, eu tadau, tadau eu gwŷr, eu meibion, eu gwŷr meibion, eu brodyr, eu brodyr meibion , chwiorydd eu meibion, eu merched, sydd yn eu hawl eu dwylo yn meddu ar, neu hynny hebryngwyr gwrywaidd yn cael dim awydd corfforol, neu blant nad ydynt yn ymwybodol o agweddau preifat menywod eto. A gadewch iddynt nid stampio traed eu gwneud yn hysbys beth maent yn ei guddio o eu addurn. Ac yn troi at Allah mewn edifeirwch, bob un ohonoch, O gredinwyr, y gallai byddwch yn llwyddo.

trans-unit.source: And marry the unmarried among you and the righteous among your male slaves and female slaves. If they should be poor, Allah will enrich them from His bounty, and Allah is all-Encompassing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: A briodi dibriod eich plith a righteous ymhlith eich gaethweision gwrywaidd a benywaidd caethweision. Os dylent fod yn wael, bydd Allah yn eu cyfoethogi gan ei bounty, ac Allah yn hollgynhwysol a gwybod.

trans-unit.source: But let them who find not [the means for] marriage abstain [from sexual relations] until Allah enriches them from His bounty. And those who seek a contract [for eventual emancipation] from among whom your right hands possess - then make a contract with them if you know there is within them goodness and give them from the wealth of Allah which He has given you. And do not compel your slave girls to prostitution, if they desire chastity, to seek [thereby] the temporary interests of worldly life. And if someone should compel them, then indeed, Allah is [to them], after their compulsion, Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ond gadewch iddynt sy'n dod o hyd i ni [y ffordd ar gyfer] priodas ymatal [o berthynas rywiol] nes Mae'r Allah yn eu cyfoethogi gan ei bounty. A rhai sy'n ceisio contract [ar gyfer rhyddfreinio pen draw] o blith bwy yn eich dwylo hawl yn meddu ar-wedyn gwneud contract gyda nhw os ydych yn gwybod Mae ynddynt Duw a rhoi iddynt o gyfoeth Allah sydd wedi ei rhoi i chi. Ac a gorfodi eich merched gaethion i buteindra, os ydynt yn dymuno diweirdeb, dros dro, i geisio [ac felly] Mae buddiannau bywyd worldly. Ac os dylai rhywun eu gorfodi, yn wir, yna Allah [iddyn nhw], ar ôl eu gorfodaeth, Forgiving a Merciful.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly sent down to you distinct verses and examples from those who passed on before you and an admonition for those who fear Allah.
trans-unit.target: Ac yr ydym yn sicr wedi anfon i lawr i chi wahanol penillion ac enghreifftiau gan y rhai a basiwyd cyn ichi a cheryddu ar gyfer y rhai sy'n ofni Allah.

trans-unit.source: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth. The example of His light is like a niche within which is a lamp, the lamp is within glass, the glass as if it were a pearly [white] star lit from [the oil of] a blessed olive tree, neither of the east nor of the west, whose oil would almost glow even if untouched by fire. Light upon light. Allah guides to His light whom He wills. And Allah presents examples for the people, and Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: Allah yn y goleuni y nefoedd a'r ddaear. Yr enghraifft o olau ei hoffi arbenigol o fewn y lamp, yw y lamp o fewn gwydr, gwydr fel pe bai'n seren [gwyn] pearly Llyth o [olew] coeden olewydd Bendigaid, yn y dwyrain na'r gorllewin, byddai eu olew yn tywynnu bron hyd yn oed os nas cyffyrddwyd gan dân. Golau ar ysgafn. Allah canllaw ei goleuni y mae ef yn wills. Ac mae'r Allah yn cyflwyno enghreifftiau ar gyfer y bobl, a bod Allah yn gwybod am yr holl bethau.

trans-unit.source: [Such niches are] in mosques which Allah has ordered to be raised and that His name be mentioned therein; exalting Him within them in the morning and the evenings
trans-unit.target: [Mae marchnadoedd arbenigol o'r fath] mewn mosgiau a Allah wedi archebu eu codi ac y crybwyll ei enw ynddo; exalting ef ynddynt yn y bore a gyda'r nos

trans-unit.source: [Are] men whom neither commerce nor sale distracts from the remembrance of Allah and performance of prayer and giving of zakah. They fear a Day in which the hearts and eyes will [fearfully] turn about -
trans-unit.target: [Yn] ddynion y mae masnach nac yn gwerthu yn tynnu sylw oddi wrth y cofio Allah a pherfformiad gweddi a rhoi zakah. Maent yn ofni y bydd calonnau a llygaid [iawn] droi am-y dydd

trans-unit.source: That Allah may reward them [according to] the best of what they did and increase them from His bounty. And Allah gives provision to whom He wills without account.
trans-unit.target: Efallai bod Allah yn gwobrwyo [yn ôl] y gorau o'r hyn a wnaethant ac yn eu cynyddu gan ei bounty. A bydd Allah yn rhoi darpariaeth i bwy mae ef wills heb gyfrif.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieved - their deeds are like a mirage in a lowland which a thirsty one thinks is water until, when he comes to it, he finds it is nothing but finds Allah before Him, and He will pay him in full his due; and Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Ond rhai a ddysgais-eu gweithredoedd fel rhithlun yn iseldir y cred un sychedig yw dŵr tan, pan ddaw i mae'n, mae'n cael ei oes dim ond canfod Allah cyn iddo, a bydd ef wedi talu iddo yn llawn oherwydd ei; ac Allah yn gyflym yn cyfrif.

trans-unit.source: Or [they are] like darknesses within an unfathomable sea which is covered by waves, upon which are waves, over which are clouds - darknesses, some of them upon others. When one puts out his hand [therein], he can hardly see it. And he to whom Allah has not granted light - for him there is no light.
trans-unit.target: Neu [ydynt] fel darknesses o fewn môr holl feysydd hyn a gwmpesir gan y tonnau, y mae tonnau, mae dros sy'n cymylu'r-darknesses, rhai ohonynt ar eraill. Pan fydd un yn rhoi allan ei law [hynny], prin gall weld ei. Ac ef i bwy Allah nad oes gael golau-iddo ef nid oes na golau.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah is exalted by whomever is within the heavens and the earth and [by] the birds with wings spread [in flight]? Each [of them] has known his [means of] prayer and exalting [Him], and Allah is Knowing of what they do.
trans-unit.target: Nid ydych yn gweld bod yw Allah i'w mawrygu gan bwy bynnag sydd o fewn y nefoedd a'r ddaear a [gan] adar ag adenydd ledaenu [yn hedfan]? Mae pob un [ohonynt] yn hysbys ei gweddi [modd] a exalting [ei], a Allah yn gwybod yr hyn y maent yn ei wneud.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth, and to Allah is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Ac i Allah yn perthyn ddominiwn y nefoedd a'r ddaear, ac i Allah yw'r gyrchfan.
