trans-unit.source: But they turned away [refusing], so We sent upon them the flood of the dam, and We replaced their two [fields of] gardens with gardens of bitter fruit, tamarisks and something of sparse lote trees.
trans-unit.target: Ond yn troi i ffwrdd [wrthod], felly anfonwyd arnynt y llifogydd yr argae, ac yn lle eu dwy gerddi [meysydd] gyda gerddi ffrwythau chwerw, tamarisks a rhywbeth o goed lote denau.

trans-unit.source: [By] that We repaid them because they disbelieved. And do We [thus] repay except the ungrateful?
trans-unit.target: [Gan] hynny inni ad-dalu iddynt oherwydd roedd eu ddysgais. A [felly] wneud inni ad-dalu ac eithrio y anniolchgar?

trans-unit.source: And We placed between them and the cities which We had blessed [many] visible cities. And We determined between them the [distances of] journey, [saying], "Travel between them by night or day in safety."
trans-unit.target: A rhoesom rhyngddynt a'r dinasoedd sydd wedi ein bendithio [llawer o] dinasoedd gweladwy. Ac rydym yn benderfynol rhyngddynt y [pellter o] daith, [dweud], "Teithio rhyngddynt gan nos neu'r dydd mewn diogelwch."

trans-unit.source: But [insolently] they said, "Our Lord, lengthen the distance between our journeys," and wronged themselves, so We made them narrations and dispersed them in total dispersion. Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.
trans-unit.target: Ond [insolently] dywedodd, "Ein Arglwydd, ymestyn y pellter rhwng ein teithiau", a cam eu hunain, felly gwnaethom eu narrations ac eu gwasgaru yn gwasgariad y cyfanswm. Yn wir yn hynny yn arwyddion i bawb cleifion ac yn ddiolchgar.

trans-unit.source: And Iblees had already confirmed through them his assumption, so they followed him, except for a party of believers.
trans-unit.target: A Iblees eisoes wedi cadarnhau drwy iddynt ei dybio, felly roeddent yn dilyn ef, heblaw am blaid credinwyr.

trans-unit.source: And he had over them no authority except [it was decreed] that We might make evident who believes in the Hereafter from who is thereof in doubt. And your Lord, over all things, is Guardian.
trans-unit.target: Ac yr oedd dros iddynt unrhyw awdurdod ac eithrio [oedd ei a ddyfarnwyd] y gallai wneud amlwg sydd yn credu yn y o hyn ymlaen o pwy sydd ohoni mewn amheuaeth. Ac mae eich Arglwydd, dros holl bethau, yn The Guardian.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Invoke those you claim [as deities] besides Allah." They do not possess an atom's weight [of ability] in the heavens or on the earth, and they do not have therein any partnership [with Him], nor is there for Him from among them any assistant.
trans-unit.target: Dweud, [O Muhammad], "Galw'r rhai yr ydych yn honni [fel y duwdod] heblaw Allah." Nid ganddynt pwysau atom [o allu] yn y nefoedd neu ar y ddaear, ac mae eu nid Mae unrhyw bartneriaeth [gydag ef] ynddynt, ac nid oes iddo ef o blith eu unrhyw gynorthwy-ydd.

trans-unit.source: And intercession does not benefit with Him except for one whom He permits. [And those wait] until, when terror is removed from their hearts, they will say [to one another], "What has your Lord said?" They will say, "The truth." And He is the Most High, the Grand.
trans-unit.target: Ac nid yw intercession yn elwa gydag ef ac eithrio un y trwyddedau AU. [Ac mae rhai yn aros] nes, pan y terfysg yn tynnu oddi wrth eu calonnau, byddant yn dweud [i gilydd], "beth mae eich Arglwydd ddweud?" Maent yn dweud, "Y gwir." Ac ef yw y mwyaf uchel, y Grand.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who provides for you from the heavens and the earth?" Say, "Allah. And indeed, we or you are either upon guidance or in clear error."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "Pwy sy'n rhoi i chi gan y nefoedd a'r ddaear?" Dweud, "Allah. Ac yn wir, yr ydym neu gallwch naill ai ar canllawiau neu mewn camgymeriad amlwg.

trans-unit.source: Say, "You will not be asked about what we committed, and we will not be asked about what you do."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "Nid gofynnir i chi am yr hyn yr ydym wedi ymrwymo, ac nid ydym yn gofyn am yr hyn yr ydych yn ei wneud."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Our Lord will bring us together; then He will judge between us in truth. And He is the Knowing Judge."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "Bydd yr Arglwydd ein dwyn at ein gilydd; yna bydd ef yn barnu rhwng ohonom mewn gwirionedd. Ac mae y barnwr yn gwybod.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Show me those whom you have attached to Him as partners. No! Rather, He [alone] is Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "dangos i mi rheini yr ydych wedi amgáu iddo fel partneriaid. na! Yn hytrach, ef [unig] yw Allah, Exalted yn efallai, yn y doeth."

trans-unit.source: And We have not sent you except comprehensively to mankind as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. But most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: Ac nad ydym wedi anfon chi ac eithrio gynhwysfawr i ddynol ryw fel bringer o tidings da a warner. Ond nid rhan fwyaf o bobl yn gwybod.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: Ac maent yn dweud, "pryd y mae hwn addewid, os dylai fod yn eirwir?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "For you is the appointment of a Day [when] you will not remain thereafter an hour, nor will you precede [it]."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "i chi yw penodi dydd [pan] rydych yn aros ar ôl hynny awr, na bydd eich rhagflaenu [TG]."

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieve say, "We will never believe in this Qur'an nor in that before it." But if you could see when the wrongdoers are made to stand before their Lord, refuting each other's words... Those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, "If not for you, we would have been believers."
trans-unit.target: A rhai a chredu yn dweud, "bydd byth y credwn yn y Qur'an nac yn y ger ei fron." Ond pe gallech weld pan wneir y tramgwyddo i sefyll gerbron yr Arglwydd eu, gwrthbrofi gilydd y geiriau... Bydd rhai sy'n eu gormesu yn dweud i'r rhai a oedd yn drahaus, "os nad i chi, byddem wedi bod yn gredinwyr."

trans-unit.source: Those who were arrogant will say to those who were oppressed, "Did we avert you from guidance after it had come to you? Rather, you were criminals."
trans-unit.target: Bydd rheini oedd yn drahaus yn dweud i'r rhai sy'n eu gormesu, "oedd inni osgoi chi o'r canllawiau ar ôl iddo ddod i chi? Yn hytrach, yr oeddech yn troseddwyr."

trans-unit.source: Those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, "Rather, [it was your] conspiracy of night and day when you were ordering us to disbelieve in Allah and attribute to Him equals." But they will [all] confide regret when they see the punishment; and We will put shackles on the necks of those who disbelieved. Will they be recompensed except for what they used to do?
trans-unit.target: Bydd rhai sy'n eu gormesu yn dweud i'r rhai a oedd yn drahaus, "hytrach, [yr oedd eich] cynllwyn nos a dydd pan oedd chi archebu ni chredu yn Allah a hafal yn priodoli iddo." Ond bydd [holl] ymddiried gofid pan fyddant yn gweld y gosb; a byddwn yn rhoi'r hualau ar gyddfau o'r rhai a ddysgais. Bydd eu had-dalu byddant heblaw am yr hyn y maen nhw'n ei wneud?

trans-unit.source: And We did not send into a city any warner except that its affluent said, "Indeed we, in that with which you were sent, are disbelievers."
trans-unit.target: Ac na fyddem yn anfon i ddinas unrhyw warner ac eithrio bod ei cyfoethog yn dweud, "yn wir, hynny a anfonwyd atoch, yn disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: And they said, "We are more [than the believers] in wealth and children, and we are not to be punished."
trans-unit.target: A dywedodd, "Rydym yn fwy [nag y credinwyr] mewn cyfoeth a phlant, ac yr ydym ni i gael eu cosbi."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, my Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it], but most of the people do not know."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "yn wir, y mae fy Arglwydd yn ymestyn darpariaeth i bwy mae'n wills ac yn cyfyngu ar [TG], ond nid rhan fwyaf o bobl yn gwybod."

trans-unit.source: And it is not your wealth or your children that bring you nearer to Us in position, but it is [by being] one who has believed and done righteousness. For them there will be the double reward for what they did, and they will be in the upper chambers [of Paradise], safe [and secure].
trans-unit.target: Ac nid yw'n eich cyfoeth neu eich plant ddod â chi yn agosach atom ni yn y sefyllfa, ond mae'n [drwy fod yn] un sydd wedi credu a chyfiawnder i wneud. Ar eu cyfer fydd y wobr dwbl ar gyfer yr hyn a wnaethant, a byddant yn y siambrau uchaf [o baradwys], [yn ddiogel].

trans-unit.source: And the ones who strive against Our verses to cause [them] failure - those will be brought into the punishment [to remain].
trans-unit.target: A y rhai sy'n ymdrechu yn erbyn ein penillion i achosi methiant-[eu] rhai a fydd yn dod i gosb [i aros].

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, my Lord extends provision for whom He wills of His servants and restricts [it] for him. But whatever thing you spend [in His cause] - He will compensate it; and He is the best of providers."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "yn wir, y mae fy Arglwydd yn ymestyn darpariaeth ar eu cyfer mae'n wills ei gweision ac yn cyfyngu ar [TG] iddo ef. Ond beth bynnag beth ydych yn ei wario [yn ei achos ef]-ef fydd yn gwneud iawn ac ef yw'r gorau o ddarparwyr.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day when He will gather them all and then say to the angels, "Did these [people] used to worship you?"
trans-unit.target: A sôn y diwrnod pan fydd pob un ohonynt yn casglu ac wedyn yn dweud [am] i'r angylion, "oedd hyn [pobl] defnyddio i addoli chi?"

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Exalted are You! You, [O Allah], are our benefactor not them. Rather, they used to worship the jinn; most of them were believers in them."
trans-unit.target: Byddant yn dweud, "i'w mawrygu ydych! Ydych, [O Allah], yn gymwynaswr ein nid iddynt. Yn hytrach, maen nhw'n ei addoli jinn; y rhan fwyaf ohonynt yn gredinwyr yn hwy."

trans-unit.source: But today you do not hold for one another [the power of] benefit or harm, and We will say to those who wronged, "Taste the punishment of the Fire, which you used to deny."
trans-unit.target: Ond heddiw a fyddwch yn cynnal budd un [pŵer] arall neu niwed, a bydd yn dweud i'r rhai sydd yn cam, "blas y gosb y tân, a ddefnyddiwyd gennych i wadu."

trans-unit.source: And when our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, they say, "This is not but a man who wishes to avert you from that which your fathers were worshipping." And they say, "This is not except a lie invented." And those who disbelieve say of the truth when it has come to them, "This is not but obvious magic."
trans-unit.target: Ac wrth ein penillion yn roi iddynt fel dangos glir, maent yn dweud, "Nid yw hyn ond yn ddyn sy'n dymuno osgoi chi o hynny sy'n eich tadau oedd addoli." Ac maent yn dweud, "Nid yw hyn ac eithrio celwydd a ddyfeisiodd." A dywed rhai a chredu y gwirionedd pan wedi dod iddynt, "Nid dyma'r hud ond amlwg."

trans-unit.source: And We had not given them any scriptures which they could study, and We had not sent to them before you, [O Muhammad], any warner.
trans-unit.target: A ydym ni wedi iddynt unrhyw ysgrythurau sy'n gallu astudio, ac nid ydym wedi anfon iddynt cyn i chi, [O Muhammad], unrhyw warner.

trans-unit.source: And those before them denied, and the people of Makkah have not attained a tenth of what We had given them. But the former peoples denied My messengers, so how [terrible] was My reproach.
trans-unit.target: A hynny cyn iddynt wadu, a phobl o blentyndod heb gyrraedd un rhan o ddeg o'r hyn yr ydym wedi rhoi iddynt. Ond gwadodd bobloedd hen fy negeswyr, felly sut oedd [ofnadwy] fy gwbl ddi-fai.

trans-unit.source: Say, "I only advise you of one [thing] - that you stand for Allah, [seeking truth] in pairs and individually, and then give thought." There is not in your companion any madness. He is only a warner to you before a severe punishment.
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "Yr unig eich cynghori un [peth]-nad ydych yn sefyll ar gyfer Allah, [chwilio am wirionedd] mewn parau ac yn unigol, ac yna rhoi meddwl." Nid oes yn eich cydymaith unrhyw gwallgofrwydd. Mae warner dim ond i chi cyn cosb difrifol.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Whatever payment I might have asked of you - it is yours. My payment is only from Allah, and He is, over all things, Witness."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "beth bynnag taliad yr wyf efallai wedi gofyn ichi-mae'n gywir. Fy taliad yn unig gan Allah, a dros holl bethau, mae'n dyst."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, my Lord projects the truth. Knower of the unseen."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "yn wir, y mae fy Arglwydd yn prosiectau y gwir. Knower y unseen."

trans-unit.source: Say, "The truth has come, and falsehood can neither begin [anything] nor repeat [it]."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "Daeth y gwir, ac nid anwiredd Gall dechrau [Dim] nac ailadrodd [TG]."

trans-unit.source: Say, "If I should err, I would only err against myself. But if I am guided, it is by what my Lord reveals to me. Indeed, He is Hearing and near."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "os dylai yr piau hi, byddai yr unig piau hi erbyn fi fy hun. Ond os fe 'm cyfarwyddir, drwy hyn yn datgelu fy Arglwydd i mi. Yn wir, ei fod yn clywed, ac agos.

trans-unit.source: And if you could see when they are terrified but there is no escape, and they will be seized from a place nearby.
trans-unit.target: Ac os gallech weld pan maent yn arswydo rhag ond nid oes dim dianc, a bydd yn ei atafaelu o le gerllaw.

trans-unit.source: And they will [then] say, "We believe in it!" But how for them will be the taking [of faith] from a place far away?
trans-unit.target: A byddant yn dweud [yna], "Credwn ynddo!" Ond sut ar eu cyfer fydd cymryd [ffydd] o le pell i ffwrdd?

trans-unit.source: And they had already disbelieved in it before and would assault the unseen from a place far away.
trans-unit.target: Ac wedi iddynt eisoes yn blaen a ddysgais byddai ymosodiad unseen o le pell i ffwrdd.

trans-unit.source: And prevention will be placed between them and what they desire, as was done with their kind before. Indeed, they were in disquieting denial.
trans-unit.target: A bydd atal gosod rhyngddynt a beth yn eu dymuno, fel y gwnaethpwyd gyda eu math cyn. Yn wir, yr oeddent yn gwadu cyferbyniol.

trans-unit.source: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Creator of the heavens and the earth, [who] made the angels messengers having wings, two or three or four. He increases in creation what He wills. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Canmoliaeth [bob] yn [] i Allah, Crëwr y nefoedd a'r ddaear, sy'n gwneud yr angylion negeswyr cael adenydd, dau neu dri neu bedwar. Mae ef yn cynyddu yn creu beth a wills ef. Yn wir, yw Allah dros holl bethau yn gymwys.

trans-unit.source: Whatever Allah grants to people of mercy - none can withhold it; and whatever He withholds - none can release it thereafter. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Beth bynnag mae'r Allah yn grantiau i bobl o drugaredd-dim gall atal; a beth bynnag yw ei fod yn atal-dim gellir ei rhyddhau ar ôl hynny. Ac ef yw Exalted yn efallai, yn y doeth.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, remember the favor of Allah upon you. Is there any creator other than Allah who provides for you from the heaven and earth? There is no deity except Him, so how are you deluded?
trans-unit.target: O dynolryw, cofio favor Allah arnoch. A oes unrhyw crëwr ac eithrio Allah sy'n darparu i chi gan y nefoedd a'r ddaear? Nid oes unrhyw Dduwdod ac eithrio ef, felly sut y byddwch yn deluded?

trans-unit.source: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad] - already were messengers denied before you. And to Allah are returned [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: Ac os maent yn gwadu'r chi, [O Muhammad]-eisoes yn negeswyr gwadu ger eich bron. Ac i Allah yn dychwelyd [holl] materion.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, indeed the promise of Allah is truth, so let not the worldly life delude you and be not deceived about Allah by the Deceiver.
trans-unit.target: O dynolryw, yn wir yr addewid Allah yw gwir, felly gadewch nid oes worldly twyllo chi a ni yn twyllo am Allah drwy y Deceiver.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Satan is an enemy to you; so take him as an enemy. He only invites his party to be among the companions of the Blaze.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y mae Satan yn elyn i chi; felly fynd ag ef fel gelyn. Dim ond mae'n gwahodd ei blaid i fod ymysg y cymdeithion yr holl.

trans-unit.source: Those who disbelieve will have a severe punishment, and those who believe and do righteous deeds will have forgiveness and great reward.
trans-unit.target: Bydd rhai a chredu yn cael cosb difrifol, a bydd rhai sydd yn credu ac yn gwneud gweithredoedd hoes dabloid maddeuant a gwobrwyo mawr.

trans-unit.source: Then is one to whom the evil of his deed has been made attractive so he considers it good [like one rightly guided]? For indeed, Allah sends astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. So do not let yourself perish over them in regret. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what they do.
trans-unit.target: Yna yw un y mae drygioni ei weithred wedi'i deniadol fel y mae'n ystyried ei da [fel un a oedd yn tywys yn gywir]? Ar gyfer yn wir, mae'r Allah yn anfon ar gyfeiliorn pwy ef wills a hysbysiadau y mae ef yn wills. Felly peidiwch â gadael eich hun yn dirywio dros iddynt mewn gofid. Yn wir, Allah yn gwybod yr hyn y maent yn ei wneud.

trans-unit.source: And it is Allah who sends the winds, and they stir the clouds, and We drive them to a dead land and give life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness. Thus is the resurrection.
trans-unit.target: Ac mae'n Allah sy'n anfon y gwyntoedd, a mae nhw'n trowch y cymylau, ac rydym yn eu gyrru i dir marw a rhoi bywyd y ddaear ac felly ar ôl ei lifelessness. Felly yn yr atgyfodiad.

trans-unit.source: Whoever desires honor [through power] - then to Allah belongs all honor. To Him ascends good speech, and righteous work raises it. But they who plot evil deeds will have a severe punishment, and the plotting of those - it will perish.
trans-unit.target: Pwy bynnag mae'r fraint [drwy bŵer]-wedyn i Allah yn perthyn yn fraint holl dyheadau. I mae ef yn esgyn araith dda, ac mae gwaith hoes dabloid yn codi ei. Ond bydd sy'n llain gweithredoedd anfad ganddynt cosb difrifol, ac y cynllwynio o'r rheini-bydd yn darfod.

trans-unit.source: And Allah created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop; then He made you mates. And no female conceives nor does she give birth except with His knowledge. And no aged person is granted [additional] life nor is his lifespan lessened but that it is in a register. Indeed, that for Allah is easy.
trans-unit.target: A Creodd Allah chi o'r llwch, yna o ostyngiad sberm; Yna gwnaeth eich ffrindiau. Ac mae unrhyw fenyw yn dyfeisio nac yn hi roi genedigaeth ac eithrio gyda ei wybodaeth. A rhoddir neb oed bywyd [ychwanegol] nac yn ei oes yn lleihau, ond ei fod mewn cofrestr. Yn wir, ar gyfer Allah yn hawdd.

trans-unit.source: And not alike are the two bodies of water. One is fresh and sweet, palatable for drinking, and one is salty and bitter. And from each you eat tender meat and extract ornaments which you wear, and you see the ships plowing through [them] that you might seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful.
trans-unit.target: Ac nid fel ei gilydd yn y ddau gorff o ddŵr. Un yw melys a blasus ar gyfer yfed, ffres, ac un yn hallt a chwerw. Ac o bob un ydych yn bwyta cig tendr ac echdynnu addurniadau a ydych yn gwisgo, a ydych yn gweld y llongau a plowing drwy [eu] Efallai byddwch yn ceisio o ei bounty; ac efallai y byddwch yn ddiolchgar.

trans-unit.source: He causes the night to enter the day, and He causes the day to enter the night and has subjected the sun and the moon - each running [its course] for a specified term. That is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs sovereignty. And those whom you invoke other than Him do not possess [as much as] the membrane of a date seed.
trans-unit.target: Mae ef yn achosi y nos i fynd y diwrnod, ac mae'n achosi y diwrnod i ddod y noson ac wedi dioddef yr haul a'r lleuad-rhedeg pob [ei gwrs] am gyfnod penodedig. Dyna Allah, eich Arglwydd; iddo ef y perthyn sofraniaeth. A rheini yr ydych yn galw'r eraill nag ef oes ganddynt [fel] y bilen had dyddiad.

trans-unit.source: If you invoke them, they do not hear your supplication; and if they heard, they would not respond to you. And on the Day of Resurrection they will deny your association. And none can inform you like [one] Acquainted [with all matters].
trans-unit.target: Os ydych yn galw'r iddynt, nid ydynt yn clywed eich supplication; ac os Clywodd, fyddant yn ymateb i chi. Ac ar y dydd atgyfodi gwnânt wadu eich cymdeithas. A gall unrhyw un yn eich hysbysu fel Acquainted [un] [gyda holl faterion].

trans-unit.source: O mankind, you are those in need of Allah, while Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: O dynolryw, ydych yn rhai sydd angen Allah, tra bod Allah yn rhad ac am ddim o angen, y Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: If He wills, He can do away with you and bring forth a new creation.
trans-unit.target: Os mae ef wills, ef wneud i ffwrdd â chi ac yn cyflwyno creu newydd.

trans-unit.source: And that is for Allah not difficult.
trans-unit.target: A dyna i Allah yn anodd.

trans-unit.source: And no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. And if a heavily laden soul calls [another] to [carry some of] its load, nothing of it will be carried, even if he should be a close relative. You can only warn those who fear their Lord unseen and have established prayer. And whoever purifies himself only purifies himself for [the benefit of] his soul. And to Allah is the [final] destination.
trans-unit.target: A bydd unrhyw cludo o'r beichiau yn ysgwyddo'r baich o un arall. Ac os Geilw enaid drwm llwythog [arall] i [rai o'r] Bydd cynnal ei llwyth, nid oes dim ohono, hyd yn oed os dylai fod yn berthynas agos. Dim ond chi all rhybuddio rheini sy'n ofni eu unseen Arglwydd ac wedi sefydlu gweddi. Ac mae pwy bynnag buro ei hun dim ond buro ei hun ar gyfer [budd] ei enaid. Ac i Allah yw cyrchfan [terfynol].

trans-unit.source: Not equal are the blind and the seeing,
trans-unit.target: Nid cyfartal yn y Deillion a gweld,

trans-unit.source: Nor are the darknesses and the light,
trans-unit.target: Nac yn y darknesses ac yn y goleuni,

trans-unit.source: Nor are the shade and the heat,
trans-unit.target: Nac yn y cysgod a gwres,

trans-unit.source: And not equal are the living and the dead. Indeed, Allah causes to hear whom He wills, but you cannot make hear those in the graves.
trans-unit.target: Ac nid cyfartal yn byw a meirw. Yn wir, mae'r Allah yn achosi i glywed y mae ef yn wills, ond ni allwch wneud hynny yn y Beddau glywed.

trans-unit.source: You, [O Muhammad], are not but a warner.
trans-unit.target: [O Muhammad], nad ydych ond warner.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have sent you with the truth as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. And there was no nation but that there had passed within it a warner.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, rydym wedi anfon atoch gyda y gwir fel bringer o tidings da a warner. Ac nid oedd unrhyw genedl, ond y mae wedi ei basio o fewn ei warner.

trans-unit.source: And if they deny you - then already have those before them denied. Their messengers came to them with clear proofs and written ordinances and with the enlightening Scripture.
trans-unit.target: Ac os maent yn gwadu'r chi-yna eisoes wedi hynny cyn eu gwadu. Daeth eu negeswyr iddynt â proflenni clir a deunyddiau ysgrifenedig a'r ysgrythur ddadlennol.

trans-unit.source: Then I seized the ones who disbelieved, and how [terrible] was My reproach.
trans-unit.target: Ac yna rwy'n yn hatafaelu y rhai a ddysgais, a sut oedd [ofnadwy] fy gwbl ddi-fai.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky, and We produce thereby fruits of varying colors? And in the mountains are tracts, white and red of varying shades and [some] extremely black.
trans-unit.target: Nid ydych yn gweld y bydd Allah yn anfon i lawr glaw o'r awyr, ac rydym yn cynhyrchu gan ffrwyth y lliwiau amrywiol? Ac yn y mynyddoedd yn rhannau, Gwyn a choch amrywiol cysgodion a [rai] ddu iawn.

trans-unit.source: And among people and moving creatures and grazing livestock are various colors similarly. Only those fear Allah, from among His servants, who have knowledge. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Ac ymhlith pobl a symud creaduriaid a pori da byw yn lliwiau gwahanol yn yr un modd. Dim ond y rhai yn ofni Allah, o blith ei weision, sydd â gwybodaeth. Yn wir, yw Allah i'w mawrygu yn allai a Forgiving.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who recite the Book of Allah and establish prayer and spend [in His cause] out of what We have provided them, secretly and publicly, [can] expect a profit that will never perish -
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, gyfrinachol ac yn gyhoeddus, [Gall] rheini sy'n adrodd llyfr Allah a sefydlu gweddi a gwariant [yn ei achos ef] allan o'r hyn yr ydym wedi ei darparu iddynt, yn disgwyl elw y bydd marw byth –

trans-unit.source: That He may give them in full their rewards and increase for them of His bounty. Indeed, He is Forgiving and Appreciative.
trans-unit.target: Y gall roi iddynt eu gwobrau yn llawn ac iddynt am ei bounty yn cynyddu. Yn wir, mae Forgiving a Appreciative.

trans-unit.source: And that which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], of the Book is the truth, confirming what was before it. Indeed, Allah, of His servants, is Acquainted and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Ac a ydym wedi datgelu i chi, [O Muhammad], y llyfr dyna'r gwir, cadarnhau beth oedd ger ei fron. Yn wir, yw Allah, ei weision, yn gyfarwydd a gweld.

trans-unit.source: Then we caused to inherit the Book those We have chosen of Our servants; and among them is he who wrongs himself, and among them is he who is moderate, and among them is he who is foremost in good deeds by permission of Allah. That [inheritance] is what is the great bounty.
trans-unit.target: Rydym wedyn yn achosi i etifeddu y llyfr rheini yr ydym wedi dewis ein gweision; ac yn eu plith mae ef a wrongs ei hun, ac yn eu plith mae ef sydd yn gymedrol, ac yn eu plith mae ef sydd yn bennaf mewn gweithredoedd da drwy ganiatâd Allah. [Etifeddiaeth] yw beth yn y bounty mawr.

trans-unit.source: [For them are] gardens of perpetual residence which they will enter. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearls, and their garments therein will be silk.
trans-unit.target: [Iddynt, eu] gerddi preswylio parhaol sy'n maent yn mynd iddo. Bydd eu addurno'r ynddo gyda breichledau o aur a pearls, ac eu gwisgoedd ynddo fydd silk.

trans-unit.source: And they will say, "Praise to Allah, who has removed from us [all] sorrow. Indeed, our Lord is Forgiving and Appreciative -
trans-unit.target: A byddant yn dweud, "canmoliaeth i Allah, sydd wedi tynnu oddi ar ein [holl] tristwch. Yn wir, ein Arglwydd yn Forgiving a Appreciative-

trans-unit.source: He who has settled us in the home of duration out of His bounty. There touches us not in it any fatigue, and there touches us not in it weariness [of mind]."
trans-unit.target: Ef sydd wedi inni setlo yn y cartref o hyd y tu allan ei bounty. Mae ein cyffwrdd ni ynddo unrhyw blinder, ac mae ein cyffwrdd ni yn ei flinder [o feddwl]."

trans-unit.source: And for those who disbelieve will be the fire of Hell. [Death] is not decreed for them so they may die, nor will its torment be lightened for them. Thus do we recompense every ungrateful one.
trans-unit.target: Ac ar gyfer rhai a chredu yn y tân uffern. Nid yw [marwolaeth] a ddyfarnwyd iddynt fel y gallant farw, ac ni Bydd ysgafnhau ei boen iddynt. Felly rydym yn gwneud taliad bob un anniolchgar.

trans-unit.source: And they will cry out therein, "Our Lord, remove us; we will do righteousness - other than what we were doing!" But did We not grant you life enough for whoever would remember therein to remember, and the warner had come to you? So taste [the punishment], for there is not for the wrongdoers any helper.
trans-unit.target: A bydd eu crio ynddo, "ein Arglwydd, cael gwared ni; Byddwn yn gwneud chyfiawnder i-ac eithrio beth yr oeddem yn ei wneud!" Ond oedd nid ydym am roi eich bywyd yn ddigon ar gyfer pwy bynnag fyddai cofio ynddynt i gofio, ac roedd y warner wedi dod i chi? Felly Flas [y gosb], am nad oes ar gyfer y tramgwyddo unrhyw gynorthwy-ydd.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah is Knower of the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and earth. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, Allah yw Knower unseen [agweddau] y nefoedd a'r ddaear. Yn wir, ei fod yn gwybod hynny o fewn y bronnau.

trans-unit.source: It is He who has made you successors upon the earth. And whoever disbelieves - upon him will be [the consequence of] his disbelief. And the disbelief of the disbelievers does not increase them in the sight of their Lord except in hatred; and the disbelief of the disbelievers does not increase them except in loss.
trans-unit.target: Mae'n ef sydd wedi gwneud eich olynwyr ar wyneb y ddaear. A disbelieves bwy bynnag-arno fydd [o ganlyniad i] ei anghrediniaeth. Ac nad yw'n anghrediniaeth o y disbelievers yn eu cynyddu yn y golwg ar eu Arglwydd ac eithrio yn gasineb; ac nad yw'n anghrediniaeth o y disbelievers yn cynyddu eu ac eithrio yn colli.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you considered your 'partners' whom you invoke besides Allah? Show me what they have created from the earth, or have they partnership [with Him] in the heavens? Or have We given them a book so they are [standing] on evidence therefrom? [No], rather, the wrongdoers do not promise each other except delusion."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "ydych chi wedi ystyried eich 'partneriaid' bwy ydych yn galw'r ar wahân i Allah? Dangos i mi beth y maent wedi ei greu o'r ddaear, neu eu partneriaeth [gydag ef] yn y nefoedd? Neu yr ydym wedi rhoi llyfr felly mae nhw [sefyll] ar dystiolaeth thelir? [Na], yn hytrach, y tramgwyddo peidio â rhoi addewid gilydd ac eithrio rhithdyb."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah holds the heavens and the earth, lest they cease. And if they should cease, no one could hold them [in place] after Him. Indeed, He is Forbearing and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae'r Allah yn cynnal y nefoedd a'r ddaear, rhag ofn iddynt orffen. Ac os dylai maent yn dod i ben, gallai unrhyw un ddal [yn] ar ôl iddo. Yn wir, mae Forbearing a Forgiving.

trans-unit.source: And they swore by Allah their strongest oaths that if a warner came to them, they would be more guided than [any] one of the [previous] nations. But when a warner came to them, it did not increase them except in aversion.
trans-unit.target: Ac roedd eu arnyn gan Allah eu llwon cryfaf y byddent dan arweiniad mwy nag [unrhyw] un o'r Cenhedloedd [blaenorol] os daeth warner iddynt. Ond pan ddaeth warner iddynt, nad oedd wedi cynyddu eu ac eithrio mewn gwrthwynebiad.

trans-unit.source: [Due to] arrogance in the land and plotting of evil; but the evil plot does not encompass except its own people. Then do they await except the way of the former peoples? But you will never find in the way of Allah any change, and you will never find in the way of Allah any alteration.
trans-unit.target: [Oherwydd] haerllugrwydd yn y tir a'r cynllwynio o ddrygioni; ond nid yw y dieflig yn cynnwys heblaw am bobl ei hun. Wedyn wneud iddynt aros am heblaw y ffordd o bobloedd gynt? Ond ni fyddwch yn gwybod yn y ffordd o Allah unrhyw newid, ac ni fyddwch yn gwybod rhwystro Allah unrhyw newid.

trans-unit.source: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? And they were greater than them in power. But Allah is not to be caused failure by anything in the heavens or on the earth. Indeed, He is ever Knowing and Competent.
trans-unit.target: Maent wedi nid un drwy'r tir ac arsylwi sut yr oedd diwedd y rheini cyn iddynt? Ac roeddent yn fwy na hwy mewn grym. Ond nid yw Allah yn achosi methiant gan unrhyw beth yn y nefoedd neu ar y ddaear. Yn wir, mae'n gwybod erioed ac yn gymwys.

trans-unit.source: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for what they have earned, He would not leave upon the earth any creature. But He defers them for a specified term. And when their time comes, then indeed Allah has ever been, of His servants, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Ac os Allah yn gosod bai ar bobl am yr hyn y maent wedi ei ennill, byddai ef ni adael ar wyneb y ddaear unrhyw creature. Ond mae ef yn eu gohirio am gyfnod penodedig. A pan ddaw eu tro, Allah yn wir yna erioed, ei weision, weld.

trans-unit.source: Ya, Seen.
trans-unit.target: YA, gweld.

trans-unit.source: By the wise Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Gan y Qur'an ddoeth.

trans-unit.source: Indeed you, [O Muhammad], are from among the messengers,
trans-unit.target: Ydych yn wir, [O Muhammad], o blith y negeswyr,

trans-unit.source: On a straight path.
trans-unit.target: Ar lwybr syth.

trans-unit.source: [This is] a revelation of the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,
trans-unit.target: [Mae hyn] yn ddatguddiad o Exalted yn efallai, Merciful,

trans-unit.source: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware.
trans-unit.target: Bod efallai rhybuddio pobl na chawsant eu cyndadau eu rhybuddio, fel eu bod yn ymwybodol.

trans-unit.source: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Eisoes mae y gair yn dod i rym ar y rhan fwyaf ohonynt, fel nad ydynt yn credu.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads [kept] aloft.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yr ydym wedi rhoi hualau ar eu gyddfau, a ydynt am eu chins, felly maent yn gyda phenaethiaid [cadw] aloft.

trans-unit.source: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see.
trans-unit.target: Ac rydym wedi rhoi ger eu bron yn rhwystr a tu ôl iddynt yn rhwystr ac yn ymdrin â hwy, felly nid ydynt yn gweld.

trans-unit.source: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.
trans-unit.target: Ac mae pob un ar eu cyfer p'un a ydych yn eu rhybuddio neu wneud eu rhybuddio-nad ydynt yn credu.

trans-unit.source: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Merciful unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and noble reward.
trans-unit.target: Gall eich unig rhybuddio un sy'n dilyn y neges ac ofnau unseen mwyaf tosturiol. Felly roi iddo tidings da maddeuant a gwobr aruchel.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and what they left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae'n ein sy'n dwyn y meirw i fywyd a chofnodi beth maent wedi ei rhoi ymlaen a beth maent yn ei gadael ar ôl, a holl bethau rydym wedi cyfrif mewn cofrestr clir.

trans-unit.source: And present to them an example: the people of the city, when the messengers came to it -
trans-unit.target: A chyflwyno iddynt yn enghraifft: pobl y ddinas, pan ddaeth y Negeswyr erbyn iddo-

trans-unit.source: When We sent to them two but they denied them, so We strengthened them with a third, and they said, "Indeed, we are messengers to you."
trans-unit.target: Pan anfonwyd at eu dau, ond gwadodd maent hwy, felly rydym yn cryfhau eu gyda thraean, a dywedodd, "Yn wir, rydym yn negeswyr i chi."

trans-unit.source: They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies."
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "nad ydych ond bodau dynol fel ninnau, a dangosodd fwyaf Merciful nid peth. A ydych yn unig yn dweud celwyddau."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you,
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd, "Mae ein Arglwydd yn gwybod ein bod yn negeswyr i chi,

trans-unit.source: And we are not responsible except for clear notification."
trans-unit.target: Ac nid ydym yn gyfrifol ac eithrio hysbysiad clir."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Indeed, we consider you a bad omen. If you do not desist, we will surely stone you, and there will surely touch you, from us, a painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "yn wir, credwn ichi beth drwg. Os nad ydych yn ymatal, rydym sicr bydd cerrig chi ac yna bydd siawns cyffwrdd chi, oddi wrthym ni, cosbi poenus.

trans-unit.source: They said, "Your omen is with yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? Rather, you are a transgressing people."
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "Mae eich beth gyda chi. Ai oherwydd Atgoffwyd chi? Yn hytrach, yr ydych yn bobl sy'n camweddu sawl gwaith."

trans-unit.source: And there came from the farthest end of the city a man, running. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers.
trans-unit.target: A deuai dyn, yn rhedeg o ddiwedd pella y ddinas. Dywedodd, 'O fy pobl, dilyn y negeswyr.

trans-unit.source: Follow those who do not ask of you [any] payment, and they are [rightly] guided.
trans-unit.target: Ddilyn y rhai sydd ddim yn gofyn [unrhyw] eich taliad, ac yn eu harwain [iawn].

trans-unit.source: And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned?
trans-unit.target: A pam na ddylai addoli ef pwy a greodd mi a i bwy ydych byddwn yn dychwelyd?

trans-unit.source: Should I take other than Him [false] deities [while], if the Most Merciful intends for me some adversity, their intercession will not avail me at all, nor can they save me?
trans-unit.target: Dylai yn cymryd heblaw duwdod ef [anwir] [tra bod], os mae'r mwyaf tosturiol yn bwriadu i mi ryw adfyd, bydd eu intercession ni fanteisio ar mi o gwbl, nac ychwaith gallant arbed mi?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I would then be in manifest error.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yna byddwn mewn camgymeriad amlwg.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me."
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yr wyf wedi credu yn eich Arglwydd, felly gwrandewch i mi."

trans-unit.source: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know
trans-unit.target: Dywedwyd, "Rhowch baradwys." Meddai, "Hoffwn pe gallai fy pobl yn gwybod

trans-unit.source: Of how my Lord has forgiven me and placed me among the honored."
trans-unit.target: Sut fy Arglwydd wedi maddau i mi ac mi gosod ymhlith y honored."

trans-unit.source: And We did not send down upon his people after him any soldiers from the heaven, nor would We have done so.
trans-unit.target: Ac na fyddem yn anfon i lawr ar ei bobl ar ôl iddo unrhyw milwyr gan y nefoedd, na byddai wedi gwneud hynny.

trans-unit.source: It was not but one shout, and immediately they were extinguished.
trans-unit.target: Nid oedd ond un gweiddi, ac ar unwaith maent yn diffodd.

trans-unit.source: How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him.
trans-unit.target: Sut destun gofid am y gweision. Mae na ddaeth iddynt unrhyw negesydd heblaw y maen nhw'n ei gwawdio ef.

trans-unit.source: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them - that they to them will not return?
trans-unit.target: Nid ydynt wedi ystyried faint o genedlaethau ydym yn dinistrio cyn iddynt-y bydd iddynt yn dychwelyd?

trans-unit.source: And indeed, all of them will yet be brought present before Us.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, bydd pob un ohonynt yn dod eto bresennol ger ein bron.

trans-unit.source: And a sign for them is the dead earth. We have brought it to life and brought forth from it grain, and from it they eat.
trans-unit.target: Ac arwydd iddynt yn y ddaear wedi marw. Rydym wedi i fywyd a dwyn ymlaen gan ei grawn, ac maent yn bwyta ohono.

trans-unit.source: And We placed therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines and caused to burst forth therefrom some springs -
trans-unit.target: Ac yr ydym yn gosod ynddo gerddi o goed palmwydd a gwinwydden ac yn achosi i byrstio blaen thelir rhai ffynhonnau-

trans-unit.source: That they may eat of His fruit. And their hands have not produced it, so will they not be grateful?
trans-unit.target: Y gall fwyta ei ffrwythau. Ac nid eu dwylo wedi cynhyrchu, felly ni fyddant yn ddiolchgar?

trans-unit.source: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows and from themselves and from that which they do not know.
trans-unit.target: I'w mawrygu yw ef a greodd bob parau-o hyn y ddaear sy'n tyfu ac o eu hunain ac o'r hyn a nad ydynt yn gwybod.

trans-unit.source: And a sign for them is the night. We remove from it [the light of] day, so they are [left] in darkness.
trans-unit.target: Ac arwydd iddynt yn y nos. Rydym yn tynnu oddi ar ei [golau] dydd, felly maent yn [Gadawodd] yn y tywyllwch.

trans-unit.source: And the sun runs [on course] toward its stopping point. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: A Rhed yr haul [ar gwrs] tuag at ei man aros. Dyna'r penderfyniad y Exalted yn gwybod y gallai.

trans-unit.source: And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns [appearing] like the old date stalk.
trans-unit.target: Ac y lleuad-yr ydym wedi penderfynu ar gyfer gyflwyno'r, nes ei ffurflenni [ymddangos] fel y coesyn dyddiad hen.

trans-unit.source: It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each, in an orbit, is swimming.
trans-unit.target: Nid yw'n a ganiateir ar gyfer yr haul i gyrraedd y lleuad, nac yw'n oddiweddyd y dydd, y nos, ond mae pob un, mewn orbit, nofio.

trans-unit.source: And a sign for them is that We carried their forefathers in a laden ship.
trans-unit.target: Ac arwydd eu bod yn cael eu cyndadau yn llong yn llwythog.

trans-unit.source: And We created for them from the likes of it that which they ride.
trans-unit.target: Ac rydym wedi creu ar eu cyfer rhwng hoff ohono a Manteisiant.

trans-unit.source: And if We should will, We could drown them; then no one responding to a cry would there be for them, nor would they be saved
trans-unit.target: Ac os dylai fydd gennym, gallem yn boddi yna unrhyw un ymateb i'r cri a fyddai ar eu cyfer, ac ni fyddai'n eu hachub

trans-unit.source: Except as a mercy from Us and provision for a time.
trans-unit.target: Ac eithrio fel drugaredd oddi wrthym ni ac darpariaeth ar gyfer amser.

trans-unit.source: But when it is said to them, "Beware of what is before you and what is behind you; perhaps you will receive mercy... "
trans-unit.target: Ond pan mae'n cael ei ddweud wrthynt, "Gochelwch beth cyn chi a beth sydd tu ôl i chi; Efallai y byddwch yn derbyn drugaredd... "

trans-unit.source: And no sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord except that they are from it turning away.
trans-unit.target: A daw'r oes arwydd iddynt o arwyddion eu Arglwydd heblaw y maent yn ei droi i ffwrdd.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Spend from that which Allah has provided for you," those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Should we feed one whom, if Allah had willed, He would have fed? You are not but in clear error."
trans-unit.target: A rhai a chredu pan ddywedir iddynt, "Gwariant o hynny sy'n Allah wedi darparu ar gyfer chi," dywed i'r rhai sydd yn credu, "dylai fwydo un ohonynt, os oedd Allah ewyllysio iddi, byddai wedi bwydo? Nid ydych yn ond mewn camgymeriad amlwg."

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: Ac maent yn dweud, "pryd y mae hwn addewid, os dylai fod yn eirwir?"

trans-unit.source: They do not await except one blast which will seize them while they are disputing.
trans-unit.target: Wneud iddynt aros am ac eithrio un chwyth sy'n ymafael ynddynt tra byddant yn dadlau.

trans-unit.source: And they will not be able [to give] any instruction, nor to their people can they return.
trans-unit.target: Ac na fyddant yn gallu [rhoi] unrhyw gyfarwyddyd, ac ni allant ddychwelyd at eu pobl.

trans-unit.source: And the Horn will be blown; and at once from the graves to their Lord they will hasten.
trans-unit.target: A bydd chwythu y corn; ac ar unwaith o feddau i eu Arglwydd y bydd iddynt brysuro.

trans-unit.source: They will say, "O woe to us! Who has raised us up from our sleeping place?" [The reply will be], "This is what the Most Merciful had promised, and the messengers told the truth."
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "O wae i ni! Sydd wedi codi ein hyd o ein lle cysgu?" [Fydd yr ateb], "Dyma beth y mae fwyaf Merciful wedi addo, a dywedodd y negeswyr y gwir."

trans-unit.source: It will not be but one blast, and at once they are all brought present before Us.
trans-unit.target: Ni fydd ond un chwyth, ac ar unwaith maent i gyd yn cyrraedd bresennol ger ein bron.

trans-unit.source: So today no soul will be wronged at all, and you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: Felly heddiw y bydd cam ym mhob oes enaid, a bydd eich nid eu had-dalu ac eithrio beth yr ydych yn ei defnyddio i wneud.

trans-unit.source: Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in [joyful] occupation -
trans-unit.target: Yn wir y cymdeithion o baradwys, y dydd, yn ddoniol mewn galwedigaeth [llawen]-

trans-unit.source: They and their spouses - in shade, reclining on adorned couches.
trans-unit.target: Maent yn ac yn eu priod-yn cysgod, ledorwedd gyda hi ar addurno'r gwelyau.

trans-unit.source: For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request [or wish]
trans-unit.target: Iddynt hwy ynddo yn ffrwythau, ac iddynt hwy yn beth bynnag y maent yn gofyn am [neu yn dymuno]

trans-unit.source: [And] "Peace," a word from a Merciful Lord.
trans-unit.target: [A] "Heddwch," gair o'r Arglwydd tosturiol.

trans-unit.source: [Then He will say], "But stand apart today, you criminals.
trans-unit.target: [Yna bydd yn dweud], "ond sefyll ar wahân heddiw, chi troseddwyr.

trans-unit.source: Did I not enjoin upon you, O children of Adam, that you not worship Satan - [for] indeed, he is to you a clear enemy -
trans-unit.target: Nid oedd yr enjoin arnoch, O plant o Adam, bod nad ydych yn addoli Satan-[am] yn wir, mae'n eich gelyn clir-

trans-unit.source: And that you worship [only] Me? This is a straight path.
trans-unit.target: Ac y mae eich addoli [ond] mi? Dyma lwybr syth.

trans-unit.source: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason?
trans-unit.target: Ac roedd ei fod eisoes wedi arwain ar gyfeiliorn o blith eich llawer o greu, felly na wnaethoch chi ddefnyddio rheswm?

trans-unit.source: This is the Hellfire which you were promised.
trans-unit.target: Mae hyn yn Hellfire a addawyd gennych.

trans-unit.source: [Enter to] burn therein today for what you used to deny."
trans-unit.target: [[Rhowch i] yn llosgi ynddo heddiw am beth yr ydych yn ei defnyddio i wadu. "

trans-unit.source: That Day, We will seal over their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify about what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Y diwrnod hwnnw, bydd yn sêl dros eu cegau, a bydd eu dwylo yn siarad â ni, a bydd eu traed yn tystio am beth y maen nhw'n ei ennill.

trans-unit.source: And if We willed, We could have obliterated their eyes, and they would race to [find] the path, and how could they see?
trans-unit.target: Ac os ydym yn ewyllysio iddi, gallai wedi dileu eu llygaid, a byddai eu hil i [canfod] y llwybr, a sut y gallent weld?

trans-unit.source: And if We willed, We could have deformed them, [paralyzing them] in their places so they would not be able to proceed, nor could they return.
trans-unit.target: Ac os ydym yn ewyllysio iddi, gallai Rydym wedi wedi ei gamffurfio iddynt, [paralyzing hwy] yn eu lleoedd felly ni byddent yn gallu bwrw ymlaen, neu gallent fynd yn ôl.

trans-unit.source: And he to whom We grant long life We reverse in creation; so will they not understand?
trans-unit.target: Ac ef y grant ein bywyd hir inni wrthdroi'r yn creu; Felly ni fyddant yn deall?

trans-unit.source: And We did not give Prophet Muhammad, knowledge of poetry, nor is it befitting for him. It is not but a message and a clear Qur'an
trans-unit.target: Ac ni roddodd Proffwyd Muhammad, gwybodaeth barddoniaeth, nac yn ei addas iddo. Nid yw ond neges a Qur'an clir

trans-unit.source: To warn whoever is alive and justify the word against the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: I rybuddio pwy bynnag sydd yn fyw ac yn cyfiawnhau y gair yn erbyn y disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: Do they not see that We have created for them from what Our hands have made, grazing livestock, and [then] they are their owners?
trans-unit.target: Nid ydynt yn gweld bod yr ydym wedi creu ar eu cyfer o beth wedi ein dwylo, pori da byw, ac [yna] maent yn eu perchnogion?

trans-unit.source: And We have tamed them for them, so some of them they ride, and some of them they eat.
trans-unit.target: Ac wedi tamed iddynt ar eu cyfer, felly rhai ohonynt eu reidio, a rhai ohonynt y maent yn ei fwyta.

trans-unit.source: And for them therein are [other] benefits and drinks, so will they not be grateful?
trans-unit.target: Ac ar eu cyfer yn erthyglau [arall] manteision a diodydd, felly ni fyddant yn ddiolchgar?

trans-unit.source: But they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that perhaps they would be helped.
trans-unit.target: Ond maent wedi eu cymryd yn ogystal â duwdod Allah [anwir] bod efallai byddai'n eu helpu.

trans-unit.source: They are not able to help them, and they [themselves] are for them soldiers in attendance.
trans-unit.target: Nid ydynt yn gallu eu helpu, ac maent [eu hunain] yn i filwyr iddynt yn bresennol.

trans-unit.source: So let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, We know what they conceal and what they declare.
trans-unit.target: Felly gadewch nid eu araith grieve chi. Yn wir, rydym yn gwybod beth y maent yn ei guddio a beth y maent yn ei ddatgan.

trans-unit.source: Does man not consider that We created him from a [mere] sperm-drop - then at once he is a clear adversary?
trans-unit.target: Nid dyn yn ystyried bod Rydym wedi creu ef o sberm [ond]-gostyngiad-yna ar unwaith ei fod yn elyn glir?

trans-unit.source: And he presents for Us an example and forgets his [own] creation. He says, "Who will give life to bones while they are disintegrated?"
trans-unit.target: Ac ef yn cyflwyno i ni yn esiampl ac yn anghofio ei [ei hun] creu. Meddai, "A bydd yn rhoi bywyd i esgyrn tra maent yn chwalu?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time; and He is, of all creation, Knowing."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "bydd yn rhoi eu bywyd a'u lluniodd y tro cyntaf; ac mae ef, o'r holl greu, mae gwybod. "

trans-unit.source: [It is] He who made for you from the green tree, fire, and then from it you ignite.
trans-unit.target: [Mae'n] Ef a wnaeth i chi o'r goeden werdd, tân, ac yna ohono chi ignite.

trans-unit.source: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the likes of them? Yes, [it is so]; and He is the Knowing Creator.
trans-unit.target: Nid yw ef a greodd y nefoedd a'r ddaear yn gallu creu hoff ohonynt? Ie, [Mae'n hynny]; ac ef yw creawdwr wybod.

trans-unit.source: His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, "Be," and it is.
trans-unit.target: Ei Gorchymyn yn unig pan y bwriada peth a ddywed iddo, "Fod yn", ac mae'n.

trans-unit.source: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things, and to Him you will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Felly i'w mawrygu ef yn eu llaw yn yr amgylchfyd yr holl bethau, ac iddo ef y bydd eich dychwelyd.

trans-unit.source: By those [angels] lined up in rows
trans-unit.target: Gan hynny angylion a condemniwyd yn rhesi

trans-unit.source: And those who drive [the clouds]
trans-unit.target: A'r rhai sy'n gyrru [y cymylau]

trans-unit.source: And those who recite the message,
trans-unit.target: A rhai sy'n adrodd y neges,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your God is One,
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, eich Duw yn un,

trans-unit.source: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises.
trans-unit.target: Yr Arglwydd y nefoedd a y ddaear a bod rhyngddynt a'r Arglwydd y gwawr.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y mae yn addurno'r nefoedd agosaf gyda addurn o sêr

trans-unit.source: And as protection against every rebellious devil
trans-unit.target: Ac fel amddiffyniad yn erbyn pob diafol gwrthryfelgar

trans-unit.source: [So] they may not listen to the exalted assembly [of angels] and are pelted from every side,
trans-unit.target: [Felly] Efallai iddynt na wrando ar y Cynulliad i'w mawrygu [o angylion] ac yn pelted o bob ochr,

trans-unit.source: Repelled; and for them is a constant punishment,
trans-unit.target: Cadw draw ohono; ac ar eu cyfer yw cosb cyson,

trans-unit.source: Except one who snatches [some words] by theft, but they are pursued by a burning flame, piercing [in brightness].
trans-unit.target: Ac eithrio un sydd snatches [rhai geiriau] drwy ladrad, ond dilynir y Fflam llosgi, tyllu [mewn disgleirdeb].

trans-unit.source: Then inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?" Indeed, We created men from sticky clay.
trans-unit.target: Wedyn yn ymchwilio iddynt, [O Muhammad], "a ydynt yn creu cryfach [neu fwy anodd] neu hynny [eraill] yr ydym wedi creu?" Yn wir, rydym wedi creu dynion o glai gludiog.

trans-unit.source: But you wonder, while they mock,
trans-unit.target: Ond rydych yn tybio, er eu bod yn ffug,

trans-unit.source: And when they are reminded, they remember not.
trans-unit.target: A pan maent yn atgoffa, maent yn cofio nid.

trans-unit.source: And when they see a sign, they ridicule
trans-unit.target: A pan fyddant yn gweld arwydd, yn eu gwawdio

trans-unit.source: And say, "This is not but obvious magic.
trans-unit.target: A dweud, "Nid yw hyn ond amlwg hud.

trans-unit.source: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
trans-unit.target: Pan fyddwn wedi marw ac yn dod yn llwch ac esgyrn, yr ydym yn wir i atgyfodi?

trans-unit.source: And our forefathers [as well]?"
trans-unit.target: A ein cyndadau [hefyd]?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Yes, and you will be [rendered] contemptible."
trans-unit.target: Ddweud, "Ydw, a chi fydd yn [rendro] i'w dirmygu."

trans-unit.source: It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing.
trans-unit.target: Bydd yn gweiddi mai dim ond un, ac ar unwaith y bydd yn arsylwi.

trans-unit.source: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense."
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "O wae i ni! Dyma y dydd o ad-dalu.

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny."
trans-unit.target: [Bydd wrthynt], "Dyma dydd y farn a ddefnyddiwyd gennych i wadu."

trans-unit.source: [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship
trans-unit.target: [Bydd yr angylion yn eu harchebu], "gasglu rheini sy'n ymrwymedig yn anghywir, eu math, a beth maent yn ei defnyddio i addoli

trans-unit.source: Other than Allah, and guide them to the path of Hellfire
trans-unit.target: Ac eithrio Allah, ac i'w tywys i'r llwybr o Hellfire

trans-unit.source: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned."
trans-unit.target: A rhoi'r gorau iddynt; yn wir, maent i gael eu holi."

trans-unit.source: [They will be asked], "What is [wrong] with you? Why do you not help each other?"
trans-unit.target: [Bydd gofyn iddynt], beth yw [anghywir] â chi? Pam ydych chi'n nid helpu gilydd?"

trans-unit.source: But they, that Day, are in surrender.
trans-unit.target: Ond maent, y dydd, yn ildio.

trans-unit.source: And they will approach one another blaming each other.
trans-unit.target: A bydd yn mynd at un arall yn beio ei gilydd.

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right."
trans-unit.target: Byddant yn dweud, "Yn wir, ddefnyddiwyd gennych i ddod atom o'r dde."

trans-unit.source: The oppressors will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers,
trans-unit.target: Bydd y gormeswyr yn dweud, "yn hytrach, [eich hunain] nad oeddech yn gredinwyr,

trans-unit.source: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people.
trans-unit.target: A oedd gennym dros chi unrhyw awdurdod, ond oeddech bobl sy'n camweddu sawl gwaith.

trans-unit.source: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment].
trans-unit.target: Felly y mae gair ein Arglwydd yn dod i rym arnom ni; yn wir, y bydd yn blasu [cosbi].

trans-unit.source: And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators."
trans-unit.target: Ac rydym yn eich arwain at gwyriad; yn wir, roeddem yn deviators."

trans-unit.source: So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment.
trans-unit.target: Felly yn wir ydynt, y dydd, bydd yn rhannu yn y gosb.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, dyna sut yr ydym yn delio â throseddwyr.

trans-unit.source: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, pan ddywedwyd iddynt, "Nid oes dim Dduwdod ond Allah," oeddent yn drahaus

trans-unit.source: And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet?"
trans-unit.target: Ac yn dweud, "Rydyn ni'n gadael ein duwiau ar gyfer bardd wallgof?"

trans-unit.source: Rather, the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.
trans-unit.target: Yn hytrach, y Proffwyd wedi dod â gwir a cadarnhau y negeswyr [blaenorol].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, you [disbelievers] will be tasters of the painful punishment,
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, byddwch [disbelievers] yn rhagflas o gosb boenus,

trans-unit.source: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do -
trans-unit.target: A bydd eich nid eu had-dalu ac eithrio beth yr ydych yn ei defnyddio i wneud-

trans-unit.source: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
trans-unit.target: Ond nid y gweision dewis Allah.

trans-unit.source: Those will have a provision determined -
trans-unit.target: Bydd rhai yn cael darpariaeth yn benderfynol o-

trans-unit.source: Fruits; and they will be honored
trans-unit.target: Ffrwythau; a byddant yn honored

trans-unit.source: In gardens of pleasure
trans-unit.target: Mewn gerddi pleser

trans-unit.source: On thrones facing one another.
trans-unit.target: Ar thrones wynebu un arall.

trans-unit.source: There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring,
trans-unit.target: Yna bydd yn cael ei ddosbarthu ymysg eu Cwpan [o win] sy'n llifo'n gwanwyn,

trans-unit.source: White and delicious to the drinkers;
trans-unit.target: Gwyn a blasus i yfwyr;

trans-unit.source: No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated.
trans-unit.target: Unrhyw effaith wael mae ynddo, ac nid o'r ei byddant yn feddw.

trans-unit.source: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances, with large, [beautiful] eyes,
trans-unit.target: A â hwy bydd fod menywod yn cyfyngu ar [eu] golwg, gyda llygaid mawr, [hardd],

trans-unit.source: As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected.
trans-unit.target: Fel pe baent yn wyau [anodd], yn cael ei ddiogelu'n dda.

trans-unit.source: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.
trans-unit.target: A bydd yn mynd at un a'r llall, holi pob un arall.

trans-unit.source: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth]
trans-unit.target: Bydd siaradwr yn eu plith yn dweud, "yn wir, cefais cydymaith [ar y ddaear]

trans-unit.source: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe
trans-unit.target: Pwy fyddai'n dweud, ' yr ydych yn wir o'r rhai sy'n credu

trans-unit.source: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed?'"
trans-unit.target: Bod pan fyddwn wedi marw ac yn dod yn llwch ac esgyrn, bydd gennym yn wir eu had-dalu?'"

trans-unit.source: He will say, "Would you [care to] look?"
trans-unit.target: Bydd yn dweud, "a fyddech chi'n edrych [gofal i]?"

trans-unit.source: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: A bydd yn edrych ac yn ei weld yng nghanol y Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: He will say, "By Allah, you almost ruined me.
trans-unit.target: Bydd ef yn dweud, "gan Allah, yr ydych bron wedi difetha'r mi.

trans-unit.source: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].
trans-unit.target: Os nad yw, ar gyfer y favor o fy Arglwydd, byddai wedi bod y rhai yn defnyddio [i uffern].

trans-unit.source: Then, are we not to die
trans-unit.target: Wedyn, yr ydym ni i farw

trans-unit.source: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished?"
trans-unit.target: Ac eithrio ein prif marwolaeth, a bydd ni ddylid cosbi?"

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae hyn yn gyrhaeddiad mawr.

trans-unit.source: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.
trans-unit.target: Ar gyfer tebyg Gadewch hwn mae gweithwyr [ar y ddaear] yn gweithio.

trans-unit.source: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum?
trans-unit.target: Yn baradwys llety gwell neu y goeden o zaqqum?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, rydym wedi gwneud ei boen ar gyfer y tramgwyddo.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae'n goeden cyhoeddi o waelod y Hellfire,

trans-unit.source: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.
trans-unit.target: Datblygu ei ffrwythau fel pe bai penaethiaid y devils.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, y maent yn bwyta ohono ac yn llenwi ag ef eu boliau.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yna bydd ganddynt ar ôl cymysgedd o sgaldio dŵr.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yna bydd eu dychwelyd yn y Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: Indeed they found their fathers astray.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir cawsant eu tadau ar gyfeiliorn.

trans-unit.source: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.
trans-unit.target: Felly roedd eu cyflymu [i ddilyn] eu hesiampl.

trans-unit.source: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,
trans-unit.target: Ac mae eisoes wedi crwydro cyn iddynt y rhan fwyaf o bobloedd gynt,

trans-unit.source: And We had already sent among them warners.
trans-unit.target: A anfonwyd gennym eisoes ymysg warners iddynt.

trans-unit.source: Then look how was the end of those who were warned -
trans-unit.target: Yna edrych sut oedd diwedd y rheini y rhybuddiwyd-

trans-unit.source: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
trans-unit.target: Ond nid y gweision dewis Allah.

trans-unit.source: And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders.
trans-unit.target: A Noah oedd sicr ein galw, a [Rydym] y gorau o ymatebwyr.

trans-unit.source: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction.
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn arbed iddo ef a'i deulu o cystuddiau'n mawr.

trans-unit.source: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn gwneud ei ddisgynyddion rhai sy'n weddill [ar y ddaear]

trans-unit.source: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
trans-unit.target: A gadael iddo [ffafriol sôn am] ymysg cenedlaethau diweddarach:

trans-unit.source: "Peace upon Noah among the worlds."
trans-unit.target: "Heddwch ar Noah ymhlith y fyd."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, rydym felly yn gwobrwyo phoenwn da.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yr oedd ein gweision believing.

trans-unit.source: Then We drowned the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Rydym wedyn yn boddi y disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, ymhlith ei fath oedd Abraham,

trans-unit.source: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart
trans-unit.target: Pan ddaeth i ei Arglwydd gyda chalon gadarn

trans-unit.source: [And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?
trans-unit.target: [A] pan ddywedodd ei dad a ei bobl, "beth ydych chi addoli?

trans-unit.source: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than Allah you desire?
trans-unit.target: Mae'n anwiredd [fel] duwiau ac eithrio Allah a ddymunwch?

trans-unit.source: Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds?"
trans-unit.target: Wedyn beth yw eich meddwl am yr Arglwydd o fyd?

trans-unit.source: And he cast a look at the stars
trans-unit.target: Ac mae wedi edrych ar y sêr

trans-unit.source: And said, "Indeed, I am [about to be] ill."
trans-unit.target: A dywedodd, "yn wir, yr wyf yn [fin] sâl."

trans-unit.source: So they turned away from him, departing.
trans-unit.target: Felly trodd oddi wrtho, ymadael.

trans-unit.source: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?
trans-unit.target: Yna, trodd eu duwiau a dweud, "Nid ydych yn bwyta?

trans-unit.source: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?"
trans-unit.target: Beth yw [anghywir] gyda chi hynny nad ydych yn siarad?

trans-unit.source: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.
trans-unit.target: A trodd arnynt yn ergyd â [ei] law dde.

trans-unit.source: Then the people came toward him, hastening.
trans-unit.target: Yna daeth y bobl tuag at ef, prysuro.

trans-unit.source: He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,
trans-unit.target: Dywedodd, "ydych chi addoli a chi [eich hun] Mae eithriadau,

trans-unit.source: While Allah created you and that which you do?"
trans-unit.target: Er bod Allah creu chi a'r hyn sydd gennych?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire."
trans-unit.target: Maent yn dweud, "adeiladu iddo ffwrnais ac iddo daflu i'r tân llosgi.

trans-unit.source: And they intended for him a plan, but We made them the most debased.
trans-unit.target: Ac yr oeddent yn bwriadu iddo gynllun, ond yr ydym yn eu gwneud yn fwyaf debased.

trans-unit.source: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.
trans-unit.target: A [yna] dywedodd, "yn wir, bydd yn mynd i [lle fe 'm gorchmynnir gan] fy Arglwydd; Bydd ef yn ganllaw i mi.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous."
trans-unit.target: Fy Arglwydd, grant mi [plentyn] o blith y righteous."

trans-unit.source: So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy.
trans-unit.target: Felly rhoesom tidings da o fachgen forbearing iddo.

trans-unit.source: And when he reached with him [the age of] exertion, he said, "O my son, indeed I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "O my father, do as you are commanded. You will find me, if Allah wills, of the steadfast."
trans-unit.target: A pan y cyrhaeddodd ef ag ef [oed] waith, a dywedodd, "O fy mab, yn wir yr wyf wedi gweld mewn breuddwyd [Rhaid] wyf yn aberthu chi, felly weld beth yr ydych yn ei feddwl." Meddai, "fy nhad, O wneud fel yr ydych yn gyfrifol. Gwelwch fi, os bydd Allah yn wills, o y gadarn."

trans-unit.source: And when they had both submitted and he put him down upon his forehead,
trans-unit.target: A pan oedd ganddynt ddau cyflwyno ac ei fod ef i lawr ar ei dalcen,

trans-unit.source: We called to him, "O Abraham,
trans-unit.target: Galwasom iddo, "O Abraham,

trans-unit.source: You have fulfilled the vision." Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: [Wedi eich cyflawni gweledigaeth." Yn wir, rydym felly yn gwobrwyo phoenwn da.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this was the clear trial.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, hwn oedd y prawf clir.

trans-unit.source: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn ransomed ef ag aberth mawr,

trans-unit.source: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn gadael iddo [ffafriol sôn am] ymysg cenedlaethau diweddarach:

trans-unit.source: "Peace upon Abraham."
trans-unit.target: "Heddwch ar Abraham."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, rydym felly yn gwobrwyo phoenwn da.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yr oedd ein gweision believing.

trans-unit.source: And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous.
trans-unit.target: A rhoesom tidings da o Isaac, proffwyd o blith y righteous iddo.

trans-unit.source: And We blessed him and Isaac. But among their descendants is the doer of good and the clearly unjust to himself.
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn bendithio ef ac Isaac. Ond ymysg eu disgynyddion yn y berson sy'n gweithredu o dda ac yn amlwg anghyfiawn i ei hun.

trans-unit.source: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.
trans-unit.target: A oedd gennym yn sicr yn rhoi favor ar Moses ac Aaron.

trans-unit.source: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn arbed eu ac eu pobl rhag Mae'r cystuddiau'n mawr,

trans-unit.source: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn eu cefnogi fel hwy a goresgyn.

trans-unit.source: And We gave them the explicit Scripture,
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn rhoi iddynt yr ysgrythur eglur,

trans-unit.source: And We guided them on the straight path.
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn eu harwain ar y llwybr syth.

trans-unit.source: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn gadael iddynt [ffafriol sôn am] ymysg cenedlaethau diweddarach:

trans-unit.source: "Peace upon Moses and Aaron."
trans-unit.target: "Heddwch ar Moses ac Aaron."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, rydym felly yn gwobrwyo phoenwn da.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they were of Our believing servants.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, maent yn ein gweision believing.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, oedd Elias o blith y negeswyr,

trans-unit.source: When he said to his people, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Pan ddywedodd ei bobl, "Bydd ydych nid ofni Allah?

trans-unit.source: Do you call upon Ba'l and leave the best of creators -
trans-unit.target: A ydych yn galw ar Ba'l ac yn gadael y gorau o crewyr-

trans-unit.source: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers?"
trans-unit.target: Allah, eich Arglwydd a Arglwydd eich cyndeidiau cyntaf?"

trans-unit.source: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment],
trans-unit.target: Ac iddynt wrthod ef, yn wir, felly y bydd yn dod [ar gyfer cosbi],

trans-unit.source: Except the chosen servants of Allah.
trans-unit.target: Ac eithrio y gweision dewis Allah.

trans-unit.source: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn gadael iddo [ffafriol sôn am] ymysg cenedlaethau diweddarach:

trans-unit.source: "Peace upon Elias."
trans-unit.target: "Heddwch ar Elias."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, rydym felly yn gwobrwyo phoenwn da.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yr oedd ein gweision believing.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, roedd llawer ymhlith y negeswyr.

trans-unit.source: [So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,
trans-unit.target: [Felly sôn am] pan rydym yn arbed iddo ef a'i deulu, pob,

trans-unit.source: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].
trans-unit.target: Heblaw ei wraig ymhlith y rhai sy'n aros [evildoers].

trans-unit.source: Then We destroyed the others.
trans-unit.target: Yna rydym yn dinistrio'r eraill.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, you pass by them in the morning
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, yr ydych yn mynd atynt yn y bore

trans-unit.source: And at night. Then will you not use reason?
trans-unit.target: Ac yn y nos. Yna ni Bydd ddefnyddio rheswm?

trans-unit.source: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, Jonah oedd ymhlith y negeswyr.

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when he ran away to the laden ship.
trans-unit.target: [Cyfeiriad] pan redodd i ffwrdd i y llong llwythog.

trans-unit.source: And he drew lots and was among the losers.
trans-unit.target: Ac mae ef wedi tynnu llawer a oedd ymhlith y rhai ar eu colled.

trans-unit.source: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.
trans-unit.target: Yna roedd y pysgod yn llyncu ef, tra yr oedd mae'r bai'n.

trans-unit.source: And had he not been of those who exalt Allah,
trans-unit.target: A oedd wedi bod yn rhai sy'n exalt Allah,

trans-unit.source: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Byddai ef wedi aros tu mewn ei bola tan y diwrnod maent yn atgyfodi.

trans-unit.source: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.
trans-unit.target: Ond rydym yn taflodd ef ar y môr agored tra ei fod yn sâl.

trans-unit.source: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.
trans-unit.target: A achoswyd inni dyfu dros iddo vine gowrdiau.

trans-unit.source: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.
trans-unit.target: Ac anfonwyd ef i [ei bobl] can mil o neu fwy.

trans-unit.source: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.
trans-unit.target: Ac roeddent yn credu, felly rhoddwyd eu mwynhad [bywyd] am amser.

trans-unit.source: So inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?
trans-unit.target: Felly yn ymchwilio iddynt, [O Muhammad], "eich Arglwydd oes merched tra mae ganddynt fab?

trans-unit.source: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?"
trans-unit.target: Neu a oedd yn creu angylion fel benywod er eu bod yn dystion?"

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,
trans-unit.target: Yn ddiamau, mae allan eu anwiredd [ddyfeisio'n] y maent yn dweud,

trans-unit.source: " Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.
trans-unit.target: "Mae'r Allah yn begotten", ac yn wir, maent yn gelwyddgwn.

trans-unit.source: Has He chosen daughters over sons?
trans-unit.target: Wedi dewis merched dros feibion?

trans-unit.source: What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?
trans-unit.target: Beth yw [anghywir] â chi? Sut yr ydych yn gwneud dyfarniad?

trans-unit.source: Then will you not be reminded?
trans-unit.target: Yna bydd eich nid atgoffa?

trans-unit.source: Or do you have a clear authority?
trans-unit.target: Neu a oes gennych awdurdod clir?

trans-unit.source: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.
trans-unit.target: Yna, llunio eich ysgrythur, os y dylech fod yn onest.

trans-unit.source: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].
trans-unit.target: A ydynt wedi hawlio rhyngddo ef ac y jinn linach, ond wedi y jinn eisoes yn hysbys y byddant [sy'n gwneud hawliadau o'r fath] yn dod i [cosbi].

trans-unit.source: Exalted is Allah above what they describe,
trans-unit.target: I'w mawrygu yw Allah uchod beth y maent yn ei ddisgrifio,

trans-unit.source: Except the chosen servants of Allah [who do not share in that sin].
trans-unit.target: Ac eithrio y gweision dewis Allah [nad ydynt yn rhannu'r mewn pechod hwnnw].

trans-unit.source: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, felly chi [disbelievers] a beth bynnag yw eich addoli,

trans-unit.source: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him
trans-unit.target: Ni all eich temtio [rhywun] oddi wrtho

trans-unit.source: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Ac eithrio ef sydd i [Rhowch a] llosgi yn y Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.
trans-unit.target: [Mae yr angylion yn dweud], "Nid oes ymhlith ein unrhyw un heblaw Mae fod un safle hysbys.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, rydym yn rhai sydd yn y llinell [ar gyfer gweddi].

trans-unit.source: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah."
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, rydym yn rhai sy'n exalt Allah.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say,
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, y disbelievers a ddefnyddir i ddweud,

trans-unit.source: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,
trans-unit.target: "Pe bai gennym neges gan [] y bobloedd gynt,

trans-unit.source: We would have been the chosen servants of Allah."
trans-unit.target: Fyddem wedi y gweision dewis Allah."

trans-unit.source: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Ond roedd eu ddysgais ynddo, felly maent yn mynd i wybod.

trans-unit.source: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,
trans-unit.target: Ac y mae ein gair yn rhagflaenu eisoes ar gyfer ein gweision, y negeswyr,

trans-unit.source: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory
trans-unit.target: [Y] yn wir, byddent yn rhai a roddir fuddugoliaeth

trans-unit.source: And [that] indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome.
trans-unit.target: A [bod] yn wir, ein milwyr bydd rhai sy'n goresgyn.

trans-unit.source: So, [O Muhammad], leave them for a time.
trans-unit.target: Hynny, [O Muhammad], gadael iddynt am amser.

trans-unit.source: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.
trans-unit.target: A gweld [beth fydd yn digwydd] iddynt, ar gyfer y maent yn mynd i weld.

trans-unit.source: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?
trans-unit.target: Yna ar gyfer ein cosbi yr ydynt yn ddiamynedd?

trans-unit.source: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.
trans-unit.target: Ond pan y mae yn disgyn yn eu tiriogaeth, yna drygioni yn y bore o'r rheini a oedd yn rhybuddio.

trans-unit.source: And leave them for a time.
trans-unit.target: A gadael iddynt am amser.

trans-unit.source: And see, for they are going to see.
trans-unit.target: A gweld, maent yn mynd i weld.

trans-unit.source: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.
trans-unit.target: I'w mawrygu yw eich Arglwydd, Arglwydd y gallai, uwchlaw'r hyn y maent yn ei ddisgrifio.

trans-unit.source: And peace upon the messengers.
trans-unit.target: A heddwch ar y negeswyr.

trans-unit.source: And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A chanmoliaeth i Allah, Arglwydd y byd.

trans-unit.source: Sad. By the Qur'an containing reminder...
trans-unit.target: Trist. Gan y Qur'an sy'n cynnwys nodyn atgoffa...

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieve are in pride and dissension.
trans-unit.target: Ond rhai a chredu yn gynnen a balchder.

trans-unit.source: How many a generation have We destroyed before them, and they [then] called out; but it was not a time for escape.
trans-unit.target: Sawl cenhedlaeth wedi inni eu dinistrio cyn iddynt, ac maent [wedyn] galw allan; ond nid oedd amser i ddianc.
