trans-unit.target: Neu nid ydynt yn dweud [o chi], "bardd a disgwyliwn am anffawd o amser ar eu cyfer?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "Aros, am yn wir yr wyf, gyda chi, ymhlith y gweinyddion."

trans-unit.source: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?
trans-unit.target: Neu wneud eu meddyliau yn ennyn iddyn nhw [ddweud] hyn, neu a ydynt yn bobl sy'n camweddu sawl gwaith?

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Neu maent yn dweud, "ei fod wedi ei"? Yn hytrach, nad ydynt yn credu.

trans-unit.source: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.
trans-unit.target: Yna gadewch iddynt lunio datganiad tebyg iddo, os y dylent fod yn eirwir.

trans-unit.source: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?
trans-unit.target: Cawsant eu creu gan dim, neu a oeddent yn y crewyr [ohonynt]?

trans-unit.source: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.
trans-unit.target: Neu ni fu iddynt greu'r y nefoedd a'r ddaear? Yn hytrach, nid ydynt yn sicr.

trans-unit.source: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?
trans-unit.target: Neu wedi eu depositories [sy'n cynnwys y ddarpariaeth] o eich Arglwydd? Neu a ydynt yn y rheolyddion [ohonynt]?

trans-unit.source: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority.
trans-unit.target: Neu wedi eu risiau [yn y nefoedd] ar y maen nhw'n gwrando ar? Yna gadewch gwrandäwr eu cynhyrchu i awdurdod clir.

trans-unit.source: Or has He daughters while you have sons?
trans-unit.target: Neu mae merched AU er eich bod yn feibion?

trans-unit.source: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?
trans-unit.target: Neu a ydych, [O Muhammad], yn gofyn iddynt gael taliad, felly maent yn gan ddyled yn faich i lawr?

trans-unit.source: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?
trans-unit.target: Neu wedi eu [gwybodaeth o] y unseen, felly maent yn ysgrifennu [TG] i lawr?

trans-unit.source: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.
trans-unit.target: Neu a ydynt yn bwriadu cynllun? Ond y rhai sy'n chredu-maent yn y gwrthrych o gynllun.

trans-unit.source: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: Neu wedi eu Dduwdod ac eithrio Allah? I'w mawrygu yw Allah uchod beth bynnag maent cysylltiol ag ef.

trans-unit.source: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."
trans-unit.target: Ac os oeddent yn gweld darn o'r awyr yn gostwng, byddent yn dweud, "[yw] cymylau yn pentyrru."

trans-unit.source: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -
trans-unit.target: Felly gadael iddynt nes eu bod yn bodloni eu diwrnod y bydd yn taro insensible-

trans-unit.source: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.
trans-unit.target: Bydd y diwrnod eu cynllun ni fanteisio ar iddynt o gwbl, nac yn eu helpu.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, ar gyfer y rhai sydd wedi cam yn cosbi cyn hynny, ond nid rhan fwyaf ohonynt yn gwybod.

trans-unit.source: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn amyneddgar, [O Muhammad], ar gyfer y benderfyniad eich Arglwydd, i yn wir, rydych yn ein llygaid. A exalt [Allah] gyda chanmoliaeth eich Arglwydd pan ydych yn codi.

trans-unit.source: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.
trans-unit.target: Ac mewn rhan o nos y exalt ef ac ar ôl [lleoliad] y sêr.

trans-unit.source: By the star when it descends,
trans-unit.target: Gan y seren pan y bydd yn disgyn,

trans-unit.source: Your companion [Muhammad] has not strayed, nor has he erred,
trans-unit.target: Wedi eich cydymaith [Muhammad] Nid crwydro, nac wedi ei fod yn ochri,

trans-unit.source: Nor does he speak from [his own] inclination.
trans-unit.target: Nid yw'n siarad o [ei hun] awydd ychwaith.

trans-unit.source: It is not but a revelation revealed,
trans-unit.target: Nid yw ond datgelodd o agoriad llygad,

trans-unit.source: Taught to him by one intense in strength -
trans-unit.target: Addysgir iddo gan un dwys mewn nerth-

trans-unit.source: One of soundness. And he rose to [his] true form
trans-unit.target: Un o gadernid. A Cododd ef i [ei] ffurflen wir

trans-unit.source: While he was in the higher [part of the] horizon.
trans-unit.target: Tra yr oedd yn y uwch [rhan o y] horizon.

trans-unit.source: Then he approached and descended
trans-unit.target: Yna mae'n mynd at ac yn disgyn

trans-unit.source: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer.
trans-unit.target: Ac yr oedd ar bellter o bow dau darnau neu nes.

trans-unit.source: And he revealed to His Servant what he revealed.
trans-unit.target: A datgelodd ef i was ei beth y mae ef wedi datgelu.

trans-unit.source: The heart did not lie [about] what it saw.
trans-unit.target: Nid oedd y galon yn gorwedd am hyn a welodd.

trans-unit.source: So will you dispute with him over what he saw?
trans-unit.target: Felly bydd anghydfod gydag ef dros yr hyn a welai?

trans-unit.source: And he certainly saw him in another descent
trans-unit.target: A sicr welodd ef yn dras arall

trans-unit.source: At the Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary -
trans-unit.target: Ar y goeden Lote o'r ffin eithaf-

trans-unit.source: Near it is the Garden of Refuge -
trans-unit.target: Agos mae'n ardd lloches-

trans-unit.source: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered [it].
trans-unit.target: Pan fydd cynnwys y goeden Lote sy'n cynnwys [TG].

trans-unit.source: The sight [of the Prophet] did not swerve, nor did it transgress [its limit].
trans-unit.target: Nid oedd y golwg ar [y Proffwyd] yn swerve, nac oedd yn camddefnyddio'u [ei derfyn].

trans-unit.source: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord.
trans-unit.target: Gwelodd sicr o arwyddion mwyaf ei Arglwydd.

trans-unit.source: So have you considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza?
trans-unit.target: Felly a ydych wedi ystyried al-Lat a al-'Uzza?

trans-unit.source: And Manat, the third - the other one?
trans-unit.target: A Manat, y trydydd-yr un arall?

trans-unit.source: Is the male for you and for Him the female?
trans-unit.target: Mae y dyn i chi ac iddo ef y fenyw?

trans-unit.source: That, then, is an unjust division.
trans-unit.target: Hynny, wedyn, yn adran anghyfiawn.

trans-unit.source: They are not but [mere] names you have named them - you and your forefathers - for which Allah has sent down no authority. They follow not except assumption and what [their] souls desire, and there has already come to them from their Lord guidance.
trans-unit.target: Nid ydynt ond enwau [ond] byddwch wedi eu henwi-chi a eich cyndadau-y mae Allah wedi anfon i lawr unrhyw awdurdod. Maent yn dilyn nid ac eithrio rhagdybiaeth a beth a awydd [eu] heneidiau, ac mae eisoes wedi dod iddynt gan eu canllawiau yr Arglwydd.

trans-unit.source: Or is there for man whatever he wishes?
trans-unit.target: Neu a oes dyn beth bynnag y mae'n dymuno?

trans-unit.source: Rather, to Allah belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
trans-unit.target: Yn hytrach, i Allah yn perthyn i'r o hyn ymlaen ac y cyntaf [bywyd].

trans-unit.source: And how many angels there are in the heavens whose intercession will not avail at all except [only] after Allah has permitted [it] to whom He wills and approves.
trans-unit.target: A faint o angylion yno yn y nefoedd eu intercession bydd ni fanteisio ar bob heblaw wedi Allah ar ôl [ond] [TG] Caniateir i bwy mae'n wills ac yn cymeradwyo.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names,
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae rhai nad ydynt yn credu yn y o hyn ymlaen yn enw angylion enwau benywaidd,

trans-unit.source: And they have thereof no knowledge. They follow not except assumption, and indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all.
trans-unit.target: Ac mae ganddynt ohonynt unrhyw wybodaeth. Maent yn dilyn nid ac eithrio dybiaeth, ac yn wir, mae rhagdybiaeth yn avails yn erbyn y gwir o gwbl.

trans-unit.source: So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life.
trans-unit.target: Felly troi oddi wrth bwy bynnag yn troi ei gefn ar ein neges a dymuno nid ac eithrio bywyd worldly.

trans-unit.source: That is their sum of knowledge. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of who is guided.
trans-unit.target: Mae eu swm o wybodaeth. Yn wir, eich Arglwydd yn gwybod fwyaf o sy'n crwydro oddi ar ei ffordd, ac mae'n gwybod fwyaf o sy'n cael ei arwain.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth - that He may recompense those who do evil with [the penalty of] what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best [reward] -
trans-unit.target: A Allah yn perthyn iddo beth bynnag yn y nefoedd a beth bynnag yw yn y ddaear-y gall ei ad-dalu rhai sy'n gwneud drygioni gyda [y gosb o] beth y maent wedi'i wneud a rhai sy'n gwneud yn dda gyda'r gorau [gwobr]-ad-dalu

trans-unit.source: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, only [committing] slight ones. Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness. He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not claim yourselves to be pure; He is most knowing of who fears Him.
trans-unit.target: Mae'r rhai sy'n osgoi bechodau mawr a immoralities, dim ond [ymrwymo] ychydig yn rhai. Yn wir, eich Arglwydd yn helaeth mewn maddeuant. Roedd yn gwybod fwyaf ohonoch pan luniodd chi o'r ddaear a pan oeddech yn ffetysau yn wombs eich mamau. Felly nid honni eich bod yn pur; Mae'n gwybod fwyaf am y sydd yn ofni iddo.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who turned away
trans-unit.target: Ydych chi wedi gweld yr un sy'n troi ymaith

trans-unit.source: And gave a little and [then] refrained?
trans-unit.target: A rhoddodd ychydig ac ymatal [yna]?

trans-unit.source: Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees?
trans-unit.target: Mae gwybodaeth o unseen, fel y mae ef yn gweld?

trans-unit.source: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses
trans-unit.target: Neu fe'i hysbyswyd ni o'r hyn a oedd yn yr ysgrythurau o Moses

trans-unit.source: And [of] Abraham, who fulfilled [his obligations] -
trans-unit.target: Ac [o'r] Abraham, sy'n cyflawni [ei rwymedigaethau]-

trans-unit.source: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another
trans-unit.target: Y bydd unrhyw cludo o'r beichiau yn ysgwyddo'r baich o un arall

trans-unit.source: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives
trans-unit.target: Ac nad oes ar gyfer dyn ac eithrio [da] ar gyfer y mae ef yn ymdrechu

trans-unit.source: And that his effort is going to be seen -
trans-unit.target: A bod ei ymdrech yn mynd i gael eu gweld-

trans-unit.source: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense
trans-unit.target: Yna bydd ef eu had-dalu ar ei gyfer iawndal llawnaf

trans-unit.source: And that to your Lord is the finality
trans-unit.target: A bod eich Arglwydd yn therfynoldeb

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep
trans-unit.target: Mae ei fod ef a gwneud [un] chwerthin a wylwch

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who causes death and gives life
trans-unit.target: Ac mai ef sydd yn achosi marwolaeth a rhoi bywyd

trans-unit.source: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female -
trans-unit.target: A bod ei fod yn creu y ddau mates-gwryw a benyw-

trans-unit.source: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted
trans-unit.target: O sberm-gostyngiad pan yn cael ei ollwng

trans-unit.source: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation
trans-unit.target: A hwnnw [deiliad swydd] arno yw creu nesaf

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who enriches and suffices
trans-unit.target: Ac mai ef sy'n cyfoethogi ac yn ddigon

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius
trans-unit.target: Ac mai ef sydd yn Arglwydd Boncyffion

trans-unit.source: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad
trans-unit.target: Ac ef dinistriodd y cyntaf [pobl o] ' Aad

trans-unit.source: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them] -
trans-unit.target: A oedd Thamud-ac AU sbâr [eu]-Nid

trans-unit.source: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.
trans-unit.target: A phobl Noah cyn. Yn wir, mai hwy oedd [yn] fwy anghyfiawn a gorthrymu.

trans-unit.source: And the overturned towns He hurled down
trans-unit.target: Ac yn y trefi gwyrdroi ei lluchio i lawr

trans-unit.source: And covered them by that which He covered.
trans-unit.target: A gwmpesir yn sydd yn cynnwys.

trans-unit.source: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?
trans-unit.target: Yna yr favors o eich Arglwydd a ydych yn amau?

trans-unit.source: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners.
trans-unit.target: Hwn [Proffwyd] Mae warner fel warners hen.

trans-unit.source: The Approaching Day has approached.
trans-unit.target: Mae y dydd yn agosáu at dod ataf.

trans-unit.source: Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover.
trans-unit.target: Ohono, [gan y rhai] ar wahân i Allah, nid oes unrhyw remover.

trans-unit.source: Then at this statement do you wonder?
trans-unit.target: Yna ar y datganiad hwn ydych chi tybed?

trans-unit.source: And you laugh and do not weep
trans-unit.target: A ydych yn chwerthin ac yn gwneud nid wylwch

trans-unit.source: While you are proudly sporting?
trans-unit.target: Tra y mae eich balchder mewn chwaraeon?

trans-unit.source: So prostrate to Allah and worship [Him].
trans-unit.target: Felly prostrate i Allah ac addoli [ef].

trans-unit.source: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].
trans-unit.target: Daeth yr awr gerllaw, ac wedi i'r lleuad yn rhannu'r [mewn dau].

trans-unit.source: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic."
trans-unit.target: Ac os ydynt yn gweld gwyrth, maent yn troi i ffwrdd ac yn dweud, "Pasio hud."

trans-unit.source: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.
trans-unit.target: Ac maent yn gwadu ac yn dilyn eu prawf pellter. Ond ar gyfer pob mater yn setliad [amser].

trans-unit.source: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -
trans-unit.target: Ac mae eisoes wedi dod iddynt o'r wybodaeth y mae atal-y

trans-unit.source: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].
trans-unit.target: Doethineb helaeth-ond rhybudd yw nid fanteisio ar [eu].

trans-unit.source: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,
trans-unit.target: Felly gadael iddynt, [O Muhammad]. Y dydd y galwr yn galw i rywbeth Rhestra,

trans-unit.source: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,
trans-unit.target: Eu llygaid yn wylaidd, nhw fydd yn deillio o'r Beddau fel pe baent yn locusts taenu,

trans-unit.source: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."
trans-unit.target: Rasio ymlaen tuag at y galwr. Bydd y disbelievers yn dweud, "Mae hwn yn ddiwrnod anodd."

trans-unit.source: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.
trans-unit.target: Gwadodd y bobl o Noah cyn iddynt, ac maent yn gwadu ein gwas ac yn dweud, "madman," ac yr oedd nghythruddo.

trans-unit.source: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."
trans-unit.target: Felly arweiniodd ef at ei Arglwydd, "Yn wir, yr wyf yn overpowered, felly yn helpu."

trans-unit.source: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down
trans-unit.target: Rydym wedyn yn agor y clwydi y nefoedd a'r glaw'n diferu i lawr

trans-unit.source: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.
trans-unit.target: Ac achosir y ddaear i byrstio â springs, a Bodlonwyd y dyfroedd ar gyfer mater eisoes wedi'i bennu ymlaen llaw.

trans-unit.source: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn cael iddo ar [adeiladu o] estyll ac ewinedd,

trans-unit.source: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.
trans-unit.target: Hwylio o dan ein sylw fel gwobr am ef a oedd wedi'i wrthod.

trans-unit.source: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: A ydym chwith fel arwydd, felly mae unrhyw un sydd yn cofio?

trans-unit.source: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: A sut roedd [difrifol] fy cosbi a rhybudd.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: Ac yn sicr rydym wedi gwneud y Qur'an hawdd ar gyfer Sul y cofio, felly a oes unrhyw un sydd yn cofio?

trans-unit.source: 'Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: ' Aad gwadu; a sut roedd [difrifol] fy cosbi a rhybudd.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, anfonwyd arnynt gwynt cyforiog ar ddiwrnod o anffawd parhaus,

trans-unit.source: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.
trans-unit.target: Wrthi'n echdynnu pobl fel pe baent yn foncyffion coed palmwydd dadwreiddio.

trans-unit.source: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: A sut roedd [difrifol] fy cosbi a rhybudd.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: Ac yn sicr rydym wedi gwneud y Qur'an hawdd ar gyfer Sul y cofio, felly a oes unrhyw un sydd yn cofio?

trans-unit.source: Thamud denied the warning
trans-unit.target: Gwadodd Thamud y rhybudd

trans-unit.source: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.
trans-unit.target: A dywedodd, "Mae'n un bod dynol ymysg wrthym y dylem ei ddilyn? Yn wir, byddem wedyn mewn gwall a gwallgofrwydd.

trans-unit.source: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."
trans-unit.target: Anfonwyd y neges i lawr arno o blith ein? Yn hytrach, ei fod yn gelwyddgi digywilydd."

trans-unit.source: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.
trans-unit.target: Byddant yn gwybod yfory sydd yn gelwyddgi digywilydd.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, rydym yn anfon y hi-camel fel prawf ar eu cyfer, felly eu gwylio ac yn amyneddgar.

trans-unit.source: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].
trans-unit.target: A rhoi gwybod iddynt bod y dŵr yn cael ei rannu rhwng iddynt, pob diod [ddiwrnod] Mynychodd [tro].

trans-unit.source: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].
trans-unit.target: Ond galwodd cydymaith, ac ef yn meiddio a rhwystro [iddi].

trans-unit.source: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: A sut roedd [difrifol] fy cosbi a rhybudd.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yr ydym yn anfon iddynt un chwyth o'r awyr, a daeth eu fel tameidiau frigau sych pen [anifeiliaid].

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: Ac yn sicr rydym wedi gwneud y Qur'an hawdd ar gyfer Sul y cofio, felly a oes unrhyw un sydd yn cofio?

trans-unit.source: The people of Lot denied the warning.
trans-unit.target: Gwadodd y bobl o lawer yn y rhybudd.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, rydym yn anfon arnynt storm o gerrig, ac eithrio y teulu o lawer-rydym yn eu cadw cyn dawn

trans-unit.source: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.
trans-unit.target: Fel favor oddi wrthym ni. Felly rydym yn gwobrwyo ef sydd yn ddiolchgar.

trans-unit.source: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.
trans-unit.target: Ac yr oedd ef eisoes wedi rhybuddio iddynt ein ymosodiad, ond roeddent yn anghytuno y rhybudd.

trans-unit.source: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."
trans-unit.target: Ac roedd Mynnwyd oddi wrtho ei westeion, ond rydym yn dileu eu llygaid, [dweud], "Blas fy cosbi a rhybudd."

trans-unit.source: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ac yna daeth arnynt erbyn bore cosbi diysgog.

trans-unit.source: So taste My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: Felly flasu fy cosbi a rhybudd.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: Ac yn sicr rydym wedi gwneud y Qur'an hawdd ar gyfer Sul y cofio, felly a oes unrhyw un sydd yn cofio?

trans-unit.source: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.
trans-unit.target: Ac y mae yn sicr yn dod i bobl Ffaro rhybudd.

trans-unit.source: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.
trans-unit.target: Iddynt wrthod ein arwyddion, bob un ohonynt, felly rydym yn hatafaelu iddynt ar ôl cael ffit o Exalted un yn efallai ac yn berffaith yn gallu.

trans-unit.source: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture?
trans-unit.target: Yn eich disbelievers yn well na hynny [rhai hen], neu oes gennych imiwnedd yn yr ysgrythurau?

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?
trans-unit.target: Neu wneud maent yn dweud, "Rydym yn cefnogi [gilydd] Cynulliad"?

trans-unit.source: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat].
trans-unit.target: Bydd y Cynulliad [eu] yn cael ei drechu, a byddant yn troi eu cefnau [ar drai].

trans-unit.source: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.
trans-unit.target: Ond yr awr yw eu penodi [dyladwy cosbi], ac yr awr yn fwy trychinebus ac yn fwy chwerw.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yn y troseddwyr mewn gwall a gwallgofrwydd.

trans-unit.source: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."
trans-unit.target: Y dydd yn eu llusgo i'r tân ar eu hwynebau a [bydd dweud], "Blas y cyffyrddiad o Saqar."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, all things We created with predestination.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, holl bethau rydym wedi creu gyda predestination.

trans-unit.source: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.
trans-unit.target: Ac nid yw ein Gorchymyn ond un, fel cipolwg y llygad.

trans-unit.source: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: Ac yr ydym eisoes yn dinistrio eich math, felly a oes unrhyw un sydd yn cofio?

trans-unit.source: And everything they did is in written records.
trans-unit.target: Ac mae popeth a wnaeth yn y cofnodion ysgrifenedig.

trans-unit.source: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.
trans-unit.target: A yw bob bach a mawr [peth] arsgrifio.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers,
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, fydd y righteous ymhlith gerddi ac afonydd,

trans-unit.source: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.
trans-unit.target: Mewn sedd o fraint ger yn sofran, perffaith mewn gallu.

trans-unit.source: The Most Merciful
trans-unit.target: Mwyaf tosturiol

trans-unit.source: Taught the Qur'an,
trans-unit.target: Addysgir y Qur'an,

trans-unit.source: Created man,
trans-unit.target: Crëwyd dyn,

trans-unit.source: [And] taught him eloquence.
trans-unit.target: [A] huodledd wedi ei ddysgu.

trans-unit.source: The sun and the moon [move] by precise calculation,
trans-unit.target: Yr haul a'r lleuad [symud] gan gyfrifo'n fanwl gywir,

trans-unit.source: And the stars and trees prostrate.
trans-unit.target: Ac mae y sêr a choed prostrate.

trans-unit.source: And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance
trans-unit.target: Ac y nefoedd iddo godi a osodir y cydbwysedd

trans-unit.source: That you not transgress within the balance.
trans-unit.target: Y mae eich camddefnyddio'u nid o fewn y cydbwysedd.

trans-unit.source: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance.
trans-unit.target: A sefydlu pwysau mewn cyfiawnder, ac nid ddiffygiol y cydbwysedd.

trans-unit.source: And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn y ddaear a osodwyd ganddo [ar] ar gyfer y creaduriaid.

trans-unit.source: Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]
trans-unit.target: Ynddo Mae coed ffrwythau a palmwydd ar ôl sheaths [o ddyddiadau]

trans-unit.source: And grain having husks and scented plants.
trans-unit.target: A graen cael cibynnau a phlanhigion flodau'n.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: He created man from clay like [that of] pottery.
trans-unit.target: Creodd dyn o glai fel [yn] crochenwaith.

trans-unit.source: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire.
trans-unit.target: A grewyd ganddo y jinn o fflam di-fwg o dân.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: [He is] Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets.
trans-unit.target: [Mae'n] Arglwydd y ddau Gwawr a Arglwydd y machlud dau.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: He released the two seas, meeting [side by side];
trans-unit.target: Rhyddhaodd ef y ddau moroedd, cyfarfod [ochr yn ochr];

trans-unit.source: Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses.
trans-unit.target: Rhyngddynt yn rhwystr [felly] yn y naill na'r llall yn pechu.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: From both of them emerge pearl and coral.
trans-unit.target: O'r ddau ohonynt yn dod i'r amlwg yn pearl a cwrel.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.
trans-unit.target: Ac iddo ef y perthyn y llongau [gyda hwyliau] dyrchafedig yn y môr fel mynyddoedd.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: Everyone upon the earth will perish,
trans-unit.target: Bydd pawb ar y ddaear yn dirywio,

trans-unit.source: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.
trans-unit.target: Ac a fydd yn wyneb eich Arglwydd, perchennog Mawrhydi ac yn fraint.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is bringing about a matter.
trans-unit.target: Mae pwy bynnag o fewn y nefoedd a'r ddaear yn gofyn iddo; bob dydd ei fod yn dod â mater.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: We will attend to you, O prominent beings.
trans-unit.target: Byddwn yn mynychu i chi, O fodau amlwg.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority [from Allah].
trans-unit.target: O gwmni jinn a dynolryw, os ydych yn gallu mynd y tu hwnt i'r rhanbarthau y nefoedd a'r ddaear, ac yna pasio. Byddwch nid yn trosglwyddo ac eithrio gan awdurdod [gan Allah].

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves.
trans-unit.target: Yna anfonir arnoch fflamau tân a mwg, ac ni fyddwch yn amddiffyn eich hunain.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil -
trans-unit.target: A phan y nefoedd rhennir agored ac yn dod yn rose-colored fel olew-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod? -

trans-unit.source: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.
trans-unit.target: Yna ar y diwrnod hwnnw bydd dim yn gofyn am ei phechod ymysg dynion neu jinn.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: The criminals will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.
trans-unit.target: Bydd y troseddwyr yn hysbys gan eu marciau, a bydd yn ei atafaelu gan y forelocks a'r traed.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: This is Hell, which the criminals deny.
trans-unit.target: Mae hyn yn uffern, y mae gwadu y troseddwyr.

trans-unit.source: They will go around between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree].
trans-unit.target: Byddant yn mynd o gwmpas rhwng ei a sgaldio dŵr, gwresogi [i'r graddau eithaf].

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens -
trans-unit.target: Ond ar gyfer AU sydd wedi ofni sefyllfa ei Arglwydd yn gerddi dau-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod? -

trans-unit.source: Having [spreading] branches.
trans-unit.target: [Lledaenu] yn cael canghennau.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: In both of them are two springs, flowing.
trans-unit.target: Yn y ddau ohonynt yn ddau springs, llifo.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: In both of them are of every fruit, two kinds.
trans-unit.target: Yn y ddau ohonynt yn o bob ffrwyth, dau fath.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: [They are] reclining on beds whose linings are of silk brocade, and the fruit of the two gardens is hanging low.
trans-unit.target: [Maent] ledorwedd gyda hi ar welyau eu leininau yn brocade sidan, ac mae ffrwythau gerddi dau yn hongian yn isel.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: In them are women limiting [their] glances, untouched before them by man or jinni -
trans-unit.target: Ynddynt mae menywod yn cyfyngu [eu] golwg, heb eu cyffwrdd cyn iddynt gan ddyn neu jinni-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod? -

trans-unit.source: As if they were rubies and coral.
trans-unit.target: Fel pe baent yn rubies a cwrel.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: Is the reward for good [anything] but good?
trans-unit.target: Mae gwobr am da [Dim] ond da?

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: And below them both [in excellence] are two [other] gardens -
trans-unit.target: Ac islaw iddynt ddau [mewn rhagoriaeth] yn [arall] dwy gerddi-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod? -

trans-unit.source: Dark green [in color].
trans-unit.target: Mewn gwyrdd tywyll [lliw].

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: In both of them are two springs, spouting.
trans-unit.target: Yn y ddau ohonynt yn ddau springs, yn traethu.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: In both of them are fruit and palm trees and pomegranates.
trans-unit.target: Yn y ddau ohonynt yn goed ffrwythau a palmwydd a pomegranates.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: In them are good and beautiful women -
trans-unit.target: Ynddynt yn fenywod da a hardd-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod? -

trans-unit.source: Fair ones reserved in pavilions -
trans-unit.target: Rhai a gadwyd yn ôl yn y Pafiliwn-teg

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod? -

trans-unit.source: Untouched before them by man or jinni -
trans-unit.target: Heb eu cyffwrdd cyn iddynt gan ddyn neu jinni-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod? -

trans-unit.source: Reclining on green cushions and beautiful fine carpets.
trans-unit.target: Ledorwedd gyda hi ar glustogau gwyrdd a charpedi hardd iawn.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Felly pa un o'r favors o eich Arglwydd y byddech yn gwrthod?

trans-unit.source: Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.
trans-unit.target: Bendithio yw'r enw eich Arglwydd, perchennog Mawrhydi ac yn fraint.

trans-unit.source: When the Occurrence occurs,
trans-unit.target: Pryd y bydd y digwyddiad yn digwydd,

trans-unit.source: There is, at its occurrence, no denial.
trans-unit.target: Nid oes, ar ôl y digwyddiad, cael ei gwrthod.

trans-unit.source: It will bring down [some] and raise up [others].
trans-unit.target: Bydd yn gostwng [rai] ac yn codi fyny [eraill].

trans-unit.source: When the earth is shaken with convulsion
trans-unit.target: Pan y mae y ddaear yn ysgwyd â ' ffit '

trans-unit.source: And the mountains are broken down, crumbling
trans-unit.target: Ac yn y mynyddoedd yn torri i lawr, dadfeilio

trans-unit.source: And become dust dispersing.
trans-unit.target: A dod yn llwch wasgaru.

trans-unit.source: And you become [of] three kinds:
trans-unit.target: A ydych yn dod yn [o] tri math:

trans-unit.source: Then the companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?
trans-unit.target: Yna y cymdeithion yr hawl-beth yw'r cymdeithion yr hawl?

trans-unit.source: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?
trans-unit.target: A chymdeithion o chwith-beth yw'r cymdeithion o chwith?

trans-unit.source: And the forerunners, the forerunners -
trans-unit.target: A gwledydd, cyntaf-

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones brought near [to Allah]
trans-unit.target: Dyma'r rhai a dwyn ger [i Allah]

trans-unit.source: In the Gardens of Pleasure,
trans-unit.target: Yn y gerddi o bleser,

trans-unit.source: A [large] company of the former peoples
trans-unit.target: Cwmni [mawr] o bobloedd hen

trans-unit.source: And a few of the later peoples,
trans-unit.target: Ac ychydig o bobloedd ddiweddarach,

trans-unit.source: On thrones woven [with ornament],
trans-unit.target: Ar thrones wau [gyda addurn],

trans-unit.source: Reclining on them, facing each other.
trans-unit.target: Ledorwedd gyda hi ar eu cyfer, sy'n wynebu ei gilydd.

trans-unit.source: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal
trans-unit.target: Bydd yn dosbarthu ymysg eu bechgyn ifanc yn gwneud tragwyddol

trans-unit.source: With vessels, pitchers and a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring -
trans-unit.target: Gyda llongau, pitchers a Cwpan [o win] sy'n llifo'n gwanwyn-

trans-unit.source: No headache will they have therefrom, nor will they be intoxicated -
trans-unit.target: Oes pen tost bydd ganddynt thelir, na byddant yn meddwi-

trans-unit.source: And fruit of what they select
trans-unit.target: A ffrwythau o beth y maent yn ei dewis

trans-unit.source: And the meat of fowl, from whatever they desire.
trans-unit.target: Ac y cig o Gini, o beth bynnag yn eu dymuno.

trans-unit.source: And [for them are] fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes,
trans-unit.target: Ac [ar eu cyfer, eu] deg menywod sydd â llygaid mawr, [hardd],

trans-unit.source: The likenesses of pearls well-protected,
trans-unit.target: Y likenesses o pearls yn cael ei ddiogelu'n dda,

trans-unit.source: As reward for what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Fel gwobr am beth y maen nhw'n ei wneud.

trans-unit.source: They will not hear therein ill speech or commission of sin -
trans-unit.target: Ni byddant yn clywed araith ynddo sâl neu Comisiwn pechod-

trans-unit.source: Only a saying: "Peace, peace."
trans-unit.target: Dim ond y dywediad: "Heddwch, heddwch."

trans-unit.source: The companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?
trans-unit.target: Chymdeithion hawl-beth yw'r cymdeithion yr hawl?

trans-unit.source: [They will be] among lote trees with thorns removed
trans-unit.target: [Fydd] ymysg coed lote â thorns dileu

trans-unit.source: And [banana] trees layered [with fruit]
trans-unit.target: Haenog coed [banana] [gyda ffrwythau]

trans-unit.source: And shade extended
trans-unit.target: Cysgod estynedig ac

trans-unit.source: And water poured out
trans-unit.target: Ac arllwys dŵr

trans-unit.source: And fruit, abundant [and varied],
trans-unit.target: A ffrwythau, digonedd [ac amrywiol],

trans-unit.source: Neither limited [to season] nor forbidden,
trans-unit.target: Ychwaith yn gyfyngedig [i tymor] nac yn waharddedig,

trans-unit.source: And [upon] beds raised high.
trans-unit.target: Ac [ar] gwelyau codi uchel.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have produced the women of Paradise in a [new] creation
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yr ydym wedi cynhyrchu'r y merched o baradwys yn creu [newydd]

trans-unit.source: And made them virgins,
trans-unit.target: A gwneud iddynt virgins,

trans-unit.source: Devoted [to their husbands] and of equal age,
trans-unit.target: Neilltuo [i eu gwŷr] a oed cyfartal,

trans-unit.source: For the companions of the right [who are]
trans-unit.target: Ar gyfer y cymdeithion yr hawl [sydd]

trans-unit.source: A company of the former peoples
trans-unit.target: Cwmni o bobloedd hen

trans-unit.source: And a company of the later peoples.
trans-unit.target: A chwmni o bobloedd ddiweddarach.

trans-unit.source: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?
trans-unit.target: A chymdeithion o chwith-beth yw'r cymdeithion o chwith?

trans-unit.source: [They will be] in scorching fire and scalding water
trans-unit.target: [Fydd] yn scorching tân a sgaldio dŵr

trans-unit.source: And a shade of black smoke,
trans-unit.target: Cysgod mwg DU, ac

trans-unit.source: Neither cool nor beneficial.
trans-unit.target: Oer nac yn fuddiol.

trans-unit.source: Indeed they were, before that, indulging in affluence,
trans-unit.target: Yn wir eu bod, cyn hynny, yn ymbleseru mewn cyfoeth, yn

trans-unit.source: And they used to persist in the great violation,
trans-unit.target: A ddefnyddiwyd ganddynt i barhau yn ymyriad mawr,

trans-unit.source: And they used to say, "When we die and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
trans-unit.target: A ddefnyddiwyd ganddynt i ddweud, "pan fyddwn yn marw ac yn dod yn llwch ac esgyrn, yr ydym yn wir i atgyfodi?

trans-unit.source: And our forefathers [as well]?"
trans-unit.target: A ein cyndadau [hefyd]?"

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, the former and the later peoples
trans-unit.target: Dweud, [O Muhammad], "yn wir, yr hen a phobloedd ddiweddarach

trans-unit.source: Are to be gathered together for the appointment of a known Day."
trans-unit.target: Yn ei chasglu at ei gilydd ar gyfer penodi hysbys y dydd.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed you, O those astray [who are] deniers,
trans-unit.target: Yna yn wir ichi, O rhai ar gyfeiliorn [sydd] llosg,

trans-unit.source: Will be eating from trees of zaqqum
trans-unit.target: Bydd yn bwyta o goed zaqqum

trans-unit.source: And filling with it your bellies
trans-unit.target: A llenwi ag ef eich Boliau

trans-unit.source: And drinking on top of it from scalding water
trans-unit.target: Ac yfed ar ei ben o sgaldio dŵr

trans-unit.source: And will drink as the drinking of thirsty camels.
trans-unit.target: A bydd diod yn yfed camelod sychedig.

trans-unit.source: That is their accommodation on the Day of Recompense.
trans-unit.target: Dyna eu llety ar y dydd o ad-dalu.

trans-unit.source: We have created you, so why do you not believe?
trans-unit.target: Rydym wedi creu chi, felly pam nad ydych yn credu?

trans-unit.source: Have you seen that which you emit?
trans-unit.target: Ydych chi wedi gweld y mae eich allyrru?

trans-unit.source: Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator?
trans-unit.target: A yw'n chi sy'n creu ei, neu yr ydym y Crëwr?

trans-unit.source: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone
trans-unit.target: Wedi inni a ddyfarnwyd marwolaeth ymysg chi, ac yr ydym at ei

trans-unit.source: In that We will change your likenesses and produce you in that [form] which you do not know.
trans-unit.target: Yn hynny o beth, byddwn yn newid eich likenesses ac yn llunio eich ffurf honno [] lle nad ydych yn gwybod.

trans-unit.source: And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember?
trans-unit.target: Ac yr ydych eisoes yn hysbys creu cyntaf, felly bydd nad ydych yn cofio?

trans-unit.source: And have you seen that [seed] which you sow?
trans-unit.target: A ydych chi wedi gweld y [hadau] y mae hau?

trans-unit.source: Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower?
trans-unit.target: Ai ydych sydd yn ei gwneud yn tyfu, neu yr ydym y tyfwr?

trans-unit.source: If We willed, We could make it [dry] debris, and you would remain in wonder,
trans-unit.target: Os ydym yn ewyllysio iddi, gallem wneud malurion TG [sych], ac y byddai'r chi aros mewn syndod,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "Indeed, we are [now] in debt;
trans-unit.target: [Dweud], "yn wir, rydym yn [nawr] mewn dyled;

trans-unit.source: Rather, we have been deprived."
trans-unit.target: Yn hytrach, rydym wedi'u hamddifadu."

trans-unit.source: And have you seen the water that you drink?
trans-unit.target: A ydych chi wedi gweld y dŵr yfed?

trans-unit.source: Is it you who brought it down from the clouds, or is it We who bring it down?
trans-unit.target: Ydyw i chi sy'n ei dwyn i lawr o y cymylau, neu ai ni sydd yn dod i lawr?

trans-unit.source: If We willed, We could make it bitter, so why are you not grateful?
trans-unit.target: Os ydym yn ewyllysio iddi, gellid gwneud yn chwerw, felly pam yr ydych yn ddiolchgar?

trans-unit.source: And have you seen the fire that you ignite?
trans-unit.target: A ydych chi wedi gweld y tân y mae eich ignite?

trans-unit.source: Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the producer?
trans-unit.target: A yw'n chi sy'n cynhyrchu ei goeden, neu yr ydym i'r cynhyrchydd?

trans-unit.source: We have made it a reminder and provision for the travelers,
trans-unit.target: Rydym wedi atgoffa a darpariaeth ar gyfer y teithwyr,

trans-unit.source: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
trans-unit.target: Felly exalt enw eich Arglwydd, mwyaf mawr.

trans-unit.source: Then I swear by the setting of the stars,
trans-unit.target: Tyngaf wedyn gan y lleoliad o sêr,

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is an oath - if you could know - [most] great.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, mae'n llw-os gallech gwybod-mawr [mwyaf].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is a noble Qur'an
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae'n noble Qur'an

trans-unit.source: In a Register well-protected;
trans-unit.target: Mewn cofrestr yn cael ei ddiogelu'n dda;

trans-unit.source: None touch it except the purified.
trans-unit.target: Mae dim yn ei gyffwrdd ac eithrio y wedi'u puro.

trans-unit.source: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: [Mae'n] datguddiad gan yr Arglwydd y byd.

trans-unit.source: Then is it to this statement that you are indifferent
trans-unit.target: Yna y mae'n datganiad hwn eich bod yn ddifater

trans-unit.source: And make [the thanks for] your provision that you deny [the Provider]?
trans-unit.target: A gwneud [Diolch] ar gyfer eich darpariaeth yr ydych yn gwadu'r [y darparwr]?

trans-unit.source: Then why, when the soul at death reaches the throat
trans-unit.target: Yna pam, pan y mae yr enaid ar farwolaeth yn cyrraedd y gwddf

trans-unit.source: And you are at that time looking on -
trans-unit.target: A ydych yn bod amser yn edrych ar-

trans-unit.source: And Our angels are nearer to him than you, but you do not see -
trans-unit.target: Ac angylion ein nes iddo na chi, ond nid ydych yn gweld-

trans-unit.source: Then why do you not, if you are not to be recompensed,
trans-unit.target: Yna pam nad ydych, os ydych i beidio eu had-dalu,

trans-unit.source: Bring it back, if you should be truthful?
trans-unit.target: Dod â hi, os y dylech fod yn onest?

trans-unit.source: And if the deceased was of those brought near to Allah,
trans-unit.target: Ac os oedd yr ymadawedig o'r rhai dwyn ger Allah,

trans-unit.source: Then [for him is] rest and bounty and a garden of pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Yna [iddo yn] weddill a bounty a gardd o bleser.

trans-unit.source: And if he was of the companions of the right,
trans-unit.target: Ac os oedd y cymdeithion yr hawl,

trans-unit.source: Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right."
trans-unit.target: Yna [bydd yr angylion yn dweud], "heddwch i chi; [ydych] o chymdeithion hawl. "

trans-unit.source: But if he was of the deniers [who were] astray,
trans-unit.target: Ond os oedd y llosg [oedd] ar gyfeiliorn,

trans-unit.source: Then [for him is] accommodation of scalding water
trans-unit.target: Yna [iddo yn] llety o sgaldio dŵr

trans-unit.source: And burning in Hellfire
trans-unit.target: A llosgi yn Hellfire

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is the true certainty,
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, dyma y gwir sicrwydd,

trans-unit.source: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
trans-unit.target: Felly exalt enw eich Arglwydd, mwyaf mawr.

trans-unit.source: Whatever is in the heavens and earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Mae beth bynnag sydd yn y nefoedd a'r ddaear exalts Allah, ac ef yw Exalted yn efallai, yn y doeth.

trans-unit.source: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. He gives life and causes death, and He is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Mae ef yn ddominiwn y nefoedd a'r ddaear. Mae'n rhoi bywyd ac achosi marwolaeth, ac mae dros holl bethau yn gymwys.

trans-unit.source: He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Ef yw'r cyntaf ac yn yr olaf, y Ascendant a agosatoch ac ef, yr holl bethau, mae gwybod.

trans-unit.source: It is He who created the heavens and earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne. He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein; and He is with you wherever you are. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Mae'n ef a grëwyd y nefoedd a'r ddaear yn chwe diwrnod ac yna ei hun yn sefydlu uchod i'r Orsedd. Gwyr ef beth yn treiddio i'r ddaear a beth sy'n deillio ohono a beth yn disgyn o'r nefoedd y a beth esgyn ynddo; ac mae gyda chi ble bynnag yr ydych. A yw Allah, yr hyn yr ydych yn ei wneud, yn ei gweld.

trans-unit.source: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. And to Allah are returned [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: Mae ef yn ddominiwn y nefoedd a'r ddaear. Ac i Allah yn dychwelyd [holl] materion.

trans-unit.source: He causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night, and he is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: Mae'n achosi y nos i fynd y diwrnod ac yn achosi y diwrnod i ddod y nos, ac mae'n gwybod hynny o fewn y bronnau.

trans-unit.source: Believe in Allah and His Messenger and spend out of that in which He has made you successors. For those who have believed among you and spent, there will be a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Yn credu mewn Allah a Messenger ei a gwariant allan o hynny y mae wedi gwneud eich olynwyr. Ar gyfer y rhai sydd wedi credu eich plith a wariwyd, bydd gwobr mawr.

trans-unit.source: And why do you not believe in Allah while the Messenger invites you to believe in your Lord and He has taken your covenant, if you should [truly] be believers?
trans-unit.target: A pam nad ydych yn credu yn Allah tra mae y negesydd yn eich gwahodd i gredu yn eich Arglwydd ac mae wedi cymryd eich cyfamod, os [yn wir] Dylech fod credinwyr?

trans-unit.source: It is He who sends down upon His Servant [Muhammad] verses of clear evidence that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And indeed, Allah is to you Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Mae'n ef sy'n anfon i lawr ar ei was [Muhammad] penillion o tystiolaeth glir y gall ef yn dod â chi o darknesses i oleuni. Ac yn wir, Allah yw i chi math a Merciful.

trans-unit.source: And why do you not spend in the cause of Allah while to Allah belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth? Not equal among you are those who spent before the conquest [of Makkah] and fought [and those who did so after it]. Those are greater in degree than they who spent afterwards and fought. But to all Allah has promised the best [reward]. And Allah, with what you do, is Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: A pam nad ydych yn gwario yn Mae achos Allah tra i Allah yn perthyn treftadaeth y nefoedd a'r ddaear? Nid cyfartal ymhlith eich yw'r rhai sy'n cael ei wario cyn y goresgyniad [o blentyndod] ac ymladd [a'r rhai a wnaeth hynny ar ôl iddo]. Mae'r rheini'n fwy o raddau nag sy'n cael ei wario wedyn ac ymladd. Ond i Allah holl wedi addo y gorau [gwobr]. A gyda beth yr ydych yn ei wneud, yw Allah, yn gyfarwydd.

trans-unit.source: Who is it that would loan Allah a goodly loan so He will multiply it for him and he will have a noble reward?
trans-unit.target: Pwy yw y byddai'r benthyciad Allah benthyciad reit dda felly bydd ef wedi ei luosi iddo a bydd ganddo wobr aruchel?

trans-unit.source: On the Day you see the believing men and believing women, their light proceeding before them and on their right, [it will be said], "Your good tidings today are [of] gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide eternally." That is what is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Ar y diwrnod y gwelwch y gredu dynion a menywod, eu bwrw ymlaen ysgafn cyn iddynt ac ar eu hawl i gredu, [bydd dweud], "eich tidings da heddiw yn [o] gerddi o dan y llif afonydd, lle y bydd chi lynu fythol." Dyna beth yw cyrhaeddiad mawr.

trans-unit.source: On the [same] Day the hypocrite men and hypocrite women will say to those who believed, "Wait for us that we may acquire some of your light." It will be said, "Go back behind you and seek light." And a wall will be placed between them with a door, its interior containing mercy, but on the outside of it is torment.
trans-unit.target: Ar y diwrnod [un] Bydd y rhagrithiwr dynion a menywod rhagrithiwr yn dweud i'r rhai sydd yn credu, "Aros am ein bod efallai yn caffael rhai o'r eich goleuni." Bydd dweud, "Mynd yn ôl tu ôl i chi a geisio golau." A bydd wal yn gosod rhyngddynt gyda drws, ei tu mewn yn cynnwys drugaredd, ond y tu allan yn boen.

trans-unit.source: The hypocrites will call to the believers, "Were we not with you?" They will say, "Yes, but you afflicted yourselves and awaited [misfortune for us] and doubted, and wishful thinking deluded you until there came the command of Allah. And the Deceiver deceived you concerning Allah.
trans-unit.target: Bydd y rhagrithwyr yn galw i gredinwyr, "Roeddem ni gyda chi?" Byddant yn dweud, "ie, ond ydych yn dioddef eich hunain ac aros am [anffawd i ni] ac yn amau, ac roedd gwrach deluded chi hyd nes y deuai y Gorchymyn Allah. Ac roedd y Deceiver yn eu twyllo chi ynghylch Allah.

trans-unit.source: So today no ransom will be taken from you or from those who disbelieved. Your refuge is the Fire. It is most worthy of you, and wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Felly heddiw bydd cymryd unrhyw pridwerth gennych chi neu gan y rhai a ddysgais. Eich lloches yn y tân. Mae'n deilwng rhan fwyaf ohonoch, a truenus yn y gyrchfan.

trans-unit.source: Has the time not come for those who have believed that their hearts should become humbly submissive at the remembrance of Allah and what has come down of the truth? And let them not be like those who were given the Scripture before, and a long period passed over them, so their hearts hardened; and many of them are defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Nid yr amser wedi dod ar gyfer y rhai sydd wedi credu y dylai eu calonnau fod yn ostyngedig ostyngedig yn cofio Allah a beth wedi dod i lawr o'r gwirionedd? A gadewch iddynt ni fod fel rhai a rhoddwyd yr ysgrythur cyn, a basio cyfnod hir dros iddynt, fel eu calonnau wedi caledu; ac mae llawer ohonynt yn defiantly anufudd.

trans-unit.source: Know that Allah gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. We have made clear to you the signs; perhaps you will understand.
trans-unit.target: Gwybod bod Allah yn rhoi bywyd i'r ddaear ar ôl ei lifelessness. Yr ydym wedi egluro i chi yr arwyddion; Efallai y byddwch yn deall.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the men who practice charity and the women who practice charity and [they who] have loaned Allah a goodly loan - it will be multiplied for them, and they will have a noble reward.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y dynion sy'n ymarfer elusen a menywod sy'n ymarfer elusen a [iddynt sydd] wedi benthyg Allah benthyciad reit dda-bydd yn cael eu lluosi ar eu cyfer, a bydd ganddynt wobr aruchel.

trans-unit.source: And those who have believed in Allah and His messengers - those are [in the ranks of] the supporters of truth and the martyrs, with their Lord. For them is their reward and their light. But those who have disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: A'r rhai sydd wedi credu yn Allah ac yn ei negeswyr-rhai yn [yn rhengoedd y] y cefnogwyr y merthyron, gyda eu Arglwydd a gwir. Iddynt yn eu gwobrwyo ac yn eu goleuni. Ond y rhai sydd wedi ddysgais a gwadu ein penillion-rhai yn chymdeithion Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: Know that the life of this world is but amusement and diversion and adornment and boasting to one another and competition in increase of wealth and children - like the example of a rain whose [resulting] plant growth pleases the tillers; then it dries and you see it turned yellow; then it becomes [scattered] debris. And in the Hereafter is severe punishment and forgiveness from Allah and approval. And what is the worldly life except the enjoyment of delusion.
trans-unit.target: Gwybod nad yw bywyd y byd hwn ond difyrion a dargyfeirio ac addurn a brolio i un arall a chystadleuaeth yn cynyddu cyfoeth a phlant-fel yr enghraifft o'r glaw eu [arwain] planhigion twf plesio flagur; yna iddo sychu a welwch chi mae'n troi melyn; yna daw'n malurion [gwasgaredig]. Ac yn y o hyn ymlaen yn difrifol gosb a maddeuant gan Allah a chymeradwyo. A sut beth yw bywyd worldly ac eithrio y mwynhad o dwyll.

trans-unit.source: Race toward forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden whose width is like the width of the heavens and earth, prepared for those who believed in Allah and His messengers. That is the bounty of Allah which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.
trans-unit.target: Yn hiliol tuag at maddeuant gan eich Arglwydd a gardd eu lled yw lled y nefoedd a'r ddaear, yn barod ar gyfer y rhai sy'n credu yn Allah ac ei negeswyr. Dyna bounty Allah y mae'n ei rhoi i bwy mae ef wills, ac Allah yn possessor o bounty mawr.

trans-unit.source: No disaster strikes upon the earth or among yourselves except that it is in a register before We bring it into being - indeed that, for Allah, is easy -
trans-unit.target: Mae unrhyw drychineb yn taro ar wyneb y ddaear neu ymysg eich gilydd heblaw ei fod mewn cofrestr cyn inni ddod ag ef i fodolaeth-yn wir sydd, ar gyfer Allah, yn hawdd-

trans-unit.source: In order that you not despair over what has eluded you and not exult [in pride] over what He has given you. And Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful -
trans-unit.target: Fel y mae eich nid anobaith dros beth wedi osgoi chi a exult ni [mewn balchder] dros beth yr ef wedi rhoi i chi. Ac nid Allah yn hoffi pawb eich hunan ac ymffrostgar-

trans-unit.source: [Those] who are stingy and enjoin upon people stinginess. And whoever turns away - then indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: [Hynny] sy'n cybyddlyd a enjoin ar stinginess o bobl. A pwy bynnag sydd yn troi i ffwrdd-ac yna yn wir, Allah yn rhad ac am ddim o angen, y Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: We have already sent Our messengers with clear evidences and sent down with them the Scripture and the balance that the people may maintain [their affairs] in justice. And We sent down iron, wherein is great military might and benefits for the people, and so that Allah may make evident those who support Him and His messengers unseen. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: Rydym eisoes wedi anfon ein negeswyr â dangos clir a anfonwyd i lawr gyda hwy yr ysgrythur a'r cydbwysedd y gall pobl gynnal [eu materion] mewn cyfiawnder. A anfonwyd i lawr haearn, lle milwrol mawr efallai ac o fudd i bobl, ac felly bod Allah efallai gwneud amlwg rhai sy'n cefnogi ef a ei unseen negeswyr. Yn wir, yw Allah Powerful a Exalted yn efallai.

trans-unit.source: And We have already sent Noah and Abraham and placed in their descendants prophethood and scripture; and among them is he who is guided, but many of them are defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Ac rydym eisoes wedi anfon Noah, ac Abraham a roddir yn eu prophethood disgynyddion a ysgrythur; ac yn eu plith mae ef sy'n ei harwain, ond llawer ohonynt yn defiantly anufudd.

trans-unit.source: Then We sent following their footsteps Our messengers and followed [them] with Jesus, the son of Mary, and gave him the Gospel. And We placed in the hearts of those who followed him compassion and mercy and monasticism, which they innovated; We did not prescribe it for them except [that they did so] seeking the approval of Allah. But they did not observe it with due observance. So We gave the ones who believed among them their reward, but many of them are defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Wedyn inni anfon ein negeswyr yn dilyn eu hesiampl a dilyn [eu] gyda Iesu, fab i Mary, a roddodd iddo yr efengyl. A ydym mewn sefyllfa yng nghalonnau'r rhai sy'n dilyn ef tosturi a drugaredd a monasticism, a dywedodd eu bod yn arloesi; Nid oedd ei ragnodi ar eu cyfer ac eithrio [y gwnaethant hynny] geisio cymeradwyaeth Allah. Ond nid oedd ei oruchwylio'n â defodau. Felly rhoesom y rhai oedd yn credu yn eu plith eu gwobrwyo, ond mae llawer ohonynt yn defiantly anufudd.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fear Allah and believe in His Messenger; He will [then] give you a double portion of His mercy and make for you a light by which you will walk and forgive you; and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O Mae chi sydd wedi credu, Allah yn ofni ac yn credu yn ei negesydd; [Wedyn] Bydd rhoi eich dogn dwbl o ei drugaredd a gwneud i chi goleuni y byddwch yn cerdded ac yn maddau ichi; ac Allah yn Forgiving a Merciful.

trans-unit.source: [This is] so that the People of the Scripture may know that they are not able [to obtain] anything from the bounty of Allah and that [all] bounty is in the hand of Allah; He gives it to whom He wills. And Allah is the possessor of great bounty.
trans-unit.target: [Mae hwn] fel y gall pobl y ysgrythur yn gwybod nad ydynt yn gallu [] dim o bounty Allah, a bod yn bounty [bob] yn llaw Allah; Mae'n rhoi ei y mae ef yn wills. Ac y possessor o bounty mawr yn Allah.

trans-unit.source: Certainly has Allah heard the speech of the one who argues with you, [O Muhammad], concerning her husband and directs her complaint to Allah. And Allah hears your dialogue; indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Yn sicr mae'r Allah wedi clywed yr araith yr un sy'n dadlau gyda chi, [O Muhammad], ynghylch ei gŵr ac yn cyfarwyddo ei chŵyn i Allah. Ac mae'r Allah yn gwrando ar eich deialog; yn wir, yn Allah clyw a gweld.

trans-unit.source: Those who pronounce thihar among you [to separate] from their wives - they are not [consequently] their mothers. Their mothers are none but those who gave birth to them. And indeed, they are saying an objectionable statement and a falsehood. But indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Rhai sy'n ynganu thihar eich [i wahanu] plith gan eu gwragedd-nid ydynt [felly] eu mamau. Dim ond y rhai a roddodd enedigaeth iddynt yn eu mamau. Ac yn wir, maent yn dweud datganiad wrthun ac anwiredd. Ond yn wir, Allah yn Pardoning a Forgiving.

trans-unit.source: And those who pronounce thihar from their wives and then [wish to] go back on what they said - then [there must be] the freeing of a slave before they touch one another. That is what you are admonished thereby; and Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: A'r rhai a thihar oddi wrth eu gwragedd ynganu ac wedyn [yn dymuno] fynd yn ôl ar yr hyn y maent yn ei ddweud-yna [Bydd] ryddhau caethion cyn eu bod yn sôn un arall. Dyna beth yr ydych yn geryddu gan; a yw Allah yn gyfarwydd â beth yr ydych yn ei wneud.

trans-unit.source: And he who does not find [a slave] - then a fast for two months consecutively before they touch one another; and he who is unable - then the feeding of sixty poor persons. That is for you to believe [completely] in Allah and His Messenger; and those are the limits [set by] Allah. And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Ac ef a yw'n ddim canfod [caethion]-yna cyflym ar gyfer dau fis yn olynol cyn eu bod yn sôn un arall; ac ef a all-wedyn bwydo drigain personau gwael. Dyna i chi [llwyr] yn credu mewn Allah a Messenger ei; a rhai yn y terfynau [set gan] Allah. Ac y disbelievers yn cosbi poenus.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who oppose Allah and His Messenger are abased as those before them were abased. And We have certainly sent down verses of clear evidence. And for the disbelievers is a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y rheini sy'n gwrthwynebu'r Allah a ei negesydd yn gweithdrefnau'r fel rhai cyn iddynt roedd gweithdrefnau'r. Ac yn sicr rydym wedi anfon i lawr penillion o dystiolaeth glir. Ac y disbelievers yn cosbi bychanol.

trans-unit.source: On the Day when Allah will resurrect them all and inform them of what they did. Allah had enumerated it, while they forgot it; and Allah is, over all things, Witness.
trans-unit.target: Ar y diwrnod pan bydd Allah yn atgyfodi'r pob un ohonynt ac yn eu hysbysu o'r hyn a wnaethant. Roedd Allah yn cyfrif, tra maent anghofiodd ei; a Allah, dros holl bethau, tyst.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered that Allah knows what is in the heavens and what is on the earth? There is in no private conversation three but that He is the fourth of them, nor are there five but that He is the sixth of them - and no less than that and no more except that He is with them [in knowledge] wherever they are. Then He will inform them of what they did, on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Nid ydych wedi ystyried bod Allah yn gwybod beth sydd yn y nefoedd a'r hyn sydd ar y ddaear? Mae unrhyw sgwrs breifat tri ond ef yw'r pedwerydd ohonynt, nid oes ychwaith pump ond y mae y chweched ohonynt-a dim llai na hynny a dim mwy ac eithrio ei fod yn gyda hwy [mewn gwybodaeth] lle bynnag y maent. Yna bydd yn rhoi gwybod iddynt am yr hyn a wnaethant, ar dydd atgyfodi. Yn wir yn Allah, yr holl bethau, mae gwybod.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered those who were forbidden from private conversation, then they return to that which they were forbidden and converse among themselves about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger? And when they come to you, they greet you with that [word] by which Allah does not greet you and say among themselves, "Why does Allah not punish us for what we say?" Sufficient for them is Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Nid ydych wedi ystyried rhai a oedd yn gwahardd rhag sgwrs breifat, yna maent yn dychwelyd i'r hyn y maent yn gwahardd ac yn sgwrsio ymysg eu hunain ynghylch pechod ac ymddygiad ymosodol ac anufudd-dod i y negesydd? A pan fyddant yn dod i chi, y cyfarchant chi gyda y gair gan y Allah yw nid eich cyfarch a dweud ymysg eu hunain, "Pam yw Allah nid cosbi wrthym am beth yr ydym yn ei ddweud?" Digonol ar eu cyfer yn uffern, y maent hwy, bydd [nodwch i] llosgi, a truenus yn y gyrchfan.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when you converse privately, do not converse about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger but converse about righteousness and piety. And fear Allah, to whom you will be gathered.
trans-unit.target: O wneud eich sydd wedi credu, pan ydych yn sgwrsio yn breifat, nid sgwrsio am pechod ac ymddygiad ymosodol ac anufudd-dod i'r negesydd ond yn sgwrsio am chyfiawnder i a piety. Ac ofn Allah, i bwy y bydd eich casglu.

trans-unit.source: Private conversation is only from Satan that he may grieve those who have believed, but he will not harm them at all except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely.
trans-unit.target: Sgwrs breifat yn unig o Satan y gall ef grieve rheini sydd wedi credu, ond bydd ef heb niwed iddynt o gwbl ac eithrio drwy ganiatâd Allah. A gadewch Allah Mae y credinwyr yn dibynnu arnynt.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when you are told, "Space yourselves" in assemblies, then make space; Allah will make space for you. And when you are told, "Arise," then arise; Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: O sydd wedi credu, pan y dywedir wrthych, "Gofod eich hunain" mewn Cynulliadau, yna gwnewch le; Bydd Allah yn gwneud lle i chi. A pan y dywedir wrthych, "Codi", yna godi; Bydd Allah yn codi rhai sydd wedi credu eich plith a'r rheini y rhoddwyd gwybodaeth, gradd. A yw Allah yn gyfarwydd â beth yr ydych yn ei wneud.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when you [wish to] privately consult the Messenger, present before your consultation a charity. That is better for you and purer. But if you find not [the means] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O chi sydd wedi credu, pan chi [dymuno] breifat ymgynghori y negesydd, oedd yn bresennol cyn eich ymgynghoriad yn elusen. Mae hynny'n well i chi a purach. Ond os ydych yn canfod nad [y ffordd]-yna yn wir, Allah yn Forgiving a Merciful.

trans-unit.source: Have you feared to present before your consultation charities? Then when you do not and Allah has forgiven you, then [at least] establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: Wedi ichi ofni i gyflwyno cyn eich elusennau ymgynghori? Yna pan nad ydych wedi Allah yn maddau ichi, yna [o leiaf] sefydlu gweddi a rhoi zakah a ufuddhau Allah a ei negesydd. A yw Allah yn gyfarwydd â beth yr ydych yn ei wneud.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered those who make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry? They are neither of you nor of them, and they swear to untruth while they know [they are lying].
trans-unit.target: Nid ydych wedi ystyried rhai sy'n gwneud cynghreiriaid o bobl gydag ef Daeth Allah yn ddig? Maent yn eich nac ohonynt, ac mae iddynt dyngu i untruth tra eu bod yn gwybod [yr oeddent yn dweud celwydd].

trans-unit.source: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing.
trans-unit.target: Mae'r Allah yn paratoi ar gyfer eu cosbi difrifol. Yn wir, roedd drygioni yr oeddent yn ei wneud.

trans-unit.source: They took their [false] oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah, and for them is a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: Cymerodd eu llwon [anwir] fel gorchudd, felly roedd maent yn osgoi [pobl] gan y ffordd Allah, ac ar gyfer eu cosbi bychanol.

trans-unit.source: Never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally
trans-unit.target: Byth bydd eu cyfoeth neu eu plant fanteisio ar iddynt erbyn Allah o gwbl. Mae'r rheini'n cymdeithion y tân; Bydd yn cadw at yr erthyglau fythol

trans-unit.source: On the Day Allah will resurrect them all, and they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they are [standing] on something. Unquestionably, it is they who are the liars.
trans-unit.target: Ar Allah dydd bydd atgyfodi'r pob un ohonynt, a bydd iddynt dyngu iddo fel y maent yn rhegi i chi ac yn meddwl eu bod [Sefydlog] ar rywbeth. Yn ddiamau, mae'n nhw sy'n y celwyddgwn.

trans-unit.source: Satan has overcome them and made them forget the remembrance of Allah. Those are the party of Satan. Unquestionably, the party of Satan - they will be the losers.
trans-unit.target: Satan wedi eu goresgyn a gwneud iddynt anghofio cofio Allah. Mae'r rhai yn y blaid o Satan. Yn ddiamau, y blaid o Satan-maent fydd ar eu colled.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the ones who oppose Allah and His Messenger - those will be among the most humbled.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y rhai sy'n gwrthwynebu Allah a ei negesydd-fydd y rheini ymysg y mwyaf ostyngedig.

trans-unit.source: Allah has written, "I will surely overcome, I and My messengers." Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: Allah wedi ysgrifennu, "Bydd siawns oresgyn, wyf a 'm negeswyr." Yn wir, yw Allah Powerful a Exalted yn efallai.

trans-unit.source: You will not find a people who believe in Allah and the Last Day having affection for those who oppose Allah and His Messenger, even if they were their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their kindred. Those - He has decreed within their hearts faith and supported them with spirit from Him. And We will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him - those are the party of Allah. Unquestionably, the party of Allah - they are the successful.
trans-unit.target: Ni welwch bobl sy'n credu mewn Allah a diwrnod olaf ar ôl anwyldeb ar gyfer y rhai sy'n gwrthwynebu Allah a ei negesydd, hyd yn oed os oeddent yn eu tadau neu eu meibion neu eu brodyr neu eu kindred. Rhai-mae wedi datgan o fewn eu calonnau ffydd ac ysbryd oddi wrtho yn eu cefnogi. Ac y bydd yn cyfaddef iddynt i gerddi o dan y llif afonydd, lle eu bod yn cadw fythol. Mae Allah yn falch gyda hwy, ac maent yn falch gydag ef-rhai yn y blaid Allah. Yn ddiamau, y blaid Allah-maent yn llwyddiannus.

trans-unit.source: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Beth bynnag sydd yn y nefoedd ac mae beth bynnag sydd ar y ddaear exalts Allah, ac mae'n Exalted yn efallai, yn y doeth.

trans-unit.source: It is He who expelled the ones who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture from their homes at the first gathering. You did not think they would leave, and they thought that their fortresses would protect them from Allah; but [the decree of] Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and He cast terror into their hearts [so] they destroyed their houses by their [own] hands and the hands of the believers. So take warning, O people of vision.
trans-unit.target: Mae'n ef a diarddel y rhai a ddysgais ymhlith pobl yr ysgrythur o'u cartrefi yn y crynhoad cyntaf. Nad oeddech yn credu byddai iddynt adael, ac yn credu y byddai adeiladu eu cestyll eu diogelu rhag Allah; ond [yr ordinhad o] Daeth Allah arnynt lle nad oeddent wedi disgwyl, ac mae'r cast terfysg yn eu calonnau [felly] dinistriodd maent eu tai drwy eu [ei hun] dwylo a'r dwylo yn y credinwyr. Felly cymerwch rybudd, pobl O weledigaeth.

trans-unit.source: And if not that Allah had decreed for them evacuation, He would have punished them in [this] world, and for them in the Hereafter is the punishment of the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Ac os oedd nid y Allah a ddyfarnwyd iddynt ddianc, ef fyddai wedi eu cosbi yn y byd [hwn], ac ar eu cyfer yn y o hyn ymlaen yw'r gosb y tân.

trans-unit.source: That is because they opposed Allah and His Messenger. And whoever opposes Allah - then indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: Mae hynny oherwydd yr oeddent yn gwrthwynebu Allah a ei negesydd. A pwy bynnag yn gwrthwynebu'r Allah-yna yn wir, Allah yn ddifrifol yn gosb.

trans-unit.source: Whatever you have cut down of [their] palm trees or left standing on their trunks - it was by permission of Allah and so He would disgrace the defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Beth bynnag yr ydych wedi torri [eu] coed palmwydd neu gadael Sefydlog ar eu boncyffion-yr oedd drwy ganiatâd Allah ac felly byddai ef disgrace defiantly anufudd.

trans-unit.source: And what Allah restored [of property] to His Messenger from them - you did not spur for it [in an expedition] any horses or camels, but Allah gives His messengers power over whom He wills, and Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: A beth Allah adfer [o eiddo] ei negesydd ohonynt-oedd chi nid yn sbarduno ar gyfer ei [yn daith] unrhyw geffylau neu camelod, ond Allah yn rhoi ei bŵer negeswyr dros bwy mae ef wills, a yw Allah dros holl bethau yn gymwys.

trans-unit.source: And what Allah restored to His Messenger from the people of the towns - it is for Allah and for the Messenger and for [his] near relatives and orphans and the [stranded] traveler - so that it will not be a perpetual distribution among the rich from among you. And whatever the Messenger has given you - take; and what he has forbidden you - refrain from. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: A pa Allah adfer ei Messenger gan bobl y trefi-ar gyfer Allah y negesydd ac ar gyfer [ei] ger perthnasau a amddifad ac o'r fath [sownd]-fel na bydd yn dosbarthu parhaus ymhlith y cyfoethog o blith chi. A gawsoch chi gan y negesydd beth bynnag-gymryd; a beth ei fod wedi gwahardd chi-ymatal rhag. Ac ofn Allah; yn wir, Allah yn ddifrifol yn gosb.

trans-unit.source: For the poor emigrants who were expelled from their homes and their properties, seeking bounty from Allah and [His] approval and supporting Allah and His Messenger, [there is also a share]. Those are the truthful.
trans-unit.target: Ar gyfer y gwael ymfudwyr o Gymru eu diarddel o'r eu cartrefi ac yn eu heiddo, ceisio bounty gan Allah a [ei] cymeradwyaeth a Allah ategol a ei negesydd, [Mae hefyd cyfran]. Mae'r rheini yn y geirwir.

trans-unit.source: And [also for] those who were settled in al-Madinah and [adopted] the faith before them. They love those who emigrated to them and find not any want in their breasts of what the emigrants were given but give [them] preference over themselves, even though they are in privation. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful.
trans-unit.target: A [hefyd] rhai a oedd wedi setlo yn al-Madinah ac [mabwysiadu] ffydd cyn iddynt. Maent wrth eu bodd yn rhai sy'n ymfudo iddynt ac yn ddod o hyd i ni mae unrhyw am yn eu bronnau o beth a rhoddwyd yr ymfudwyr o Gymru ond [eu] yn rhoi ffafriaeth dros eu hunain, er eu bod yn galedi. A pwy bynnag y caiff ei ddiogelu rhag y stinginess ei enaid-mae'n rhai a fydd yn llwyddiannus.

trans-unit.source: And [there is a share for] those who came after them, saying, "Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith and put not in our hearts [any] resentment toward those who have believed. Our Lord, indeed You are Kind and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Ac [Mae cyfran i] rhai a ddaeth ar ei ôl, yn dweud, "ein Arglwydd, maddau inni ac yn ein brodyr sydd yn ein rhagflaenu mewn ffydd ac nid yn ein calonnau [unrhyw] drwgdeimlad tuag at y rhai sydd wedi credu. Ein Arglwydd, yn wir yr ydych yn garedig a Merciful."

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered those who practice hypocrisy, saying to their brothers who have disbelieved among the People of the Scripture, "If you are expelled, we will surely leave with you, and we will not obey, in regard to you, anyone - ever; and if you are fought, we will surely aid you." But Allah testifies that they are liars.
