trans-unit.source: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]
trans-unit.target: Pan fydd yr haul yn lapio [mewn tywyllwch]

trans-unit.source: And when the stars fall, dispersing,
trans-unit.target: A pan mae sêr yn disgyn, gan wasgaru,

trans-unit.source: And when the mountains are removed
trans-unit.target: A phan ymaith y mynyddoedd

trans-unit.source: And when full-term she-camels are neglected
trans-unit.target: A phan esgeulusir tymor llawn hi-camelod

trans-unit.source: And when the wild beasts are gathered
trans-unit.target: A phan y bwystfilod gwyllt yn casglu

trans-unit.source: And when the seas are filled with flame
trans-unit.target: A phan y moroedd yn cael eu llenwi â fflam

trans-unit.source: And when the souls are paired
trans-unit.target: A pan mae eneidiau'r eu paru

trans-unit.source: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked
trans-unit.target: A phryd y ferch [oedd] wedi'i gladdu'n fyw gofynnir

trans-unit.source: For what sin she was killed
trans-unit.target: Ar gyfer pa pechod oedd hi yn lladd

trans-unit.source: And when the pages are made public
trans-unit.target: A phan y tudalennau yn cael eu cyhoeddi

trans-unit.source: And when the sky is stripped away
trans-unit.target: A phan yr awyr yw tynnu i ffwrdd

trans-unit.source: And when Hellfire is set ablaze
trans-unit.target: A phan Hellfire yw gosod yn wenfflam

trans-unit.source: And when Paradise is brought near,
trans-unit.target: A phan ddaw baradwys ger,

trans-unit.source: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].
trans-unit.target: Bydd enaid [yna] yn gwybod beth mae'n wedi dod o [].

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the retreating stars -
trans-unit.target: Tyngaf i felly y encilio sêr-

trans-unit.source: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -
trans-unit.target: Rhai sy'n rhedeg [eu cyrsiau] a diflannu-

trans-unit.source: And by the night as it closes in
trans-unit.target: Ac erbyn y nos fel ei yn cau

trans-unit.source: And by the dawn when it breathes
trans-unit.target: A thrwy y dawn pan yn anadl

trans-unit.source: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger
trans-unit.target: [Bod] yn wir, y Qur'an yn air [sy'n cael eu cyfleu gan] negesydd noble

trans-unit.source: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],
trans-unit.target: [Sydd] yn meddu grym a gyda'r perchennog yr Orsedd, diogel [mewn sefyllfa],

trans-unit.source: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.
trans-unit.target: Ufuddhau yno [yn y nefoedd] a dibynadwy.

trans-unit.source: And your companion is not [at all] mad.
trans-unit.target: Ac nid yw eich cydymaith [bob] mad.

trans-unit.source: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.
trans-unit.target: Ac eisoes wedi gweld Gabriel yn y gorwel clir.

trans-unit.source: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.
trans-unit.target: Ac nid yw Muhammad yn withholder [gwybodaeth am] y unseen.

trans-unit.source: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].
trans-unit.target: Ac nid y Qur'an yw y gair diafol, cafodd ei ddiarddel [o'r nefoedd].

trans-unit.source: So where are you going?
trans-unit.target: Felly ble fyddwch chi'n mynd?

trans-unit.source: It is not except a reminder to the worlds
trans-unit.target: Nid yw'n ac eithrio nodyn atgoffa i fyd

trans-unit.source: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.
trans-unit.target: Ar gyfer pwy bynnag wills ymhlith chi gymryd cwrs cywir.

trans-unit.source: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: A chi wneud ni bydd ac eithrio bod Allah yn wills-yr Arglwydd y byd.

trans-unit.source: When the sky breaks apart
trans-unit.target: Pan y sky seibiannau oddi wrth ei gilydd

trans-unit.source: And when the stars fall, scattering,
trans-unit.target: A pan mae sêr yn disgyn, scattering,

trans-unit.source: And when the seas are erupted
trans-unit.target: A phan y moroedd yn codi

trans-unit.source: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,
trans-unit.target: A phan y Beddau [cynnwys] wedi'u gwasgaru,

trans-unit.source: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.
trans-unit.target: Bydd enaid [yna] yn gwybod beth wedi rhoi blaen a gedwir yn ôl.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,
trans-unit.target: O dyn, hyn wedi cael eu twyllo chi ynghylch eich Arglwydd, hael,

trans-unit.source: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?
trans-unit.target: Sydd yn creu chi, yn dosbarthu chi, ac yn gytbwys?

trans-unit.source: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.
trans-unit.target: Ar ba ffurf bynnag oedd ei fod yn ewyllysio iddi mae wedi'i gynnull chi.

trans-unit.source: No! But you deny the Recompense.
trans-unit.target: na! Ond ydych yn gwadu'r ad-dalu.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, [penodi] dros eich ceidwaid,

trans-unit.source: Noble and recording;
trans-unit.target: Aruchel a chofnodi;

trans-unit.source: They know whatever you do.
trans-unit.target: Maent yn gwybod beth bynnag yr ydych yn ei wneud.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, bydd y righteous yn bleser,

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, bydd y drygionus yn Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,
trans-unit.target: Maent yn [Rhowch i] llosgi ynddo ar y dydd o ad-dalu,

trans-unit.source: And never therefrom will they be absent.
trans-unit.target: Ac ni thelir y byddant yn absennol.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
trans-unit.target: A gall hyn wneud yn gwybod beth yw y dydd o ad-dalu i chi?

trans-unit.source: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
trans-unit.target: Yna, beth gall wneud ichi wybod beth yw y dydd o ad-dalu?

trans-unit.source: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Mae'n ddiwrnod pan na bydd enaid yn meddu ar ar gyfer enaid arall [pŵer i wneud] peth; ac y Gorchymyn, a [llwyr] yw diwrnod, gyda Allah.

trans-unit.source: Woe to those who give less [than due],
trans-unit.target: Gwae i'r rhai sy'n rhoi llai [nag dyledus],

trans-unit.source: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.
trans-unit.target: Sydd, pan fyddant yn fesur o bobl, yn llawn.

trans-unit.source: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.
trans-unit.target: Ond os byddant yn rhoi'r Mesur neu o bwys iddynt, maent yn achosi colled.

trans-unit.source: Do they not think that they will be resurrected
trans-unit.target: Nad ydynt yn credu y bydd yn atgyfodi

trans-unit.source: For a tremendous Day -
trans-unit.target: Am ddiwrnod gwych-

trans-unit.source: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?
trans-unit.target: Y dydd pan fydd dynolryw yn sefyll ger bron yr Arglwydd o fyd?

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.
trans-unit.target: na! Yn wir, mae record y drwg yn sijjeen.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?
trans-unit.target: A gall hyn wneud ichi wybod beth yw sijjeen?

trans-unit.source: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.
trans-unit.target: Mae'n [eu cofnodi yn gyrchfan] cofrestr arsgrifio.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,
trans-unit.target: Gwae, y diwrnod hwnnw, llosg,

trans-unit.source: Who deny the Day of Recompense.
trans-unit.target: Sydd yn gwadu y dydd o ad-dalu.

trans-unit.source: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.
trans-unit.target: Ac mae un wedi ei wadu ac eithrio pob transgressor sinful.

trans-unit.source: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."
trans-unit.target: Pan y mae ein penillion roi iddo, meddai, "Chwedlau o bobloedd gynt."

trans-unit.source: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.
trans-unit.target: na! Yn hytrach, mae y staen yn cwmpasu eu calonnau yr hyn y maent yn ei ennill.

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.
trans-unit.target: na! Yn wir, o Arglwydd eu, y diwrnod hwnnw, bydd eu rhannu'n.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Yna byddant yn wir, [Rhowch a] llosgi yn Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."
trans-unit.target: Yna bydd dweud [iddyn nhw], "Dyma beth yr ydych yn ei defnyddio i wadu."

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.
trans-unit.target: na! Yn wir, yn y cofnod o y righteous mewn ' illiyyun.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?
trans-unit.target: A gall hyn wneud ichi wybod beth yw ' illiyyun?

trans-unit.source: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed
trans-unit.target: Mae'n [eu cofnodi yn gyrchfan] cofrestr arsgrifio

trans-unit.source: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Y mae yn dyst gan y rhai sy'n dwyn ger [i Allah].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, bydd y righteous yn bleser

trans-unit.source: On adorned couches, observing.
trans-unit.target: Ar addurno'r gwelyau, arsylwi.

trans-unit.source: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Bydd cydnabod yn eu hwynebau radiance o bleser.

trans-unit.source: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.
trans-unit.target: Byddant yn cael yfed gwin [pur] [oedd] wedi'i selio.

trans-unit.source: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.
trans-unit.target: Mae'r olaf o'r ei yn musk. Felly ar gyfer Gadewch hwn mae y cystadleuwyr yn cystadlu.

trans-unit.source: And its mixture is of Tasneem,
trans-unit.target: Ac mae ei gymysgedd o Tasneem,

trans-unit.source: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.
trans-unit.target: Mae rhai ger [i Allah] yfed y gwanwyn.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y rhai sy'n cyflawni troseddau a ddefnyddir i chwerthin ar y rhai sydd yn credu.

trans-unit.source: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.
trans-unit.target: Ac wrth iddyn nhw basio gan iddynt, byddai cyfnewid golwg ddirmygus.

trans-unit.source: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.
trans-unit.target: Ac wrth iddynt ddychwelyd at eu pobl, byddent yn dychwelyd jesting.

trans-unit.source: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."
trans-unit.target: A phan welsant hwy, bydden nhw'n dweud, "Yn wir, rhai yn wirioneddol colli."

trans-unit.source: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.
trans-unit.target: Ond nid oedd wedi eu hanfon fel gwarcheidwaid drostynt.

trans-unit.source: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,
trans-unit.target: Felly heddiw, rhai sydd yn credu yn chwerthin ar y disbelievers,

trans-unit.source: On adorned couches, observing.
trans-unit.target: Ar addurno'r gwelyau, arsylwi.

trans-unit.source: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?
trans-unit.target: [Nid] wedi disbelievers y gwobrwyo [diwrnod hwn] am beth y maen nhw'n ei wneud?

trans-unit.source: When the sky has split [open]
trans-unit.target: Pan y mae yr awyr rannu [agored]

trans-unit.source: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]
trans-unit.target: Ac wedi ateb ei Arglwydd a oedd rheidrwydd [i'w wneud]

trans-unit.source: And when the earth has been extended
trans-unit.target: A pan ymestynnwyd y ddaear

trans-unit.source: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]
trans-unit.target: A bwrw bod ynddo a hildio [TG]

trans-unit.source: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -
trans-unit.target: Ac wedi ateb ei Arglwydd a oedd yn ddyletswydd arni []-

trans-unit.source: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.
trans-unit.target: O dynolryw, yn wir chi yn laboring tuag at eich Arglwydd gyda [mawr] o waith a byddaf yn cwrdd â.

trans-unit.source: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,
trans-unit.target: Yna ag ef sy'n cael ei gofnodi yn ei law dde,

trans-unit.source: He will be judged with an easy account
trans-unit.target: Bernir ef i gyfrif hawdd

trans-unit.source: And return to his people in happiness.
trans-unit.target: A dychwelyd at ei bobl yn hapusrwydd.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,
trans-unit.target: Ond ag ef, sydd yn rhoi ei record tu ôl i'w gefn,

trans-unit.source: He will cry out for destruction
trans-unit.target: Bydd ef yn crio i'w dinistrio

trans-unit.source: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.
trans-unit.target: A [Rhowch i] llosgi mewn tanbaid.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, oedd wedi [unwaith] ymysg ei bobl mewn hapusrwydd;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, roedd yn credu y byddai ef byth yn dychwelyd [i Allah].

trans-unit.source: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Ond ie! Yn wir, ei Arglwydd oedd erioed iddo, weld.

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the twilight glow
trans-unit.target: Tyngaf i felly y Wawr cyfnos

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night and what it envelops
trans-unit.target: A thrwy y nos a beth y mae'n ei envelops

trans-unit.source: And [by] the moon when it becomes full
trans-unit.target: A [gan] y lleuad pan fydd yn llawn

trans-unit.source: [That] you will surely experience state after state.
trans-unit.target: [Bod] Bydd siawns profiad wladwriaeth ar ôl wladwriaeth.

trans-unit.source: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,
trans-unit.target: Felly beth yw'r [y mater] â hwy nad oeddent yn credu,

trans-unit.source: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?
trans-unit.target: A pan y Qur'an ei roi iddynt, wneud eu prostrate nid [i Allah]?

trans-unit.source: But those who have disbelieved deny,
trans-unit.target: Ond mae'r rheini wedi ddysgais yn gwadu,

trans-unit.source: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.
trans-unit.target: Ac Allah yn gwybod fwyaf am beth maent yn ei gadw o fewn eu hunain.

trans-unit.source: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,
trans-unit.target: Felly rhowch tidings cosb, poenus,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: Ac eithrio'r rhai sydd yn credu a gwneud gweithredoedd cyfiawn. Ar eu cyfer yn wobr yn ddi-baid.

trans-unit.source: By the sky containing great stars
trans-unit.target: Gan yr awyr sy'n cynnwys sêr mawr

trans-unit.source: And [by] the promised Day
trans-unit.target: A [gan] y dydd addawyd

trans-unit.source: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,
trans-unit.target: A gan y tyst a beth yn dyst,

trans-unit.source: Cursed were the companions of the trench
trans-unit.target: Felltithio oedd y cymdeithion y ffos

trans-unit.source: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,
trans-unit.target: [Cynnwys] y tân llawn tanwydd,

trans-unit.source: When they were sitting near it
trans-unit.target: Pan oeddent yn eistedd ger ei

trans-unit.source: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.
trans-unit.target: A oeddent, i beth yr oeddent yn ei wneud erbyn y credinwyr, yn dystion.

trans-unit.source: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,
trans-unit.target: Ac roedd eu mai mewnfudwyr mewn gwirionedd eu nid ac eithrio eu bod yn credu yn Allah, Exalted yn efallai, y Praiseworthy,

trans-unit.source: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.
trans-unit.target: I bwy perthyn ddominiwn y nefoedd a'r ddaear. Ac Allah, dros holl bethau, yn dyst.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, bydd rhai sydd wedi eich arteithio y gredu dynion a menywod gredu ac yna wedi edifarhau nad cosbi uffern, a bydd ganddynt y gosb y tân llosgi.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y rheini sydd wedi credu ac wedi gwneud gweithredoedd cyfiawn yn Mae gerddi o dan y llif afonydd. Mae cyrhaeddiad mawr.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, ystumio o eich Arglwydd yn ddifrifol.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae'n ef sy'n tarddu [creu] ac ailddarllediadau.

trans-unit.source: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,
trans-unit.target: Ac ef yw y Forgiving, y Affectionate,

trans-unit.source: Honorable Owner of the Throne,
trans-unit.target: Perchennog Anrhydeddus o'r Orsedd,

trans-unit.source: Effecter of what He intends.
trans-unit.target: Effecter o beth y mae'n bwriadu.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -
trans-unit.target: Mae wedi cyrraedd y stori y milwyr-chi

trans-unit.source: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?
trans-unit.target: [Hynny] Ffaro a Thamud?

trans-unit.source: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,
trans-unit.target: Ond hwy a chredu yn gwadu [parhaus],

trans-unit.source: While Allah encompasses them from behind.
trans-unit.target: Tra mae'r Allah yn cwmpasu iddynt o'r tu ôl.

trans-unit.source: But this is an honored Qur'an
trans-unit.target: Ond dyma Qur'an honored

trans-unit.source: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.
trans-unit.target: [Arsgrifio] mewn llechi gadwedig.

trans-unit.source: By the sky and the night comer -
trans-unit.target: Gan y sky a comer nos-

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the night comer?
trans-unit.target: A gall hyn wneud ichi wybod beth yw comer y nos?

trans-unit.source: It is the piercing star -
trans-unit.target: Mae'n tyllu seren-

trans-unit.source: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.
trans-unit.target: Nid oes unrhyw enaid ond bod ganddo dros ei protector.

trans-unit.source: So let man observe from what he was created.
trans-unit.target: Felly gadewch arsylwi o ef crëwyd dyn.

trans-unit.source: He was created from a fluid, ejected,
trans-unit.target: Crëwyd ef o hylif, tynnu'r,

trans-unit.source: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.
trans-unit.target: Dod i'r amlwg rhwng asgwrn cefn a yr asennau.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, Allah, i ddychwelyd iddo [yn fyw], yn gallu.

trans-unit.source: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,
trans-unit.target: Y dydd pan y bydd cyfrinachau cael eu rhoi ar brawf,

trans-unit.source: Then man will have no power or any helper.
trans-unit.target: Yna bydd dyn yn cael unrhyw bŵer neu unrhyw gynorthwy-ydd.

trans-unit.source: By the sky which returns [rain]
trans-unit.target: Gan yr awyr sy'n dychwelyd [glaw]

trans-unit.source: And [by] the earth which cracks open,
trans-unit.target: A [gan] y ddaear sy'n cracio agored,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y Qur'an yn ddatganiad pendant,

trans-unit.source: And it is not amusement.
trans-unit.target: Ac nid yw'n ddifyrrwch.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they are planning a plan,
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, maent yn cynllunio cynllun,

trans-unit.source: But I am planning a plan.
trans-unit.target: Ond yr wyf yn bwriadu cynllun.

trans-unit.source: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.
trans-unit.target: Felly ganiatáu amser ar gyfer y disbelievers. Adael am ychydig.

trans-unit.source: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,
trans-unit.target: Exalt enw'r Arglwydd eich, uchel,

trans-unit.source: Who created and proportioned
trans-unit.target: Sy'n creu a dosbarthu

trans-unit.source: And who destined and [then] guided
trans-unit.target: Ac sy'n tynghedu a llywio [yna]

trans-unit.source: And who brings out the pasture
trans-unit.target: Ac sy'n dwyn allan y borfa

trans-unit.source: And [then] makes it black stubble.
trans-unit.target: Ac [] sy'n ei ddu sofl.

trans-unit.source: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,
trans-unit.target: Byddwn yn gwneud ichi adrodd, [O Muhammad], ac na wnewch anghofio,

trans-unit.source: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Ac eithrio pa Allah dylai bydd. Yn wir, mae'n gwybod beth yw datgan a beth yw cudd.

trans-unit.source: And We will ease you toward ease.
trans-unit.target: A fydd yn ysgafnhau'r chi tuag at hwylustod.

trans-unit.source: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;
trans-unit.target: Felly atgoffa, os dylid atgoffa yn elwa;

trans-unit.source: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Bydd ef a [Allah] yn ofni cael eu hatgoffa.

trans-unit.source: But the wretched one will avoid it -
trans-unit.target: Ond bydd yr un truenus ei osgoi-

trans-unit.source: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,
trans-unit.target: [Mae'n] pwy fydd [nodwch a] llosgi yn y tân mwyaf,

trans-unit.source: Neither dying therein nor living.
trans-unit.target: Marw ynddo nac yn byw.

trans-unit.source: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself
trans-unit.target: Mae ef yn sicr wedi llwyddo sydd buro ei hun

trans-unit.source: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.
trans-unit.target: A sôn am enw ei Arglwydd a prays.

trans-unit.source: But you prefer the worldly life,
trans-unit.target: Ond byddai'n well gennych y worldly bywyd,

trans-unit.source: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: Er bod y o hyn ymlaen yn well ac yn fwy parhaus.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae hyn yn yr hen ysgrythurau,

trans-unit.source: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
trans-unit.target: Yr ysgrythurau Abraham a Moses.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?
trans-unit.target: Wedi cyrraedd eich Mae adroddiad y Overwhelming [digwyddiad]?

trans-unit.source: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,
trans-unit.target: [Rai] wynebau, y dydd, yn ostyngedig,

trans-unit.source: Working [hard] and exhausted.
trans-unit.target: Gweithio [anodd] a dihysbyddu.

trans-unit.source: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.
trans-unit.target: Maent yn [Rhowch i] yn llosgi yn dân poeth yn ddwys.

trans-unit.source: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.
trans-unit.target: Byddant yn cael diod o wanwyn berwi.

trans-unit.source: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant
trans-unit.target: Ar eu cyfer fydd bwyd ac eithrio o'r planhigion gwenwynig, pigog

trans-unit.source: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.
trans-unit.target: A nourishes nac avails yn erbyn newyn.

trans-unit.source: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.
trans-unit.target: [Arall] wynebau, y dydd, bydd yn dangos pleser.

trans-unit.source: With their effort [they are] satisfied
trans-unit.target: Gyda eu hymdrech [ydynt] fodlon

trans-unit.source: In an elevated garden,
trans-unit.target: Mewn gardd dyrchafedig,

trans-unit.source: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.
trans-unit.target: Lle byddan nhw'n clywed unrhyw araith anaddas.

trans-unit.source: Within it is a flowing spring.
trans-unit.target: O fewn mae'n gwanwyn sy'n llifo'n rhwydd.

trans-unit.source: Within it are couches raised high
trans-unit.target: O fewn ei eu gwelyau a godwyd yn uchel

trans-unit.source: And cups put in place
trans-unit.target: A chwpanau ar waith

trans-unit.source: And cushions lined up
trans-unit.target: A chlustogau Condemniwyd

trans-unit.source: And carpets spread around.
trans-unit.target: A charpedi lledaenu o amgylch.

trans-unit.source: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?
trans-unit.target: Yna nid ydynt yn edrych ar y camelod-sut maent yn creu?

trans-unit.source: And at the sky - how it is raised?
trans-unit.target: Ac ar yr awyr-sut y mae ei godi?

trans-unit.source: And at the mountains - how they are erected?
trans-unit.target: Ac ar y mynyddoedd-sut y mae eu codi?

trans-unit.source: And at the earth - how it is spread out?
trans-unit.target: Ac ar y ddaear-sut cael ei daenu?

trans-unit.source: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.
trans-unit.target: Felly atgoffa, [O Muhammad]; yr ydych yn dim ond nodyn i'ch atgoffa.

trans-unit.source: You are not over them a controller.
trans-unit.target: Nid ydych yn dros eu rheolwr.

trans-unit.source: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -
trans-unit.target: Fodd bynnag, ef sy'n troi i ffwrdd ac yn disbelieves-

trans-unit.source: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.
trans-unit.target: Yna bydd Allah yn cosbi'r ef gyda y gosb fwyaf.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, to Us is their return.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, i ni yw eu dychwelyd.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, yna ar ein gwarthaf yn eu cyfrif.

trans-unit.source: By the dawn
trans-unit.target: Gan y dawn

trans-unit.source: And [by] ten nights
trans-unit.target: A [gan] nosweithiau deg

trans-unit.source: And [by] the even [number] and the odd
trans-unit.target: A gan hyd yn oed [nifer] ac ambell

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it passes,
trans-unit.target: A [gan] y nos pan mae'n pasio,

trans-unit.source: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?
trans-unit.target: Oes [nid] yn [holl] y llw digon [o] ar gyfer un o'r canfyddiad?

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -
trans-unit.target: Nid ydych wedi ystyried sut y deliodd eich Arglwydd â ' Aad-

trans-unit.source: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,
trans-unit.target: [Â] Iram-oedd pileri canmoladwy,

trans-unit.source: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?
trans-unit.target: Crëwyd y hoff ohonynt byth yn y tir?

trans-unit.source: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?
trans-unit.target: A [â] Thamud, sydd yn cerfio ar y creigiau yn y Cwm?

trans-unit.source: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -
trans-unit.target: A [gyda'r] Ffaro, perchennog llawer yn y fantol? -

trans-unit.source: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands
trans-unit.target: [Ohonynt] bwy gormesu o fewn y tiroedd

trans-unit.source: And increased therein the corruption.
trans-unit.target: A mwy o erthyglau y llygredd.

trans-unit.source: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.
trans-unit.target: Felly roedd eich Arglwydd yn arllwys arnynt pla o gosb.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae eich Arglwydd yn arsylwi.

trans-unit.source: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."
trans-unit.target: Ac o ran y dyn, pan fydd yr Arglwydd ei ceisio ef a [felly] yn hael iddo ac yn ffafrio ef, meddai, "Mae fy Arglwydd honored mi."

trans-unit.source: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."
trans-unit.target: Ond pan mae ef yn ceisio ac yn cyfyngu ar ei darpariaeth, meddai, "Mae fy Arglwydd eu bychanu mi."

trans-unit.source: No! But you do not honor the orphan
trans-unit.target: na! Ond nid chi wneud anrhydedd honno yr amddifad

trans-unit.source: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.
trans-unit.target: Ac nid ydych yn annog un arall i fwydo y tlawd.

trans-unit.source: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,
trans-unit.target: A Mae chi a ddefnyddiwn etifeddiaeth, devouring [TG] yn gyfan gwbl,

trans-unit.source: And you love wealth with immense love.
trans-unit.target: A ydych yn eu caru cyfoeth gyda chariad enfawr.

trans-unit.source: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -
trans-unit.target: na! Pan y ddaear wedi bod ati-pounded a mâl-

trans-unit.source: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,
trans-unit.target: A daeth eich Arglwydd ac angylion, gradd ar safle,

trans-unit.source: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?
trans-unit.target: A ddygwyd [o fewn barn], cofia y dydd, yw uffern-y dydd, dyn, ond pa les iddo fydd y cofio?

trans-unit.source: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."
trans-unit.target: Bydd ef yn dweud, "O, dymunaf anfonais ymlaen [da] ar gyfer fy mywyd."

trans-unit.source: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,
trans-unit.target: Felly, ar y dydd, dim bydd cosbi [fel ddifrifol] fel ei gosbi,

trans-unit.source: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].
trans-unit.target: A bydd yr un yn rhwymo [fel ddifrifol] fel ei rhwymo [o evildoers].

trans-unit.source: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,
trans-unit.target: [I righteous dywedir], "O sicrhaodd enaid,

trans-unit.source: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],
trans-unit.target: Dychwelyd at eich Arglwydd, falch dda a braf [ef],

trans-unit.source: And enter among My [righteous] servants
trans-unit.target: A rhowch ymhlith fy gweision [hoes dabloid]

trans-unit.source: And enter My Paradise."
trans-unit.target: A rhowch fy baradwys.

trans-unit.source: I swear by this city, Makkah -
trans-unit.target: Tyngaf y ddinas hon, blentyndod-

trans-unit.source: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -
trans-unit.target: A ydych chi, [O Muhammad], yn rhad ac am ddim o'r cyfyngiad yn y ddinas hon-

trans-unit.source: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],
trans-unit.target: A gan y tad ac a ganwyd [o ef],

trans-unit.source: We have certainly created man into hardship.
trans-unit.target: Yr ydym yn sicr wedi creu dyn i galedi.

trans-unit.source: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?
trans-unit.target: A yw'n credu y bydd unrhyw un gorchfygu byth iddo?

trans-unit.source: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."
trans-unit.target: Meddai, "yr wyf wedi treulio cyfoeth helaethrwydd."

trans-unit.source: Does he think that no one has seen him?
trans-unit.target: A yw'n credu bod unrhyw un wedi gweld ef?

trans-unit.source: Have We not made for him two eyes?
trans-unit.target: Nid ydym wedi gwneud iddo ddau lygaid?

trans-unit.source: And a tongue and two lips?
trans-unit.target: A'r tafod a gwefusau dau?

trans-unit.source: And have shown him the two ways?
trans-unit.target: Ac wedi dangos iddo ddwy ffordd?

trans-unit.source: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.
trans-unit.target: Ond ni fod wedi torri'r drwy y tocyn anodd.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?
trans-unit.target: A gall hyn wneud ichi wybod beth yw [Torri] y tocyn anodd?

trans-unit.source: It is the freeing of a slave
trans-unit.target: Mae'n rhyddhau gaethion

trans-unit.source: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger
trans-unit.target: Neu fwydo ar ddiwrnod o newyn difrifol

trans-unit.source: An orphan of near relationship
trans-unit.target: Yn amddifad o berthynas agos

trans-unit.source: Or a needy person in misery
trans-unit.target: Neu berson anghenus mewn trallod

trans-unit.source: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.
trans-unit.target: Ac yna ymhlith y rhai sydd yn credu a dywedodd un arall i amynedd ac un arall cynghorir i trugaredd.

trans-unit.source: Those are the companions of the right.
trans-unit.target: Y rheini yw'r cymdeithion yr hawl.

trans-unit.source: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.
trans-unit.target: Ond hwy a ddysgais yn ein arwyddion-rhai yn chymdeithion o chwith.

trans-unit.source: Over them will be fire closed in.
trans-unit.target: Dros eu fydd tân yn cau yn.

trans-unit.source: By the sun and its brightness
trans-unit.target: Gan yr haul a disgleirdeb ei

trans-unit.source: And [by] the moon when it follows it
trans-unit.target: A [gan] y lleuad pan mae'n dilyn ei

trans-unit.source: And [by] the day when it displays it
trans-unit.target: A [gan] y dydd pan mae'n dangos ei

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it covers it
trans-unit.target: A [gan] y nos pan mae'n cwmpasu ei

trans-unit.source: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it
trans-unit.target: Ac erbyn y sky ac ef adeiladwyd sydd ei

trans-unit.source: And [by] the earth and He who spread it
trans-unit.target: [Gan] y ddaear ac AU sy'n lledaenu

trans-unit.source: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it
trans-unit.target: A gan yr enaid ac AU sy'n dosbarthu ei

trans-unit.source: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,
trans-unit.target: A ysbrydolwyd gan ei [gyda dirnadaeth o] ei ddrygioni a chyfiawnder i ei,

trans-unit.source: He has succeeded who purifies it,
trans-unit.target: Mae wedi llwyddo sydd buro

trans-unit.source: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].
trans-unit.target: Ac mae wedi methu sy'n ennyn ei [gyda llygredd].

trans-unit.source: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,
trans-unit.target: Gwadodd Thamud [eu Proffwyd] oherwydd eu tramgwyddiad,

trans-unit.source: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.
trans-unit.target: Pan fydd y mwyaf truenus ohonynt oedd anfon ymlaen.

trans-unit.source: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."
trans-unit.target: A dywedodd y negesydd Allah [Salih] iddynt, "[wneud heb niwed] hi-camel Allah neu [yn ei hatal rhag] ei yfed."

trans-unit.source: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].
trans-unit.target: Ond maent yn gwadu iddo ac yn rhwystro hi. Felly daeth eu yr Arglwydd i lawr arnynt dinistrio eu pechod a gwneud yn equal [ar bob un ohonynt].

trans-unit.source: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.
trans-unit.target: Ac nid yw ef yn ofni ohono o ganlyniad.

trans-unit.source: By the night when it covers
trans-unit.target: Gan y nos pan mae'n cwmpasu

trans-unit.source: And [by] the day when it appears
trans-unit.target: A [gan] y dydd pan mae'n ymddangos

trans-unit.source: And [by] He who created the male and female,
trans-unit.target: A [gan] ef pwy a greodd y gwryw a benyw,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae eich ymdrechion yn amrywiol.

trans-unit.source: As for he who gives and fears Allah
trans-unit.target: Ag ef a rhoi ac ofnau Allah

trans-unit.source: And believes in the best [reward],
trans-unit.target: Ac yn credu yn y gorau [gwobr],

trans-unit.source: We will ease him toward ease.
trans-unit.target: Bydd yn lleddfu'r ef tuag at hwylustod.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need
trans-unit.target: Ond ag ef sydd yn atal ac yn ystyried ei hun yn rhad ac am ddim angen

trans-unit.source: And denies the best [reward],
trans-unit.target: Ac yn gwadu y gorau [gwobr],

trans-unit.source: We will ease him toward difficulty.
trans-unit.target: Bydd yn lleddfu'r ef tuag at anhawster.

trans-unit.source: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?
trans-unit.target: A beth fydd ei gyfoeth fanteisio ar iddo pan ei fod yn dod?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, [meddylgar] Mae canllawiau.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, i ni yn eiddo y o hyn ymlaen ac y cyntaf [bywyd].

trans-unit.source: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.
trans-unit.target: Felly fe'ch rhybuddiwyd tân sydd yn arloesol.

trans-unit.source: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.
trans-unit.target: Dim bydd [nodwch i] losgi ynddo heblaw yr un mwyaf truenus.

trans-unit.source: Who had denied and turned away.
trans-unit.target: Sydd wedi gwrthod ac yn troi ymaith.

trans-unit.source: But the righteous one will avoid it -
trans-unit.target: Ond bydd yr un cyfiawn yn osgoi-

trans-unit.source: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself
trans-unit.target: [Mae'n] sy'n rhoi'r [o] ei cyfoeth i puro'r ei hun

trans-unit.source: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded
trans-unit.target: Ac nid [rhoi] ar gyfer unrhyw un sydd wedi [wneud iddo] favor gwobrwyo

trans-unit.source: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.
trans-unit.target: Ond dim ond ceisio ystyried o ei Arglwydd, mwyaf uchel.

trans-unit.source: And he is going to be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: Ac mae'n mynd i fod yn fodlon.

trans-unit.source: By the morning brightness
trans-unit.target: Gan y disgleirdeb y bore

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,
trans-unit.target: A [gan] y nos pan mae'n cwmpasu gyda dywyllwch,

trans-unit.source: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].
trans-unit.target: Nid yw wedi Arglwydd eich gadael chi, [O Muhammad], nac wedi ei detested [ydych].

trans-unit.source: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].
trans-unit.target: A y o hyn ymlaen yn well i chi na cyntaf [bywyd].

trans-unit.source: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: A yw eich Arglwydd yn mynd i roi i chi, a byddwch yn fodlon.

trans-unit.source: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?
trans-unit.target: Ni chanfu'r ef mae ydych yn amddifad a rhoi [ydych] yn lloches?

trans-unit.source: And He found you lost and guided [you],
trans-unit.target: A Canfu eich colli ac arweiniad [ydych],

trans-unit.source: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.
trans-unit.target: Mae'n gweld chi yn wael ac a wneir [ydych] hunangynhaliol.

trans-unit.source: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].
trans-unit.target: Felly o ran yr amddifad, wneud nid gormesu [ef].

trans-unit.source: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].
trans-unit.target: Ac o ran y deisebydd, wneud na ddefnyddiwyd [ef].

trans-unit.source: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].
trans-unit.target: Ond o ran y favor o eich Arglwydd, adroddiad [TG].

trans-unit.source: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?
trans-unit.target: Oedd ddim yn ehangu i chi, [O Muhammad], fron?

trans-unit.source: And We removed from you your burden
trans-unit.target: A ydym yn symud oddi ar eich eich baich

trans-unit.source: Which had weighed upon your back
trans-unit.target: Sydd wedi pwyso ar eich cefn

trans-unit.source: And raised high for you your repute.
trans-unit.target: Ac a godwyd uchel i chi eich fri.

trans-unit.source: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
trans-unit.target: I yn wir, gyda caledi [fydd] haws.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, gyda caledi [fydd] haws.

trans-unit.source: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].
trans-unit.target: Felly pan fyddwch wedi gorffen [eich dyletswyddau], yna sefyll [ar gyfer addoli].

trans-unit.source: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.
trans-unit.target: Ac at eich Arglwydd uniongyrchol dyheu [ch].

trans-unit.source: By the fig and the olive
trans-unit.target: Gan y fig a yr olewydd

trans-unit.source: And [by] Mount Sinai
trans-unit.target: A Mount Sinai [gan]

trans-unit.source: And [by] this secure city [Makkah],
trans-unit.target: A [gan] hyn sicrhau Dinas [blentyndod],

trans-unit.source: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;
trans-unit.target: Yr ydym yn sicr wedi creu dyn yn y gorau o statws;

trans-unit.source: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,
trans-unit.target: Yna rydym yn dychwelyd iddo i'r lefel isaf o isel,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: Heblaw am y rhai sydd yn credu ac yn gwneud gweithredoedd cyfiawn, bydd ganddynt wobr di-dor.

trans-unit.source: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?
trans-unit.target: Felly beth eto yn peri ichi wadu iawndal?

trans-unit.source: Is not Allah the most just of judges?
trans-unit.target: Nid yw Allah barnwyr y mwyaf yn unig?

trans-unit.source: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -
trans-unit.target: Adrodd enw eich Arglwydd a greodd-

trans-unit.source: Created man from a clinging substance.
trans-unit.target: Crëwyd dyn o sylweddau clinging.

trans-unit.source: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -
trans-unit.target: Adrodd, ac mae eich Arglwydd yn fwyaf hael-

trans-unit.source: Who taught by the pen -
trans-unit.target: Sydd yn cael eu haddysgu gan y pen-

trans-unit.source: Taught man that which he knew not.
trans-unit.target: Addysgir dyn y gwyddai ef ni.

trans-unit.source: No! [But] indeed, man transgresses
trans-unit.target: na! [Ond] yn wir, y mae dyn yn pechu

trans-unit.source: Because he sees himself self-sufficient.
trans-unit.target: Oherwydd mae'n gweld ei hun yn hunangynhaliol.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, eich Arglwydd yn dychwelyd.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who forbids
trans-unit.target: Ydych chi wedi gweld yr un sy'n gwahardd

trans-unit.source: A servant when he prays?
trans-unit.target: Gwas pan mae ef prays?

trans-unit.source: Have you seen if he is upon guidance
trans-unit.target: Ydych chi wedi gweld os yw'n ar canllawiau

trans-unit.source: Or enjoins righteousness?
trans-unit.target: Neu enjoins chyfiawnder i?

trans-unit.source: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -
trans-unit.target: Ydych chi wedi gweld os gwadu ac yn troi i ffwrdd-

trans-unit.source: Does he not know that Allah sees?
trans-unit.target: Nid yw'n gwybod bod Allah yn gweld?

trans-unit.source: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock -
trans-unit.target: na! Os nad yw yn ymatal, yn sicr gan y forelock-y bydd Llusgwch iddo

trans-unit.source: A lying, sinning forelock.
trans-unit.target: Forelock gorwedd, sinning.

trans-unit.source: Then let him call his associates;
trans-unit.target: Gadewch iddo alw ei gymdeithion;

trans-unit.source: We will call the angels of Hell.
trans-unit.target: Byddwn yn galw yr angylion uffern.

trans-unit.source: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: na! Wneud nid ufuddhau iddo. Ond prostrate a thynnu ger [i Allah].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, anfonwyd y Qur'an i lawr yn ystod y nos ordinhad.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?
trans-unit.target: A gall hyn wneud ichi wybod beth yw noson ordinhad?

trans-unit.source: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
trans-unit.target: Nos ordinhad yn well na mil o mis.

trans-unit.source: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.
trans-unit.target: Mae angylion a'r ysbryd yn dod ynddo drwy ganiatâd eu Arglwydd am bob mater.

trans-unit.source: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.
trans-unit.target: Heddwch tan ymddangosiad dawn.

trans-unit.source: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence -
trans-unit.target: Nid oedd rhai a ddysgais ymhlith pobl yr ysgrythur ac yn y polytheists yn ildio [o misbelief] hyd nes y deuai iddynt tystiolaeth-glir

trans-unit.source: A Messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures
trans-unit.target: Negesydd gan Allah, adrodd wedi'u puro ysgrythurau

trans-unit.source: Within which are correct writings.
trans-unit.target: Y mae ysgrifau cywir.

trans-unit.source: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence.
trans-unit.target: Nid oedd tystiolaeth glir rhai sy'n ystyried y ysgrythur yn rhannwyd tan ar ôl wedi iddynt ychwaith.

trans-unit.source: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion.
trans-unit.target: Ac nid oedd tuag atynt ac eithrio i addoli Allah, [yn] diffuant iddo mewn crefydd, inclining i wirionedd, ac i sefydlu gweddi a rhoi zakah. A dyna y grefydd gywir.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, hwy a ddysgais ymhlith pobl yr ysgrythur ac yn y polytheists fydd yn y tân uffern, ufudd i'r fythol ynddo. Yw'r rhai gwaethaf o greaduriaid.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y nhw sydd wedi credu a gweithredoedd cyfiawn-gwneud y gorau o greaduriaid yw'r rheini.

trans-unit.source: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.
trans-unit.target: Bydd eu gwobrwyo â Allah yn gerddi preswyl parhaol o dan y llif afonydd, lle bydd yn cadw at yr am byth, Allah yn falch gyda hwy ac iddynt gydag ef. Hynny yw ar gyfer pwy bynnag wedi ofni ei Arglwydd.

trans-unit.source: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
trans-unit.target: Pan y mae y ddaear yn ysgwyd â ei daeargryn [terfynol]

trans-unit.source: And the earth discharges its burdens
trans-unit.target: Ac y mae y ddaear yn rhyddhau ei beichiau

trans-unit.source: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -
trans-unit.target: A dyn yn dweud, "Beth yw [anghywir] â hi?"-

trans-unit.source: That Day, it will report its news
trans-unit.target: Y diwrnod hwnnw, bydd yn adrodd yn ei newyddion

trans-unit.source: Because your Lord has commanded it.
trans-unit.target: Oherwydd mae eich Arglwydd enillodd iddo.

trans-unit.source: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.
trans-unit.target: Y diwrnod hwnnw, bydd pobl yn gadael wedi'u rhannu'n [categori] i ddangos [canlyniad] eu gweithredoedd.

trans-unit.source: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,
trans-unit.target: Felly pwy bynnag yw pwysau atom o ewyllys da gweld,

trans-unit.source: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.
trans-unit.target: A phwy bynnag yw'r atom bydd pwysau'r drygioni ei weld.

trans-unit.source: By the racers, panting,
trans-unit.target: Gan racers, dyhefod,

trans-unit.source: And the producers of sparks [when] striking
trans-unit.target: Ac i gynhyrchwyr sparks [pan] yn drawiadol

trans-unit.source: And the chargers at dawn,
trans-unit.target: A gasys yn dawn,

trans-unit.source: Stirring up thereby [clouds of] dust,
trans-unit.target: Codi twrw gan [cymylau] llwch,

trans-unit.source: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,
trans-unit.target: Cyrraedd ac felly yn y Ganolfan ar y cyd,

trans-unit.source: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Dynolryw yn wir, i ei Arglwydd, yn anniolchgar.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, he is to that a witness.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir, ef yw i fod yn dyst.

trans-unit.source: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.
trans-unit.target: Ac yn wir mae ef, yn caru cyfoeth, dwys.

trans-unit.source: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered
trans-unit.target: Ond ni wyr y pan fydd cynnwys y Beddau wedi'u gwasgaru

trans-unit.source: And that within the breasts is obtained,
trans-unit.target: A bod o fewn y bronnau,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, eu Arglwydd gyda hwy, y diwrnod hwnnw, yn [] yn hen gyfarwydd.

trans-unit.source: The Striking Calamity -
trans-unit.target: Y drychineb trawiadol-

trans-unit.source: What is the Striking Calamity?
trans-unit.target: Beth yw y drychineb yn drawiadol?

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?
trans-unit.target: A gall hyn wneud ichi wybod beth yw y drychineb yn drawiadol?

trans-unit.source: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,
trans-unit.target: Mae'n ddiwrnod pan fydd pobl fel gwyfynod, gwasgaredig,

trans-unit.source: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.
trans-unit.target: A fydd y mynyddoedd fel gwlân, imi.

trans-unit.source: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],
trans-unit.target: Yna ag un eu graddfeydd yn trwm [gyda gweithredoedd da],

trans-unit.source: He will be in a pleasant life.
trans-unit.target: Bydd ef yn bywyd dymunol.

trans-unit.source: But as for one whose scales are light,
trans-unit.target: Ond ag un eu graddfeydd yn ysgafn,

trans-unit.source: His refuge will be an abyss.
trans-unit.target: Bydd ei loches yn affwys.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what that is?
trans-unit.target: A gall hyn wneud ichi wybod beth y mae?

trans-unit.source: It is a Fire, intensely hot.
trans-unit.target: Mae'n tân, ddwys poeth.

trans-unit.source: Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you
trans-unit.target: Mae cystadleuaeth yn cynyddu [worldly] dargyfeirio chi

trans-unit.source: Until you visit the graveyards.
trans-unit.target: Nes ewch y graveyards.

trans-unit.source: No! You are going to know.
trans-unit.target: na! Byddwch yn gwybod.

trans-unit.source: Then no! You are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Yna nid oes! Byddwch yn gwybod.

trans-unit.source: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...
trans-unit.target: na! Os oeddech yn gwybod dim ond gyda gwybodaeth o sicrwydd...

trans-unit.source: You will surely see the Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Byddwch yn sicr yn gweld y Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.
trans-unit.target: Yna siawns byddwch yn gweld ei llygad o sicrwydd.

trans-unit.source: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Yna bydd gofyn chi siawns y diwrnod hwnnw am bleser.

trans-unit.source: By time,
trans-unit.target: Gan amser,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, mankind is in loss,
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, mae dynolryw yn colli,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.
trans-unit.target: Ac eithrio'r rhai sydd wedi credu a gwneud gweithredoedd cyfiawn a cynghori gilydd i wirionedd a cynghori gilydd i amynedd.

trans-unit.source: Woe to every scorner and mocker
trans-unit.target: Gwae i bob scorner a mocker

trans-unit.source: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.
trans-unit.target: Sy'n casglu cyfoeth a [barhaus] mae'n cyfrif.

trans-unit.source: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.
trans-unit.target: Mae'n credu y bydd ei gyfoeth yn gwneud iddo anfarwol.

trans-unit.source: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.
trans-unit.target: na! Bydd ei daflu sicr i y falu.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?
trans-unit.target: A gall hyn wneud ichi wybod beth yw y falu?

trans-unit.source: It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,
trans-unit.target: Mae'n tân Allah, fueled [fythol],

trans-unit.source: Which mounts directed at the hearts.
trans-unit.target: Hysbysebwch sy'n cyfeirio at y calonnau.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y bydd cau Hellfire i lawr arnynt

trans-unit.source: In extended columns.
trans-unit.target: Mewn colofnau estynedig.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?
trans-unit.target: Nid ydych wedi ystyried, [O Muhammad], sut roedd eich Arglwydd yn delio â chymdeithion yr eliffant?

trans-unit.source: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?
trans-unit.target: Ni wnaeth eu cynllun i misguidance?

trans-unit.source: And He sent against them birds in flocks,
trans-unit.target: Ac anfonodd ei fod erbyn iddynt adar mewn heidiau,

trans-unit.source: Striking them with stones of hard clay,
trans-unit.target: Iddynt yn drawiadol â cherrig clai caled,

trans-unit.source: And He made them like eaten straw.
trans-unit.target: A gwnaeth iddynt fel gwellt ei fwyta.

trans-unit.source: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -
trans-unit.target: Ar gyfer diogelwch gyfarwydd y Quraysh-

trans-unit.source: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -
trans-unit.target: Eu diogelwch gyfarwydd [yn] y garafán gaeaf a haf-

trans-unit.source: Let them worship the Lord of this House,
trans-unit.target: Gadewch iddynt addoli yr Arglwydd y tŷ hwn,

trans-unit.source: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.
trans-unit.target: Sydd wedi cael eu bwydo nhw, [arbed iddynt] o newyn ac wedi eu gwneud yn ddiogel, [arbed iddynt] gan ofn.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?
trans-unit.target: Ydych chi wedi gweld yr un sy'n gwadu iawndal?

trans-unit.source: For that is the one who drives away the orphan
trans-unit.target: Ar gyfer bod yn un sy'n gyrru i ffwrdd yr amddifad

trans-unit.source: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.
trans-unit.target: Ac nid yw'n annog bwydo y tlawd.

trans-unit.source: So woe to those who pray
trans-unit.target: Felly gwae i'r rhai sy'n gweddïo

trans-unit.source: [But] who are heedless of their prayer -
trans-unit.target: [Ond] sydd yn heedless o eu gweddi-

trans-unit.source: Those who make show [of their deeds]
trans-unit.target: Mae'r rhai sy'n gwneud yn dangos [o eu gweithredoedd]

trans-unit.source: And withhold [simple] assistance.
trans-unit.target: Ac atal cymorth [syml].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, y mae yn ganiataol chi, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.

trans-unit.source: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].
trans-unit.target: Felly weddïo i'w eich Arglwydd ac aberthu [i iddo ef yn unig].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.
trans-unit.target: Yn wir, eich gelyn yn y toriad un oddi ar.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O disbelievers,
trans-unit.target: Ddweud, "O disbelievers,

trans-unit.source: I do not worship what you worship.
trans-unit.target: Nid wyf yn addoli beth yr ydych yn ei addoli.

trans-unit.source: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.
trans-unit.target: Nid yw ychwaith yn addolwyr o beth yr wyf yn ei addoli.

trans-unit.source: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.
trans-unit.target: Ac ni Bydd worshipper o beth yr ydych yn ei addoli.

trans-unit.source: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.
trans-unit.target: Nac byddwch yn addolwyr o beth yr wyf yn ei addoli.

trans-unit.source: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."
trans-unit.target: I chi yw eich crefydd, ac i mi yn fy crefydd."

trans-unit.source: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,
trans-unit.target: Pan y daeth y fuddugoliaeth Allah ac y goresgyniad,

trans-unit.source: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,
trans-unit.target: A ydych yn gweld y bobl sy'n mynd i mewn i grefydd Allah yn multitudes,

trans-unit.source: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.
trans-unit.target: Yna exalt [ei] gyda chanmoliaeth eich Arglwydd a gofyn maddeuant iddo. Yn wir, mae iddo erioed dderbyn pedair.

trans-unit.source: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.
trans-unit.target: Gall dwylo Abu Lahab adfail, a difetha ef.

trans-unit.source: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.
trans-unit.target: Bydd ei cyfoeth nid fanteisio ar iddo neu a enillodd.

trans-unit.source: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame
trans-unit.target: Ef fydd [nodwch i] llosgi yn y tân o fflam [arloesol]

trans-unit.source: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.
trans-unit.target: A'i wraig [yn ogystal]-siopa coed tân.

trans-unit.source: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.
trans-unit.target: O amgylch ei gwddf yn rhaff o fiber [wyrdroëdig].

trans-unit.source: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One,
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "ei fod yn Allah, [sy'n] un,

trans-unit.source: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.
trans-unit.target: Allah, y lloches dragwyddol.

trans-unit.source: He neither begets nor is born,
trans-unit.target: Mae wedi arwain at ghettos nac yn cael ei eni,

trans-unit.source: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."
trans-unit.target: Ac nid oes iddo unrhyw cyfatebol. "

trans-unit.source: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "yr wyf yn ceisio lloches yn yr Arglwydd o daybreak

trans-unit.source: From the evil of that which He created
trans-unit.target: O ddrygioni a grewyd ganddo

trans-unit.source: And from the evil of darkness when it settles
trans-unit.target: Ac o ddrygioni tywyllwch pan fydd yn setlo'r

trans-unit.source: And from the evil of the blowers in knots
trans-unit.target: Ac o ddrygioni y rheini sy'n yn glymau

trans-unit.source: And from the evil of an envier when he envies."
trans-unit.target: Ac o ddrygioni envier pan y mae ef yn envies.

trans-unit.source: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,
trans-unit.target: Dweud, "yr wyf yn ceisio lloches yn yr Arglwydd o dynolryw,

trans-unit.source: The Sovereign of mankind.
trans-unit.target: Sofran dynolryw.

trans-unit.source: The God of mankind,
trans-unit.target: Y Duw y ddynoliaeth,

trans-unit.source: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -
trans-unit.target: O ddrygioni y whisperer encilio-

trans-unit.source: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -
trans-unit.target: Sydd yn sibrwd [drygioni] i bronnau y ddynoliaeth-

trans-unit.source: From among the jinn and mankind."
trans-unit.target: O blith y jinn a dynolryw.
